name: Jax
lore: Unmatched in both his skill with unique armaments and his biting sarcasm, Jax is the last known weapons master of Icathia. After his homeland was laid low by its own hubris in unleashing the Void, Jax and his kind vowed to protect what little remained. As magic now rises in the world, this slumbering threat stirs once more, and Jax roams Valoran, wielding the last light of Icathia and testing all warriors he meets to see if any are strong enough to stand beside him...
title: Grandmaster at Arms
passiva_descricao: Jax's consecutive basic attacks continuously increase his Attack Speed.

spells.sandescricao: Jax leaps toward a unit. If they are an enemy, he strikes them with his weapon.
spells.descricao: Jax leaps to target unit, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+1) (+1/0.6) physical damage if it is an enemy.
spells.name: Leap Strike

spells.sandescricao: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next attack to deal additional damage.
spells.descricao: Jax charges his weapon with energy, causing his next basic attack or Leap Strike to deal an additional 80/120/160/200/240 (+1/0.6) Magic Damage.
spells.name: Empower

spells.sandescricao: Jax's combat prowess allows him to dodge all incoming attacks for a short duration and then quickly counterattack, stunning all surrounding enemies.
spells.descricao: Jax enters a defensive stance for up to 0 seconds, dodging all incoming basic attacks and taking 0% less damage from area of effect abilities.After 2 seconds or if activated again, Jax stuns surrounding enemies for 0 second and deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.5) physical damage to them.Counter Strike deals 0% more damage for each attack Jax dodged (max: 0% increased damage).
spells.name: Counter Strike

spells.sandescricao: Every third consecutive attack deals additional Magic Damage. Additionally, Jax can activate this ability to strengthen his resolve, increasing his Armor and Magic Resist for a short duration.
spells.descricao: Passive: Every third consecutive strike Jax deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+1/0.6) additional Magic Damage.Active: Jax strengthens his resolve, granting him 0.5 Armor and 1 Magic Resist for 0 seconds.Armor bonus is equal to 0 + 0% bonus Attack Damage.Magic Resist bonus is equal to 0 + 0% Ability Power.
spells.name: Grandmaster's Might

name: Sona
lore: Sona is Demacia's foremost virtuoso of the stringed etwahl, speaking only through her graceful chords and vibrant arias. This genteel manner has endeared her to the highborn, though others suspect her spellbinding melodies to actually emanate magic—a Demacian taboo. Silent to outsiders but somehow understood by close companions, Sona plucks her harmonies not only to soothe injured allies, but also to strike down unsuspecting enemies.
title: Maven of the Strings
passiva_descricao: After casting 3 spells, Sona's next attack deals bonus magic damage in addition to a bonus effect depending on what song Sona last activated.

spells.sandescricao: Sona plays the Hymn of Valor, sends out bolts of sound, dealing magic damage to two nearby enemies, prioritizing champions and monsters. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone bonus damage on their next attack against enemies.
spells.descricao: Active: Deals 40/70/100/130/160 (+0.5) magic damage to the nearest two enemies (prioritizes champions) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Staccato.Melody: Sona gains an aura for 3 seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain an additional 10/15/20/25/30 (+0.5/0.3) magic damage on their next attack.
spells.name: Hymn of Valor

spells.sandescricao: Sona plays the Aria of Perseverance, sending out protective melodies, healing Sona and a nearby wounded ally. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allies tagged by the zone a temporary shield.
spells.descricao: Active: Restores 40/70/100/130/160 (+0.5) health to Sona and a nearby allied champion (prioritizes most wounded) and changes her Power Chord bonus to Diminuendo.Melody: Sona gains an aura for 3 seconds. Allied champions that enter the aura will gain a shield that prevents up to 10/15/20/25/30 (+0.5/0.3) damage within the next 5 seconds.
spells.name: Aria of Perseverance

spells.sandescricao: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
spells.descricao: Sona plays the Song of Celerity, granting nearby allies bonus Movement Speed. Sona gains a temporary aura that grants allied champions tagged by the zone bonus Movement Speed on their next attack.
spells.name: Song of Celerity

spells.sandescricao: Sona plays her ultimate chord, stunning enemy champions and forcing them to dance and dealing magic damage to them. Each rank reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities.
spells.descricao: Active: Strikes an irresistible chord, stunning enemy Champions and forcing them to dance for 400 seconds and take 40/70/100/130/160 (+0.5) magic damage.Passive: Reduces the base cooldown of Sona's basic abilities by 3%.
spells.name: Crescendo

name: Tristana
lore: While many other yordles channel their energy into discovery, invention, or just plain mischief-making, Tristana was always inspired by the adventures of great warriors. She had heard much about Runeterra, its factions, and its wars, and believed her kind could become worthy of legend too. Setting foot in the world for the first time, she took up her trusty cannon Boomer, and now leaps into battle with steadfast courage and optimism.
title: the Yordle Gunner
passiva_descricao: Increases Tristana's Attack Range as she levels.

spells.sandescricao: Tristana fires her weapon rapidly, increasing her Attack Speed for a short time.
spells.descricao: Active: Increases Tristana's Attack Speed by 30/50/70/90/110% for 7 seconds.
spells.name: Rapid Fire

spells.sandescricao: Tristana fires at the ground to propel her to a distant location, dealing damage and slowing surrounding units for a brief period where she lands.
spells.descricao: Tristana launches herself to target location, dealing 30/50/70/90/110 (+0.5) Magic Damage and slowing surrounding enemies by 0% for 7 seconds.Kills, Assists, and max stack Explosive Charge detonations on Champions reset Rocket Jump's cooldown.
spells.name: Rocket Jump

spells.sandescricao: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
spells.descricao: When Tristana kills a unit, her cannonballs burst into shrapnel, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Can be activated to place a bomb on a target enemy that explodes after a short duration dealing damage to surrounding units.
spells.name: Explosive Charge

spells.sandescricao: Tristana loads a massive cannonball into her weapon and fires it at an enemy unit. This deals Magic Damage and knocks the target back. If the target is carrying the Explosive Charge bomb, the bomb detonation radius is doubled.
spells.descricao: Tristana fires a massive cannonball at an enemy unit. This deals 30/50/70/90/110 (+0.5) Magic Damage and knocks surrounding units back 7 distance.
spells.name: Buster Shot

name: Varus
lore: One of the ancient race of darkin, Varus was a deadly killer who loved to torment his foes, driving them almost to insanity before delivering the killing arrow. He was imprisoned at the end of the Darkin War, but escaped centuries later in the remade flesh of two Ionian hunters—they had unwittingly released him, cursed to bear the bow containing his bound essence. Varus now seeks out those who trapped him in order to enact his brutal vengeance, but the mortals' souls within him still resist every step of the way.
title: the Arrow of Retribution
passiva_descricao: On kill or assist, Varus temporarily gains Attack Speed. This bonus is larger if the enemy is a champion.

spells.sandescricao: Varus readies and then fires a powerful shot that gains extra range and damage the longer he spends preparing to fire.
spells.descricao: First Cast: Varus starts drawing back his next shot, gradually increasing its range and damage. While preparing to shoot Varus' Movement Speed is slowed by 20%. After 4 seconds, Piercing Arrow fails but refunds 50% of its Mana cost.Second Cast: Varus fires, dealing 10/47/84/120/157 (+1) to 15/70/125/180/235 (+1/1.5) physical damage, reduced by 15% per enemy hit (minimum 33%).Piercing Arrow's cooldown is reduced by 1/1.5/1 seconds if the arrow detonates Blight stacks from at least one enemy champion.
spells.name: Piercing Arrow

spells.sandescricao: Varus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and apply Blight. Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage based on the target's maximum Health.
spells.descricao: Varus' basic attacks deal 10/47/84/120/157 (+1) bonus magic damage and apply Blight for 15 seconds (stacks 50 times).Varus' other abilities detonate Blight, dealing magic damage equal to 15/70/125/180/235% (+1/1.5%) of the target's maximum Health per stack. Max damage vs. monsters: 4 per stack.
spells.name: Blighted Quiver

spells.sandescricao: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deal physical damage and desecrate the ground. Desecrated ground slows enemies' Movement Speed and reduces their self healing and regeneration.
spells.descricao: Varus fires a hail of arrows that deals 10/47/84/120/157 (+1) physical damage and desecrates the ground for 15 seconds.Desecrated Ground slows enemy Movement Speed by 15/70/125/180/235% and reduces healing effects by 50%.
spells.name: Hail of Arrows

spells.sandescricao: Varus flings out a damaging tendril of corruption that immobilizes the first enemy champion hit and then spreads towards nearby uninfected champions, immobilizing them too on contact.
spells.descricao: Varus flings out a tendril of corruption that deals 10/47/84/120/157 (+1) magic damage and immobilizes the first enemy champion hit for 15/70/125/180/235 seconds.The corruption then spreads towards nearby uninfected enemy champions. If it reaches them, they take the same damage and are also immobilized. Immobilized units gain 50 Blight stacks over the duration.
spells.name: Chain of Corruption

name: Fiora
lore: The most feared duelist in all Valoran, Fiora is as renowned for her brusque manner and cunning mind as she is for the speed of her bluesteel rapier. Born to House Laurent in the kingdom of Demacia, Fiora took control of the family from her father in the wake of a scandal that nearly destroyed them. House Laurent's reputation was sundered, but Fiora bends her every effort to restore her family's honor and return them to their rightful place among the great and good of Demacia.
title: the Grand Duelist
passiva_descricao: Fiora challenges nearby enemy Champions to dodge her. She calls out a direction from which she will try to strike. If she can complete her own challenge, she receives a small bonus and calls out a new direction.

spells.sandescricao: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing physical damage and applying on-hit effects.
spells.descricao: Fiora lunges in a direction and stabs a nearby enemy, dealing 70/80/90/100/110 (+0.6) physical damage and applying on-hit effects. This attack prioritizes Vitals and enemies it will kill.If this ability hits an enemy, 60% of its cooldown is refunded.
spells.name: Lunge

spells.sandescricao: Fiora parries all incoming damage and disables for a short time, then stabs in a direction. This stab slows the first enemy champion hit, or stuns them if Fiora blocked an immobilizing effect with this ability.
spells.descricao: Fiora parries all incoming damage, debuffs, and disables for the next 0.95/1/1.05/1.1/1.15 seconds and then stabs in the target direction.The stab deals 70/80/90/100/110 (+0.6) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and slows their movement and attack speed by 60% for 50 seconds. If Fiora parries an immobilizing effect, Riposte stuns instead of slowing.
spells.name: Riposte

spells.sandescricao: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.
spells.descricao: Fiora has increased attack speed for the next two attacks. The first attack slows the target, and the second attack will critically strike.
spells.name: Bladework

spells.sandescricao: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
spells.descricao: Fiora reveals all four Vitals on an enemy champion and gains movement speed while near them. If Fiora hits all 4 Vitals or if the target dies after she has hit at least one, Fiora and her allies in the area are healed over the next few seconds.
spells.name: Grand Challenge

name: Singed
lore: Singed is a Zaunite alchemist of unmatched intellect, who has devoted his life to pushing the boundaries of knowledge—with no price, even his own sanity, too high to pay. Is there a method to his madness? His concoctions rarely fail, but it appears to many that Singed has lost all sense of humanity, leaving a toxic trail of misery and terror in his wake.
title: the Mad Chemist
passiva_descricao: Singed drafts off nearby champions, gaining a burst of movement speed when passing them.

spells.sandescricao: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
spells.descricao: Leaves a trail of poison behind Singed, dealing damage to enemies caught in the path.
spells.name: Poison Trail

spells.sandescricao: Throws a vial of mega adhesive on the ground, slowing and grounding enemies who walk on it.
spells.descricao: Singed leaves a sticky area on the ground for 1 seconds. Enemies in the area are slowed by 20/30/40/50/60% and grounded, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities.If Singed flings a target into the zone, it will root them.
spells.name: Mega Adhesive

spells.sandescricao: Damages target enemy unit and flings them into the air behind Singed. If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted.
spells.descricao: Singed flings an enemy over his shoulder, dealing 20/30/40/50/60 (+0.75) plus 3.25% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage. Max 300 bonus damage against minions and monsters.If the target Singed flings lands in his Mega Adhesive, they are also rooted for 1 second(s).
spells.name: Fling

spells.sandescricao: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him increased combat stats.
spells.descricao: Singed drinks a potent brew of chemicals, granting him 20/30/40/50/60 Ability Power, Armor, Magic Resist, Movement Speed, Health Regen, and Mana Regen for 1 seconds.
spells.name: Insanity Potion

name: Tahm Kench
lore: Known by many names throughout history, the demon Tahm Kench travels the waterways of Runeterra, feeding his insatiable appetite with the misery of others. Though he may appear singularly charming and proud, he swaggers through the physical realm like a vagabond in search of unsuspecting prey. His lashing tongue can stun even a heavily armored warrior from a dozen paces, and to fall into his rumbling belly is to tumble into an abyss from which there is little hope of return.
title: the River King
passiva_descricao: Tahm Kench puts the heft of his immense body behind his attacks and abilities, gaining extra damage based on his total health. Damaging enemy champions builds stacks of An Acquired Taste. At three stacks, he can use Devour on an enemy champion.

spells.sandescricao: Tahm Kench lashes out with his tongue, damaging and slowing the first unit hit. This ability gains a stun after three stacks of An Acquired Taste.
spells.descricao: Damage the first enemy hit for 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.7) magic damage and slow them by 30/40/50/60/70% for 2s. Champions with 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste will additionally be stunned for 1.5s.Activate Devour while your tongue is in midair to devour monsters/minions from a distance.
spells.name: Tongue Lash

spells.sandescricao: Tahm Kench devours a target, dealing a percentage of their maximum health as magic damage. He can spit devoured minions and monsters out as a skillshot that deals magic damage in an area upon impact.
spells.descricao: Devour a target for 875s (half that for enemy champions.) Enemies are dealt 80/130/180/230/280% (+0.7%) of their maximum health as magic damage (maximum of 1000 against neutral monsters).Enemy Champions: Requires 3 stacks of An Acquired Taste to be devoured. While holding an enemy champion, Tahm Kench is slowed by 95%. Allied Champions: While holding an allied champion, Tahm Kench gains 30/40/50/60/70% movement speed toward enemy champions.Minions and Monsters: Reactivate to spit them, dealing 0 (+0.02/0.6) magic damage to targets hit.
spells.name: Devour

spells.sandescricao: Tahm Kench turns incoming damage into gray health. As gray health decays, Tahm Kench is healed for a percentage of the gray health amount. When activated, this ability turns all gray health into a shield.
spells.descricao: Passive: 80/130/180/230/280% of the Damage taken while this ability is not cooling down is converted to gray health. If allowed to decay, 1000% of gray health will turn back into health.Active: Convert all of your gray health into a shield that lasts 875 seconds.
spells.name: Thick Skin

spells.sandescricao: Tahm Kench teleports across the map, and he may bring one ally champion with him.
spells.descricao: Begin to channel for up to 6 seconds. During this time, one ally champion can right click Tahm Kench to join in. Alternatively, reactivate this ability to travel alone. On reactivation or once an ally has opted in, Tahm travels to the target location. Incoming champion damage breaks the channel.'Boy, the world's one river, and I'm its king. Ain't no place I ain't been; ain't no place I can't go again.'
spells.name: Abyssal Voyage

name: LeBlanc
lore: Mysterious even to other members of the Black Rose cabal, LeBlanc is but one of many names for a pale woman who has manipulated people and events since the earliest days of Noxus. Using her magic to mirror herself, the sorceress can appear to anyone, anywhere, and even be in many places at once. Always plotting just out of sight, LeBlanc's true motives are as inscrutable as her shifting identity.
title: the Deceiver
passiva_descricao: When LeBlanc damages an enemy with a spell, she marks the target for 4 seconds. After 1.5 seconds, LeBlanc's next spell shatters the Sigil to deal magic damage. Sigil of Malice cannot occur again on the same unit for 5 seconds.

spells.sandescricao: LeBlanc projects an orb towards her target, dealing magic damage. When Shatter Orb is empowered by Sigil of Malice, the spell bounces to the nearest ready Sigil of Malice (bounces deal reduced damage to minions).
spells.descricao: Deals 55/90/125/160/195 (+0.5) magic damage. When Shatter Orb is empowered by Sigil of Malice, the spell bounces to the nearest ready Sigil of Malice (bounces deal 60% damage to minions).
spells.name: Shatter Orb

spells.sandescricao: LeBlanc rapidly dashes to a target location, dealing magic damage to nearby units. In the following 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
spells.descricao: Dashes to target location, dealing 55/90/125/160/195 (+0.5) magic damage to enemies in the target area.For the next 4 seconds, she can activate Distortion again to return to her starting location.
spells.name: Distortion

spells.sandescricao: LeBlanc flings illusionary chains towards a target location. If it hits an enemy unit, it will deal initial magic damage and shackle them. If the target remains shackled for 1.5 seconds, the target takes additional magic damage and is unable to move.
spells.descricao: Launches a chain that shackles the first unit hit to LeBlanc, granting True Sight of the unit and dealing 55/90/125/160/195 (+0.5) magic damage.If the target remains shackled for 25 seconds they are rooted for 2 seconds and take an additional 40/55/70/85/100 (+0.2) magic damage.
spells.name: Ethereal Chains

spells.sandescricao: LeBlanc creates a clone and casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells. The clone casts a fake copy of that spell. LeBlanc can instead send the clone far away, where it casts a fake copy of her most recently cast spell.
spells.descricao: LeBlanc creates a clone and casts a mimicked version of one of her basic spells. The clone casts a fake copy of that spell. LeBlanc can instead send the clone far away, where it casts a fake copy of her most recently cast spell.
spells.name: Mimic

name: Thresh
lore: Sadistic and cunning, Thresh is an ambitious and restless spirit of the Shadow Isles. Once the custodian of countless arcane secrets, he sought a power greater than life or death, and now sustains himself by tormenting and breaking others with slow, excruciating inventiveness. His victims suffer far beyond their brief mortal coil as Thresh wreaks agony upon their souls, imprisoning them in his unholy lantern to torture for all eternity.
title: the Chain Warden
passiva_descricao: Thresh can harvest the souls of enemies that die near him, permanently granting him Armor and Ability Power.

spells.sandescricao: Thresh binds an enemy in chains and pulls them toward him. Activating this ability a second time pulls Thresh to the enemy.
spells.descricao: Thresh throws out his scythe, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.5) magic damage, granting True Sight and stunning the first unit hit, pulling them in for 1.5 seconds.Reactivating this ability will pull Thresh to the bound enemy.Death Sentence's cooldown is reduced by 3 seconds if it hits an enemy.
spells.name: Death Sentence

spells.sandescricao: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.descricao: Thresh throws out a lantern that shields nearby allied Champions from damage. Allies can click the lantern to dash to Thresh.
spells.name: Dark Passage

spells.sandescricao: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.descricao: Thresh's attacks wind up, dealing more damage the longer he waits between attacks. When activated, Thresh sweeps his chain, knocking all enemies hit in the direction of the blow.
spells.name: Flay

spells.sandescricao: A prison of walls that slow and deal damage if broken.
spells.descricao: Thresh creates a prison of spectral walls around himself. Enemy champions who walk through a wall suffer 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.5) magic damage and are slowed by 75% for 1.5 seconds, but break that wall.  Once one wall is broken, the remaining walls deal no damage and apply half slow duration. An enemy cannot be affected by multiple walls simultaneously.
spells.name: The Box

name: Karma
lore: No champion exemplifies the spiritual traditions of Ionia more than Karma. She is the living embodiment of an ancient soul reincarnated countless times, carrying all her accumulated memories into each new life. With this insight, she serves as a spiritual beacon to her people, bestowing boundless wisdom and healing in times of crisis. Despite being blessed with power that few could comprehend, she rarely uses her magic for destruction, as it always comes at a considerable cost—both to her, and to the land she holds most dear.
title: the Enlightened One
passiva_descricao: Reduces Mantra's cooldown each time Karma damages an enemy champion with one of her abilities (Half-effect for Karma's basic attacks)

spells.sandescricao: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit. Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
spells.descricao: Karma sends forth a ball of spirit energy that explodes and deals damage upon hitting an enemy unit. Mantra Bonus: In addition to the explosion, Mantra increases the destructive power of her Inner Flame, creating a cataclysm which deals damage after a short delay.
spells.name: Inner Flame

spells.sandescricao: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again. Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
spells.descricao: Karma creates a tether between herself and a targeted enemy, dealing damage and revealing them. If the tether is not broken, the enemy will be rooted and damaged again. Mantra Bonus: Karma strengthens the link, healing herself and extending the root duration.
spells.name: Focused Resolve

spells.sandescricao: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally. Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
spells.descricao: Karma summons a protective shield that absorbs incoming damage and increases the Movement Speed of the protected ally. Mantra Bonus: Energy radiates out from her target, strengthening the initial shield and applying Inspire to nearby allied champions.
spells.name: Inspire

spells.sandescricao: Karma empowers her next ability to do an additional effect. Mantra is available at level 1 and does not require a skill point.
spells.descricao: Karma empowers her next ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect. Soulflare: Deals bonus damage and leaves behind a circle of flame, slowing enemies and dealing additional damage. Renewal: Karma heals for a portion of her missing health. If the link is unbroken the root is longer and Karma is healed again.Defiance: The shield is stronger and allied champions around the target also gain a shield and movement speed.
spells.name: Mantra

name: Jhin
lore: Jhin is a meticulous criminal psychopath who believes murder is art. Once an Ionian prisoner, but freed by shadowy elements within Ionia's ruling council, the serial killer now works as their cabal's assassin. Using his gun as his paintbrush, Jhin creates works of artistic brutality, horrifying victims and onlookers. He gains a cruel pleasure from putting on his gruesome theater, making him the ideal choice to send the most powerful of messages: terror.
title: the Virtuoso
passiva_descricao: Jhin's hand cannon, Whisper, is a precise instrument designed to deal superior damage. It fires at a fixed rate and carries only four shots. Jhin imbues the final bullet with dark magics to critically strike and deal bonus execute damage. Whenever Whisper crits, it inspires Jhin with a burst of movement speed.

spells.sandescricao: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.
spells.descricao: Jhin launches a magical cartridge at an enemy. It can hit up to four targets and gains damage each time it kills.
spells.name: Dancing Grenade

spells.sandescricao: Jhin brandishes his cane, firing a single shot with incredible range. It pierces through minions and monsters, but stops on the first champion hit. If the target was recently struck by Jhin's allies, lotus traps, or basic attacks, they are rooted.
spells.descricao: Jhin fires a long range shot that stops on the first champion hit, dealing 45/70/95/120/145 (+0.6) physical damage to it, and 0% of that damage to minions and monsters hit along the way.If Deadly Flourish strikes a champion that has been hit by one of Jhin's basic attacks, Lotus Traps, or allies within the last 4 seconds it will root them for 35 seconds and grants Jhin movement speed as though he had crit them.
spells.name: Deadly Flourish

spells.sandescricao: Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals. Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.
spells.descricao: Jhin places an invisible lotus trap that blooms when walked over. It slows nearby enemies before dealing damage with an explosion of serrated petals. Beauty in Death - When Jhin kills an enemy champion, a lotus trap will bloom near their corpse.
spells.name: Captive Audience

spells.sandescricao: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
spells.descricao: Jhin channels, transforming Whisper into a shoulder-mounted mega-cannon. It is able to fire 4 super shots at extreme range that pierce through minions and monsters, but stop on the first champion impacted. Whisper cripples enemies hit, which slows them and deals execute damage. The 4th shot is perfectly crafted, epically powerful, and guaranteed to critically strike.
spells.name: Curtain Call

name: Rumble
lore: Rumble is a young inventor with a temper. Using nothing more than his own two hands and a heap of scrap, the feisty yordle constructed a colossal mech suit outfitted with an arsenal of electrified harpoons and incendiary rockets. Though others may scoff and sneer at his junkyard creations, Rumble doesn't mind—after all, he's the one with the flamespitter.
title: the Mechanized Menace
passiva_descricao: Every spell Rumble casts gives him Heat. When he reaches 50% Heat he reaches Danger Zone, granting all his basic abilities bonus effects. When he reaches 100% Heat, he starts Overheating, granting his basic attacks bonus damage, but making him unable to cast spells for a few seconds.

spells.sandescricao: Rumble torches opponents in front of him, dealing magic damage in a cone for 3 seconds. While in Danger Zone this damage is increased.
spells.descricao: Rumble torches his opponents, dealing 135/180/225/270/315 (+1.1) magic damage in a cone over 3 seconds. This spell deals 75% damage to minions.Danger Zone Bonus: Deals 150% damage.
spells.name: Flamespitter

spells.sandescricao: Rumble pulls up a shield, protecting him from damage and granting him a quick burst of speed. While in Danger Zone, the shield strength and speed bonus is increased.
spells.descricao: Rumble tosses up a shield for 150 seconds that absorbs 135/180/225/270/315 (+1.1) damage. Rumble also gains an additional 20% Movement Speed for 12 second. Danger Zone Bonus: 50% increase in shield health and Movement Speed.
spells.name: Scrap Shield

spells.sandescricao: Rumble launches a taser, electrocuting his target with magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed. Rumble can carry 2 harpoons at a time. While in Danger Zone the damage and slow percentage is increased.
spells.descricao: Rumble shoots his opponent with up to 2 tasers, dealing 135/180/225/270/315 (+1.1) magic damage and applying a stacking slow of 20% for 0.25 seconds.Danger Zone Bonus: Damage and slow percentage increased by 50%.
spells.name: Electro Harpoon

spells.sandescricao: Rumble fires off a group of rockets, creating a wall of flames that damages and slows enemies.
spells.descricao: Rumble launches a line of rockets that creates a burning trail for 150 seconds. Enemies in the area have their Movement Speed slowed by 0% and take 135/180/225/270/315 (+0.3) magic damage each second.You can control the placement of this attack by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.
spells.name: The Equalizer

name: Udyr
lore: Udyr is more than a man; he is a vessel for the untamed power of four primal animal spirits. When tapping into the spirits' bestial natures, Udyr can harness their unique strengths: The tiger grants him speed and ferocity, the turtle resilience, the bear might, and the phoenix its eternal flame. With their combined power, Udyr can turn back all those who would attempt to harm the natural order.
title: the Spirit Walker
passiva_descricao: Entering a stance grants Udyr bonus Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short duration. This effect can stack multiple times.

spells.sandescricao: Tiger Stance: Activation - Udyr's Attack Speed is increased for a few seconds. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will deal a high amount of damage over 2 seconds.
spells.descricao: Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after will perform a Tiger Strike, dealing bonus 30/60/90/120/150 (+1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5/1.6) physical damage over 2 seconds. If a target is affected by Tiger Strike, a new application of Tiger Strike will deal the remaining damage instantly.Activation: Increases Attack Speed by 30/40/50/60/70% for 5 seconds.Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.
spells.name: Tiger Stance

spells.sandescricao: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.
spells.descricao: Turtle Stance: Activation - Udyr gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after heals him for 2.5% of his maximum health.
spells.name: Turtle Stance

spells.sandescricao: Bear Stance: Activation - Udyr increases Movement Speed for a short duration. Persistent Effect - Udyr's basic attacks stun his target for 1 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target for several seconds.
spells.descricao: Persistent Effect: Basic attacks stun the target for 0.15 second. This effect cannot occur on the same target again for 120/135/150/165/180 seconds.Activation: Increases Movement Speed by 30/60/90/120/150% and ignores unit collision for 30/40/50/60/70 seconds.Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.
spells.name: Bear Stance

spells.sandescricao: Phoenix Stance: Activation - Udyr unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing damage to nearby enemies. Persistent Effect - Udyr's first attack and every third attack after engulfs enemies in front of him with flames.
spells.descricao: Persistent Effect: Udyr's first attack and every third attack after burns enemies in front of him, dealing 30/40/50/60/70 (+0.5) magic damage.Activation: Unleashes pulsing waves of fire, dealing 30/60/90/120/150 (+0.6/0.25) magic damage each second to nearby enemies for 2 seconds.Udyr's stance mana costs decrease by 1 each time he levels up.
spells.name: Phoenix Stance

name: Lee Sin
lore: A master of Ionia's ancient martial arts, Lee Sin is a principled fighter who channels the essence of the dragon spirit to face any challenge. Though he lost his sight many years ago, the warrior-monk has devoted his life to protecting his homeland against any who would dare upset its sacred balance. Enemies who underestimate his meditative demeanor will endure his fabled burning fists and blazing roundhouse kicks.
title: the Blind Monk
passiva_descricao: After Lee Sin uses an ability, his next 2 basic attacks gain 40% Attack Speed and return 20/10 Energy.

spells.sandescricao: Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing physical damage to the first enemy it encounters. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds. Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health.
spells.descricao: Sonic Wave: Lee Sin projects a discordant wave of sound to locate his enemies, dealing 55/85/115/145/175 (+0.9) physical damage to the first enemy it encounters, granting True Sight of the target. If Sonic Wave hits, Lee Sin can cast Resonating Strike for the next 3 seconds.Resonating Strike: Lee Sin dashes to the enemy hit by Sonic Wave, dealing 55/85/115/145/175 (+0.9/0.9) physical damage plus 8% of their missing Health (Max: 400 Damage vs. Monsters).
spells.name: Sonic Wave / Resonating Strike

spells.sandescricao: Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally, shielding himself from damage. If the ally is a champion, they are also shielded. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 3 seconds. Iron Will: Lee Sin's intense training allows him to thrive in battle. For 4 seconds, Lee Sin gains Life Steal and Spell Vamp.
spells.descricao: Safeguard: Lee Sin rushes to target ally. If the ally is a champion, Lee Sin shields the ally and himself for 55/85/115/145/175 (+0.9) damage for 8 seconds and Safeguard's cooldown is reduced by 400%. After using Safeguard, Lee Sin can cast Iron Will for the next 0 seconds.Iron Will: Lee Sin gains 55/85/115/145/175% Life Steal and Spell Vamp for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Safeguard / Iron Will

spells.sandescricao: Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage and reveals enemy units hit. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast cripple for the next 3 seconds. Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies damaged by Tempest, reducing their Movement Speed for 4 seconds. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
spells.descricao: Tempest: Lee Sin smashes the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals 55/85/115/145/175 (+0.9) magic damage. If Tempest hits an enemy, Lee Sin can cast Cripple for the next 400 seconds.Cripple: Lee Sin cripples nearby enemies struck by Tempest for 1350 seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by 55/85/115/145/175%. Movement Speed recovers gradually over the duration.
spells.name: Tempest / Cripple

spells.sandescricao: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick launching his target back, dealing physical damage to the target and any enemies they collide with. Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air for a short duration. This technique was taught to him by Jesse Perring, although Lee Sin does not kick players off the map.
spells.descricao: Lee Sin performs a powerful roundhouse kick knocking an enemy champion back and dealing 55/85/115/145/175 (+0.9) physical damage.Enemies the target collides with are knocked into the air briefly and take physical damage equal to 55/110/165/220/275 (+0.9/0.9) plus 8% of the initial target's bonus health.
spells.name: Dragon's Rage

name: Yorick
lore: The last survivor of a long-forgotten religious order, Yorick is both blessed and cursed with power over the dead. Trapped on the Shadow Isles, his only companions are the rotting corpses and shrieking spirits that he gathers to him. Yorick's monstrous actions belie his noble purpose: to free his home from the curse of the Ruination.
title: Shepherd of Souls
passiva_descricao: Yorick can raise Mist Walkers with his abilities. Enemies that die near Yorick will sometimes leave a grave.

spells.sandescricao: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
spells.descricao: Yorick deals bonus damage on his next attack and heals himself. If the target dies a grave will be dug.
spells.name: Last Rites

spells.sandescricao: Yorick summons a destructible wall at target location that will block enemy movement.
spells.descricao: Yorick summons a destructible wall of spirits with 0 Health around target area for 30/55/80/105/130 seconds. Allies can walk through the wall freely.
spells.name: Dark Procession

spells.sandescricao: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that damages, slows and marks enemies.
spells.descricao: Yorick throws a globule of Black Mist that deals 0% of enemy's current Health as magic damage (minimum 30/55/80/105/130 (+1.4)), slows by 0% for 0 seconds, and marks champions and monsters for 5 seconds.Yorick and his minions are hasted by 0% while moving toward the mark.
spells.name: Mourning Mist

spells.sandescricao: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
spells.descricao: Yorick summons the Maiden of the Mist that causes Yorick's attacks against the Maiden's target to deal bonus damage. The Maiden will also automatically raise Walkers from dead enemies.
spells.name: Eulogy of the Isles

name: Ornn
lore: Ornn is the Freljordian spirit of forging and craftsmanship. He works in the solitude of a massive smithy, hammered out from the lava caverns beneath the volcano Hearth-Home. There he stokes bubbling cauldrons of molten rock to purify ores and fashion items of unsurpassed quality. When other deities—especially Volibear—walk the earth and meddle in mortal affairs, Ornn arises to put these impetuous beings back in their place, either with his trusty hammer or the fiery power of the mountains themselves.
title: The Fire below the Mountain
passiva_descricao: Ornn can spend gold to forge non-consumable items anywhere. Additionally, when Ornn reaches level 13 masterwork upgrades for some items become available for Ornn and his team to purchase. Ornn can smith items directly from his forge menu or the shop.

spells.sandescricao: Ornn slams the ground, sending out a fissure dealing damage and slowing enemies hit. After a small delay, a magma pillar forms at the end location.
spells.descricao: Ornn slams the ground, creating a fissure which deals 20/50/80/110/140 (+0.6) physical damage and slows by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds. A magma pillar then forms at the fissure's end for 4 seconds.The fissure stops shortly after hitting an enemy champion.
spells.name: Volcanic Rupture

spells.sandescricao: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
spells.descricao: Ornn advances unstoppably, breathing fire and shielding himself. Enemies hit by the final gout of flame become Brittle.
spells.name: Bellows Breath

spells.sandescricao: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
spells.descricao: Ornn charges, dealing damage to enemies he passes through. If Ornn collides with terrain while charging, the impact creates a shockwave around him which deals damage and knocks up enemies.
spells.name: Searing Charge

spells.sandescricao: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
spells.descricao: Ornn summons a massive elemental at a location which travels toward him with increasing speed. Enemies run over by the elemental take damage, are slowed and are made Brittle. Ornn can recast the ability to charge into the elemental, redirecting it in the direction he hits it, causing the elemental to affect any enemies it runs over to be knocked up for 1 second, dealing the same damage and re-applying Brittle.
spells.name: Call of the Forge God

name: Kayn
lore: A peerless practitioner of lethal shadow magic, Shieda Kayn battles to achieve his true destiny—to one day lead the Order of the Shadow into a new era of Ionian supremacy. He audaciously wields the sentient darkin weapon Rhaast, undeterred by its creeping corruption of his body and mind. There are only two possible outcomes: either Kayn bends the weapon to his will... or the malevolent blade consumes him completely, paving the way for the destruction of all Runeterra.
title: the Shadow Reaper
passiva_descricao: At one point in the game, Kayn will permanently transform into either a Shadow Assassin or a Darkin.

spells.sandescricao: Kayn dashes, then slashes. Both deal damage.
spells.descricao: Kayn dashes forward to strike nearby enemies. Both dash and strike deal 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.65) physical damage.Darkin: Deal a percentage of the target's maximum health instead.Deals 55 bonus physical damage to monsters.
spells.name: Reaping Slash

spells.sandescricao: Kayn damages and slows targets in a line.
spells.descricao: Kayn deals 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.65) physical damage and slows enemies hit by 5%, decaying over the next 200/250/300/350/400 seconds.Shadow Assassin: Gain extra range and the ability to move during Blade's Reach.Darkin: Gain a knock up.
spells.name: Blade's Reach

spells.sandescricao: Kayn can walk through terrain.
spells.descricao: Kayn gains 60/80/100/120/140% movement speed and the ability to walk through terrain for 0.5 seconds. When he first enters terrain, he is healed for 300 (+0.65).Shadow Assassin: Gain more movement speed and slow immunity.Maximum duration in combat with enemy champions: 55 seconds.Immobilizing effects and spending more than 5 consecutive seconds outside of terrain end Shadow Step immediately.
spells.name: Shadow Step

spells.sandescricao: Kayn hides in an enemy's body, dealing massive damage when he bursts out.
spells.descricao: Kayn infests an enemy champion he has recently damaged, becoming untargetable for up to 4 seconds. Reactivate to end this effect early. When Umbral Trespass ends, the target takes 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.65) physical damage.Shadow Assassin: Gains extra range and refresh The Darkin Scythe on exit.Darkin: Deals percent maximum health damage and heals for a percentage of target maximum health.
spells.name: Umbral Trespass

name: Kassadin
lore: Cutting a burning swath through the darkest places of the world, Kassadin knows his days are numbered. Though once a notorious adventurer, he had chosen to live anonymously and raise a family among the nomad tribes of Shurima—until the day his daughter was claimed by the Void. Kassadin vowed to bring her back, combining a number of arcane artifacts and forbidden technologies for the struggle ahead. His precautions were not enough, however, and these devices now only serve to slow the insidious corruption that ravages his body... but he will gladly pay that price, if only he can save her...
title: the Void Walker
passiva_descricao: Kassadin takes 15% reduced magic damage and ignores unit collision.

spells.sandescricao: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy at a target, dealing damage and interrupting channels. The excess energy forms around himself, granting a temporary shield that absorbs magic damage.
spells.descricao: Kassadin fires an orb of void energy that deals 65/95/125/155/185 (+0.7) magic damage and interrupts channels.The excess energy forms around himself, granting a shield that absorbs 40/70/100/130/160 (+0.7/0.3) magic damage for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Null Sphere

spells.sandescricao: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. Active: Kassadin's next basic attack deals significant bonus magic damage and restores Mana.
spells.descricao: Passive: Kassadin's basic attacks draw energy from the void, dealing 0 (+0.7) bonus magic damage.Active: Kassadin charges his Nether Blade, causing his next basic attack to deal 40/70/100/130/160 (+0.7/0.3) bonus magic damage and restore 65/95/125/155/185% of his missing Mana (increases to 1.5% against champions).
spells.name: Nether Blade

spells.sandescricao: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity. Upon charging up, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to damage and slow enemies in a cone in front of him.
spells.descricao: Kassadin draws energy from spells cast in his vicinity, gaining a charge whenever a spell is cast near him.Upon reaching 6 charges, Kassadin can use Force Pulse to deal 65/95/125/155/185 (+0.7) magic damage and slow enemies by 0% for 40/70/100/130/160 second in a cone in front of him.
spells.name: Force Pulse

spells.sandescricao: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
spells.descricao: Kassadin teleports to a nearby location dealing damage to nearby enemy units. Multiple Riftwalks in a short period of time cost additional Mana but also deal additional damage.
spells.name: Riftwalk

name: Sivir
lore: Sivir is a renowned fortune hunter and mercenary captain who plies her trade in the deserts of Shurima. Armed with her legendary jeweled crossblade, she has fought and won countless battles for those who can afford her exorbitant price. Known for her fearless resolve and endless ambition, she prides herself on recovering buried treasures from the perilous tombs of Shurima—for a generous bounty. With ancient forces stirring the very bones of Shurima, Sivir finds herself torn between conflicting destinies.
title: the Battle Mistress
passiva_descricao: Sivir gains a short burst of Movement Speed when she attacks an enemy champion.

spells.sandescricao: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, dealing damage each way.
spells.descricao: Sivir hurls her crossblade like a boomerang, which deals 35/55/75/95/115 (+) (+0.5) physical damage to the first target hit and 15% reduced damage to each subsequent target down to a minimum of 40%.
spells.name: Boomerang Blade

spells.sandescricao: Sivir's next few basic attacks will bounce to nearby targets, dealing reduced damage to secondary targets.
spells.descricao: Sivir's next 0.7/0.8/0.9/1/1.1 basic attacks bounce to nearby targets, dealing  physical damage to the first target and  physical damage to each subsequent target.If a given Ricochet attack critically strikes its first target, all subsequent bounces from that attack will also critically strike.Targets cannot be hit more than once by a given Ricochet attack and on-hit effects are applied only to the first target of each attack.
spells.name: Ricochet

spells.sandescricao: Creates a magical barrier that blocks a single enemy ability cast on Sivir. She receives Mana back if a spell is blocked.
spells.descricao: Sivir creates a magical barrier for 35/55/75/95/115 seconds that blocks the next incoming enemy ability.If an ability is blocked by the shield, Sivir regains 15 Mana.
spells.name: Spell Shield

spells.sandescricao: Sivir leads her allies in battle, granting them a surge Movement Speed for a period of time. Additionally passively grants Sivir bonus Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.
spells.descricao: Passive: Sivir gains 35/55/75/95/115% Attack Speed while Ricochet is active.Active: Sivir rallies her allies for 40 seconds, granting all nearby allies an initial 0.7/0.8/0.9/1/1.1% Movement Speed bonus that reduces to 15% after the first 70/80/90/100/110 seconds of On The Hunt elapse.
spells.name: On The Hunt

name: Miss Fortune
lore: A Bilgewater captain famed for her looks but feared for her ruthlessness, Sarah Fortune paints a stark figure among the hardened criminals of the port city. As a child, she witnessed the reaver king Gangplank murder her family—an act she brutally avenged years later, blowing up his flagship while he was still aboard. Those who underestimate her will face a beguiling and unpredictable opponent… and, likely, a bullet or two in their guts.
title: the Bounty Hunter
passiva_descricao: Miss Fortune deals bonus physical damage whenever she attacks a new target.

spells.sandescricao: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
spells.descricao: Miss Fortune fires a bullet at an enemy, damaging them and a target behind them. Both strikes can also apply Love Tap.
spells.name: Double Up

spells.sandescricao: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
spells.descricao: Miss Fortune passively gains Movement Speed when not attacked. This ability can be activated to grant bonus Attack Speed for a short duration. While it's on cooldown, Love Taps reduce the remaining cooldown of Strut.
spells.name: Strut

spells.sandescricao: Miss Fortune reveals an area with a flurry of bullets, dealing waves of damage to opponents and slowing them.
spells.descricao: Miss Fortune reveals an area, raining down bullets that deal 1 (+1/0.35) magic damage over 2 seconds and slow enemies hit by 20/40/60/80/100%.
spells.name: Make It Rain

spells.sandescricao: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
spells.descricao: Miss Fortune channels a flurry of bullets into a cone in front of her, dealing large amounts of damage to enemies. Each wave of Bullet Time can critically strike.
spells.name: Bullet Time

name: Draven
lore: In Noxus, warriors known as reckoners face one another in arenas where blood is spilled and strength tested—but none has ever been as celebrated as Draven. A former soldier, he found that the crowds uniquely appreciated his flair for the dramatic, not to mention the spray of blood from each of his spinning axes. Addicted to the spectacle of his own brash perfection, Draven has sworn to defeat whomever he must to ensure that his name is chanted throughout the empire forever more.
title: the Glorious Executioner
passiva_descricao: Draven gains his fans' Adoration when he catches a Spinning Axe or kills a minion, monster, or tower. Killing enemy champions grants Draven bonus gold based on how much Adoration he has.

spells.sandescricao: Draven's next attack will deal bonus physical damage. This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe. Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
spells.descricao: Draven's next attack will deal 0.45/0.55/0.65/0.75/0.85 bonus physical damage. The bonus is equal to 35/40/45/50/55 plus 65/75/85/95/105% of his bonus Attack Damage.This axe will ricochet off the target high up into the air. If Draven catches it, he automatically readies another Spinning Axe.Draven can have two Spinning Axes at once.
spells.name: Spinning Axe

spells.sandescricao: Draven gains increased Movement Speed and Attack Speed. The Movement Speed bonus decreases rapidly over its duration. Catching a Spinning Axe will refresh the cooldown of Blood Rush.
spells.name: Blood Rush

spells.sandescricao: Draven throws his axes, dealing physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed.
spells.descricao: Draven throws his axes, dealing 100 (+0.45/0.55/0.65/0.75/0.85) physical damage to targets hit and knocking them aside. Targets hit are slowed by 65/75/85/95/105% for 30/35/40/45/50 seconds.
spells.name: Stand Aside

spells.sandescricao: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal physical damage to each unit struck. Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals less damage for each unit hit and resets when the axes reverse direction.
spells.descricao: Draven hurls two massive axes to deal 100 (+0.45/0.55/0.65/0.75/0.85) physical damage to each unit struck.Whirling Death slowly reverses direction and returns to Draven after striking an enemy champion. Draven may also activate this ability while the axes are in flight to cause it to return early. Deals 5.75% less damage for each unit hit (Minimum 65/75/85/95/105%) and resets when the axes reverse direction.
spells.name: Whirling Death

name: Yasuo
lore: An Ionian of deep resolve, Yasuo is an agile swordsman, trained to wield the air itself against his enemies. As a young man, pride led him down a path of loss, costing him his position, his mentor, and ultimately his own brother. Disgraced by false accusations and now hunted as little more than a criminal, Yasuo wanders his homeland seeking redemption for his past, with only the wind to guide his blade.
title: the Unforgiven
passiva_descricao: Yasuo's Critical Strike Chance is doubled. Additionally, Yasuo builds toward a shield whenever he is moving. The shield triggers when he takes damage from a champion or monster.

spells.sandescricao: A skillshot basic attack. After two successful Steel Tempests, the next fires a tornado that knocks enemies Airborne.
spells.descricao: Thrusts forward, dealing 20/45/70/95/120 (+1) physical damage.On hit, Steel Tempest grants a stack of Gathering Storm for 6 seconds. At 2 stacks, Steel Tempest fires a whirlwind that knocks Airborne.Steel Tempest is treated as a basic attack: It can critically strike, applies on-hit effects, is interruptible by crowd control and its cooldown and cast time are reduced by Attack Speed.If cast while dashing, Steel Tempest will strike as a circle.
spells.name: Steel Tempest

spells.sandescricao: Creates a moving wall that blocks enemy projectiles.
spells.descricao: Creates a moving wall that blocks all enemy projectiles for 4 seconds.
spells.name: Wind Wall

spells.sandescricao: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
spells.descricao: Dashes through a unit, dealing escalating Magic Damage with each cast.
spells.name: Sweeping Blade

spells.sandescricao: Moves to a unit and strikes them repeatedly for heavy damage. Can only be cast on Airborne targets.
spells.descricao: Blinks to an Airborne enemy champion, dealing 20/45/70/95/120 (+1) physical damage and holding all Airborne enemies in the area in the air for an additional 1 second. Grants maximum Flow but resets all stacks of Gathering Storm.For 15 seconds, Yasuo's critical strikes gain 0% Bonus Armor Penetration - this affects Armor from items, buffs, runes and masteries.
spells.name: Last Breath

name: Kayle
lore: A great hero and the strongest among her kind, Kayle is an angelic warrior dedicated to purging those beyond redemption. After conflict divided her people, she took up her enchanted armor and flaming sword in the name of order, disowning her very flesh and blood in the process. When Kayle descends upon the field of battle, her justice is swift—for none can escape the light of divine and righteous fury.
title: The Judicator
passiva_descricao: When Kayle attacks a champion, the target loses 3% Armor and Magic Resist for 5 seconds. This effect stacks up to 5 times.

spells.sandescricao: Blasts an enemy unit with angelic force, dealing damage, slowing Movement Speed, and applying Holy Fervor.
spells.descricao: Blasts an enemy, dealing 60/110/160/210/260 (+1) (+1/0.6) magic damage, slowing their Movement Speed by 35/40/45/50/55% for 3 seconds, and applying a stack of Holy Fervor.
spells.name: Reckoning

spells.sandescricao: Blesses a target friendly champion, granting them increased Movement Speed and healing them.
spells.descricao: Blesses an allied champion, increasing their Movement Speed by 35/40/45/50/55% (+1%) for 3 seconds and healing them for 60/110/160/210/260 (+1/0.6) Health.
spells.name: Divine Blessing

spells.sandescricao: Passive: Grants Kayle on Hit magic Damage. Activate: Ignite Kayle's sword with a holy flame, granting Kayle a ranged attack that damages multiple enemies and deals bonus magic damage.
spells.descricao: Passive: Kayle's Basic Attacks deal an additional 0 (+1) magic damage on hit.Active: Kayle increases her Attack Range by 400 for 10 seconds and the passive bonus is increased to 60/110/160/210/260 (+1/0.6) magic damage and apply spell effects on hit.In addition, deals 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.15/0.3/0.2/0.25/0.3/0.35/0.4) (+0.07/0.45) magic damage and applies spell effects on attack to enemies near her target.
spells.name: Righteous Fury

spells.sandescricao: Shields Kayle or an ally for a short time, causing them to be immune to damage.
spells.descricao: Bathes Kayle's target in a holy light, rendering them immune to all damage for 60/110/160/210/260 seconds.
spells.name: Intervention

name: Shaco
lore: Crafted long ago as a plaything for a lonely prince, the enchanted marionette Shaco now delights in murder and mayhem. Corrupted by dark magic and the loss of his beloved charge, the once-kind puppet finds pleasure only in the misery of the poor souls he torments. He uses toys and simple tricks to deadly effect, finding the results of his bloody “games” hilarious—and for those who hear a dark chuckle in the dead of night, the Demon Jester may have marked them as his next plaything.
title: the Demon Jester
passiva_descricao: Shaco's basic attack critically strikes for extra damage when striking a unit from behind. Units can't be Backstabbed more than once every few seconds, modified by Shaco's cooldown reduction.

spells.sandescricao: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.
spells.descricao: Shaco becomes Invisible and teleports to target location.
spells.name: Deceive

spells.sandescricao: Shaco creates a hidden animated Jack-in-the-Box. When triggered, it will fear and attack nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Shaco creates a Jack in the Box that hides from view after 400 seconds. It pops out when an enemy comes near or when uncovered by a ward or trinket, making nearby enemies flee very slowly for 1.5/2.25/3/3.75/4.5 seconds.Its attacks deal 0 (+0.2) magic damage. It lasts for 6 (+0.2/0.05) seconds while hidden or 5 seconds while firing.
spells.name: Jack In The Box

spells.sandescricao: Shaco's Shivs passively poison targets on hit, slowing their movement speed. He can throw his Shivs to deal damage and poison the target. The thrown Shiv deals bonus damage based on the target's missing Health.
spells.descricao: Passive: While Two-Shiv Poison is ready to cast, Shaco's basic attacks reduce the target's movement speed by 6% for 400 seconds.Active: Shaco throws a shiv that deals 0 (+1) (+0.2) physical damage and reduces the target's movement speed by 60% for 2.5 seconds. The shiv's damage is increased by up to 1.5/2.25/3/3.75/4.5% based on the target's missing health.
spells.name: Two-Shiv Poison

spells.sandescricao: Shaco creates an illusion of himself near him, which can attack nearby enemies (Deals reduced damage to turrets). Upon death, it explodes, spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes and dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Shaco vanishes briefly and reappears with a clone. The clone lasts up to 18 seconds and detonates when it dies, dealing 0 (+0.2) magic damage to nearby enemies and spawning three mini Jack in the Boxes. Mini boxes deal 2.5 (+0.2/0.05) damage, make enemies flee for 0 second(s), and trigger together. Clone deals 2.5% of Shaco's damage and receives 200% increased damage.The clone can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.
spells.name: Hallucinate

name: Renekton
lore: Renekton is a terrifying, rage-fueled Ascended being from the scorched deserts of Shurima. Once, he was his empire's most esteemed warrior, leading the nation's armies to countless victories. However, after the empire's fall, Renekton was entombed beneath the sands, and slowly, as the world turned and changed, he succumbed to insanity. Now free once more, he is utterly consumed with finding and killing his brother, Nasus, who he blames, in his madness, for the centuries he spent in darkness.
title: the Butcher of the Sands
passiva_descricao: Renekton gains Fury for every autoattack he makes. This Fury can empower his abilities with bonus effects. Additionally, Renekton gains bonus Fury when he is low on life.

spells.sandescricao: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
spells.descricao: Renekton swings his blade, dealing moderate physical damage to all targets around him, and heals for a small portion of the damage dealt. If he has more than 50 Fury, his damage and heal are increased.
spells.name: Cull the Meek

spells.sandescricao: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
spells.descricao: Renekton slashes his target twice, dealing moderate physical damage and stuns them for 0.75 seconds. If Renekton has more than 50 Fury, he slashes his target three times, dealing high physical damage and stuns them for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Ruthless Predator

spells.sandescricao: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
spells.descricao: Renekton dashes, dealing damage to units along the way. Empowered, Renekton deals bonus damage and reduces the Armor of units hit.
spells.name: Slice and Dice

spells.sandescricao: Renekton transforms into the Tyrant form, gaining bonus Health and dealing damage to enemies around him. While in this form, Renekton gains Fury periodically.
spells.descricao: Renekton surrounds himself with dark energies for 300 seconds, gaining 65/95/125/155/185 Health and 95/140/185/230/275 Fury. While active, he deals 3/4.5/6/7.5/9 (+0.8) magic damage to nearby enemies and gains 50/75/100/125/150 Fury per second.
spells.name: Dominus

name: Hecarim
lore: Hecarim is a spectral fusion of man and beast, cursed to ride down the souls of the living for all eternity. When the Blessed Isles fell into shadow, this proud knight was obliterated by the destructive energies of the Ruination, along with all his cavalry and their mounts. Now, whenever the Black Mist reaches out across Runeterra, he leads their devastating charge, reveling in the slaughter and crushing the foe beneath his armored hooves.
title: the Shadow of War
passiva_descricao: Hecarim gains Attack Damage equal to a percentage of his bonus Movement Speed.

spells.sandescricao: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies dealing physical damage.
spells.descricao: Hecarim cleaves nearby enemies for 55/90/125/160/195 (+0.6) physical damage. (66% damage to minions)If Hecarim damages at least one enemy with this attack he gains a stack of Rampage, reducing the base cooldown of this skill by 1 second for a short duration. This effect can stack up to 2 times.
spells.name: Rampage

spells.sandescricao: Hecarim deals magic damage to nearby enemies for a short duration. Hecarim gains Health equal to a percentage of any damage those enemies suffer.
spells.descricao: Hecarim deals 2 (+0.8) magic damage over 1 seconds to all nearby enemies. Hecarim is healed for 55/90/125/160/195% of the damage these enemies take from any source.Hecarim cannot heal more than 3 Health from minions or monsters.
spells.name: Spirit of Dread

spells.sandescricao: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for a short duration. His next attack knocks the target back and deals additional physical damage based on the distance he has traveled since activating the ability.
spells.descricao: Hecarim gains increasing Movement Speed and can move through units for 66 seconds. His next attack knocks the target back dealing 3 (+0.8) to 1 (+0.5/1) physical damage based on how far Hecarim has traveled during Devastating Charge (knockback distance also scales).Devastating Charge's remaining duration pauses during Onslaught of Shadows.
spells.name: Devastating Charge

spells.sandescricao: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing magic damage in a line. Hecarim creates a shockwave when he finishes his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee in terror.
spells.descricao: Hecarim summons spectral riders and charges forward, dealing 55/90/125/160/195 (+0.8) magic damage to enemies hit. Hecarim releases a shockwave at the end of his charge, causing nearby enemies to flee from him for 2 to 1 seconds (increases by charge distance).Hecarim himself will only move to the targeted location. The riders will always move the full distance.
spells.name: Onslaught of Shadows

name: Fizz
lore: Fizz is an amphibious yordle, who dwells among the reefs surrounding Bilgewater. He often retrieves and returns the tithes cast into the sea by superstitious captains, but even the saltiest of sailors know better than to cross him—many are the tales of those who have underestimated this slippery character. Often mistaken for some manner of capricious ocean spirit, he commands the huge, carnivorous beasts of the deep, and delights in confounding his allies and enemies alike.
title: the Tidal Trickster
passiva_descricao: Fizz's dexterity allows him to move through units and take less physical damage from basic attacks.

spells.sandescricao: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing magic damage and applying on hit effects.
spells.descricao: Fizz dashes through his target, dealing 1 physical damage plus 10/25/40/55/70 (+1/0.55) magic damage. This spell applies on-hit effects. Seastone Trident is applied to all enemy units Fizz passes through during his dash.
spells.name: Urchin Strike

spells.sandescricao: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage, increased by how long the bleed was active on his target.
spells.descricao: Fizz's attacks bleed his enemies, dealing magic damage over several seconds. Fizz can empower his next attack to deal bonus damage, increased by how long the bleed was active on his target.
spells.name: Seastone Trident

spells.sandescricao: Fizz hops into the air, landing gracefully upon his spear and becoming untargetable. From this position, Fizz can either slam the ground or choose to jump again before smashing back down.
spells.descricao: Fizz hops on his trident towards the cursor, becoming briefly untargetable.Reactivation: Fizz cancels the spell early, jumping towards the cursor a second time and dealing 10/25/40/55/70 (+1/0.55) magic damage to nearby enemies.If Fizz does not reactivate, he deals damage in a larger area and slows all enemies hit by 0% for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Playful / Trickster

spells.sandescricao: Fizz tosses a fish in a direction that attaches to any champion that touches it, slowing the target. After a short delay, a shark erupts from the ground, knocking up the target and knocking any nearby enemies aside. All enemies hit are dealt magic damage and slowed.
spells.descricao: Fizz launches a fish that attaches to the first enemy champion it hits, slowing them, granting True Sight, and attracting a shark. After 40 seconds, the shark erupts out of the ground, knocking its target up and knocking other enemies aside.The farther the fish travels before attaching, the bigger the shark it attracts, dealing 10/25/40/55/70 (+1/0.55) to 650/750/850/950/1050 (+1) magic damage and slowing by 40% to 80%.Seastone Trident applies to the champion the fish attaches to and targets hit by the shark.
spells.name: Chum the Waters

name: Kog'Maw
lore: Belched forth from a rotting Void incursion deep in the wastelands of Icathia, Kog'Maw is an inquisitive yet putrid creature with a caustic, gaping mouth. This particular Void-spawn needs to gnaw and drool on anything within reach to truly understand it. Though not inherently evil, Kog'Maw's beguiling naiveté is dangerous, as it often precedes a feeding frenzy—not for sustenance, but to satisfy its unending curiosity.
title: the Mouth of the Abyss
passiva_descricao: Upon dying, Kog'Maw starts a chain reaction in his body which causes him to move faster and detonate after 4 seconds; dealing 100 + (25 x lvl) true damage to surrounding enemies.

spells.sandescricao: Kog'Maw launches a corrosive projectile which deals magic damage and corrodes the target's armor and magic resist for a short time. Kog'Maw also gains additional attack speed.
spells.descricao: Passive:  Kog'Maw gains 15/20/25/30/35% bonus attack speed.Active: Launches a corrosive projectile that deals 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.5) Magic Damage to the first enemy hit and shreds its Armor and Magic Resist by 20/22/24/26/28% for 4 seconds.
spells.name: Caustic Spittle

spells.sandescricao: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
spells.descricao: Kog'Maw's attacks gain range and deal a percent of the target's maximum health as magic damage.
spells.name: Bio-Arcane Barrage

spells.sandescricao: Kog'Maw launches a peculiar ooze which damages all enemies it passes through and leaves a trail which slows enemies who stand on it.
spells.descricao: Deals 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.5) Magic Damage to enemies hit and leaves a trail on the ground for 20/22/24/26/28 seconds, slowing enemies in it by 15/20/25/30/35%.
spells.name: Void Ooze

spells.sandescricao: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
spells.descricao: Kog'Maw fires an artillery shell at a great distance dealing magic damage (increased significantly on low health enemies) and revealing non-stealthed targets. Additionally, multiple Living Artilleries in a short period of time cause them to cost additional Mana.
spells.name: Living Artillery

name: Maokai
lore: Maokai is a rageful, towering treant who fights the unnatural horrors of the Shadow Isles. He was twisted into a force of vengeance after a magical cataclysm destroyed his home, surviving undeath only through the Waters of Life infused within his heartwood. Once a peaceful nature spirit, Maokai now furiously battles to banish the scourge of unlife from the Shadow Isles and restore his home to its former beauty.
title: the Twisted Treant
passiva_descricao: Maokai's basic attack also heal him on a moderate cooldown. Each time Maokai casts a spell or is struck by an enemy's spell, this cooldown is reduced.

spells.sandescricao: Maokai knocks back nearby enemies with a shockwave, dealing magic damage and slowing them.
spells.descricao: Maokai smashes his fist into the ground, releasing a shockwave. Nearby enemies are knocked away from him and all affected enemies take 65/105/145/185/225 (+0.4) magic damage and are slowed briefly.
spells.name: Bramble Smash

spells.sandescricao: Maokai contorts into a mass of moving roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target. Upon arrival, he roots the target.
spells.descricao: Maokai transforms into a moving mass of roots, becoming untargetable and dashing to the target.Upon arrival, he deals 65/105/145/185/225 (+0.4) magic damage and roots the target for 325 second(s).
spells.name: Twisted Advance

spells.sandescricao: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
spells.descricao: Maokai flings a sapling to the target area to stand guard. More effective in brush.
spells.name: Sapling Toss

spells.sandescricao: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, damaging and rooting any enemies in the path.
spells.descricao: Maokai summons a colossal wall of brambles and thorns that slowly advances forwards, dealing 65/105/145/185/225 (+0.4) magic damage and rooting any enemies struck for (325 to 1/1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4) seconds, increasing with distance travelled.
spells.name: Nature's Grasp

name: Lissandra
lore: Lissandra's magic twists the pure power of ice into something dark and terrible. With the force of her black ice, she does more than freeze—she impales and crushes those who oppose her. To the terrified denizens of the north, she is known only as ''The Ice Witch.'' The truth is much more sinister: Lissandra is a corruptor of nature who plots to unleash an ice age on the world.
title: the Ice Witch
passiva_descricao: Every several seconds Lissandra's next ability costs no Mana. This cooldown is reduced whenever Lissandra impairs an enemy's movement with an ability (does not apply to movement-impairing effects from items).

spells.sandescricao: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing Movement Speed. Shards pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
spells.descricao: Throws a spear of ice that shatters when it hits an enemy, dealing 70/100/130/160/190 (+0.7) magic damage and slowing Movement Speed by 16/19/22/25/28% for 1.5 seconds. Shards then pass through the target, dealing the same damage to other enemies hit.
spells.name: Ice Shard

spells.sandescricao: Freezes nearby enemies in ice, dealing magic damage and rooting them.
spells.descricao: Deals 70/100/130/160/190 (+0.7) magic damage to nearby enemies and roots them for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Ring of Frost

spells.sandescricao: Lissandra creates an ice claw that deals magic damage. Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
spells.descricao: Casts an ice claw that deals 70/100/130/160/190 (+0.7) magic damage to enemies hit.Reactivating this ability transports Lissandra to the claw's current location.
spells.name: Glacial Path

spells.sandescricao: If cast on an enemy champion, the target is frozen solid, stunning it. If cast on Lissandra, she encases herself in dark ice, healing herself while becoming untargetable and invulnerable. Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing magic damage to enemies and slowing Movement Speed.
spells.descricao: On Enemy Cast: Freezes target champion solid, stunning it for 0 seconds.On Self Cast: Lissandra encases herself in dark ice for 0 seconds, healing for 0 (+0.3), increased by 0% for each 0% Health she is missing. During this time Lissandra is untargetable and invulnerable but is unable to take any actions.Dark ice then emanates from the target dealing 70/100/130/160/190 (+0.7) magic damage to enemies. The ice lasts for 16/19/22/25/28 seconds and slows enemy Movement Speed by 1.5%.
spells.name: Frozen Tomb

name: Jinx
lore: A manic and impulsive criminal from Zaun, Jinx lives to wreak havoc without care for the consequences. With an arsenal of deadly weapons, she unleashes the loudest blasts and brightest explosions to leave a trail of mayhem and panic in her wake. Jinx despises boredom, and gleefully brings her own chaotic brand of pandemonium wherever she goes.
title: the Loose Cannon
passiva_descricao: Jinx receives massively increased Movement Speed and stacking Attack Speed whenever she damages an enemy champion, tower, or inhibitor that is then killed or destroyed within 3 seconds.

spells.sandescricao: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
spells.descricao: Jinx modifies her basic attacks by swapping between Pow-Pow, her minigun and Fishbones, her rocket launcher. Attacks with Pow-Pow grant Attack Speed, while attacks with Fishbones deal area of effect damage, gain increased range, and drain Mana.
spells.name: Switcheroo!

spells.sandescricao: Jinx uses Zapper, her shock pistol, to fire a blast that deals damage to the first enemy hit, slowing and revealing it.
spells.descricao: Jinx fires a shock blast that deals 30/40/50/60/70 (+1.4) Physical Damage to the first enemy hit, revealing it and slowing it by 100% for 2 seconds.
spells.name: Zap!

spells.sandescricao: Jinx throws out a line of snare grenades that explode after 5 seconds, lighting enemies on fire. Flame Chompers will bite enemy champions who walk over them, rooting them in place.
