spells.descricao: Jinx tosses out 3 chompers that, once armed, explode on contact with enemy champions, rooting the target for 1.5 seconds and stopping in-progress movement abilities on the spot before dealing 30/40/50/60/70 (+1.4) Magic Damage over 1.5 seconds to nearby enemies. Chompers last for 5 seconds.
spells.name: Flame Chompers!

spells.sandescricao: Jinx fires a super rocket across the map that gains damage as it travels. The rocket will explode upon colliding with an enemy champion, dealing damage to it and surrounding enemies based on their missing Health.
spells.descricao: Jinx fires a rocket that gains damage over the first second it travels. It explodes on the first enemy champion hit, dealing 30/40/50/60/70 (+1.4) to 100 (+0.15/1.5) Physical Damage plus 75/100/125/150/175% of the target's missing Health. Nearby enemies take 80% Damage.
spells.name: Super Mega Death Rocket!

name: Urgot
lore: Once a powerful Noxian headsman, Urgot was betrayed by the empire for which he had killed so many. Bound in iron chains, he was forced to learn the true meaning of strength in the Dredge—a prison mine deep beneath Zaun. Emerging in a disaster that spread chaos throughout the city, he now casts an imposing shadow over its criminal underworld. Raising his victims on the very chains that once enslaved him, he will purge his new home of the unworthy, making it a crucible of pain.
title: the Dreadnought
passiva_descricao: Urgot's basic attacks and Purge periodically trigger blasts of flame from his legs, dealing physical damage.

spells.sandescricao: Fires an explosive charge at the target location, dealing physical damage and slowing enemies caught in the explosion.
spells.descricao: Urgot fires an explosive charge, dealing 25/70/115/160/205 (+0.7) physical damage and slowing enemies hit by 45/50/55/60/65% for 1 second.
spells.name: Corrosive Charge

spells.sandescricao: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
spells.descricao: Urgot shields himself, slowing himself while he unloads his weapon on nearby enemies. Prioritizes enemy champions Urgot has recently struck with other abilities and triggers Echoing Flames.
spells.name: Purge

spells.sandescricao: Urgot charges in a direction, trampling non-champion enemies. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them out of his way.
spells.descricao: Urgot charges forwards. If he catches an enemy champion, he will stop and hurl them behind him, dealing 0.1 (+0.7) physical damage and stunning them for 0.3 seconds.Non-champions take the same damage but are knocked aside.Cannot cross terrain.
spells.name: Disdain

spells.sandescricao: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
spells.descricao: Urgot fires a chem-drill that impales the first enemy champion hit. If that champion falls below a health threshold, Urgot judges them weak and can execute them.
spells.name: Fear Beyond Death

name: Fiddlesticks
lore: Fiddlesticks is a ghastly, living scarecrow who stalks the darkness, wielding a cruel scythe and preying upon the unwary. Once a lonely man accused of bringing famine to his village, he was tied up and left to starve in his own barren field. Resurrected by the savage murder of crows that fed on his remains, Fiddlesticks now relishes terrorizing his victims before claiming their lives amid a flurry of feathers and blood-splattered beaks.
title: the Harbinger of Doom
passiva_descricao: Standing still or channeling abilities for 1.5 seconds empowers Fiddlesticks with Dread. Immobilizing crowd control resets this timer. Dread grants Movement Speed, but only lasts for 1.5s after Fiddlesticks starts moving.

spells.sandescricao: Strikes a target unit with fear, causing it to flee in terror for a duration.
spells.descricao: Terrifies a target, causing it to flee from Fiddlesticks for 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 seconds.
spells.name: Terrify

spells.sandescricao: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
spells.descricao: Fiddlesticks saps the life force of an enemy, dealing damage to a target over time and healing himself.
spells.name: Drain

spells.sandescricao: A wisp of wind strikes an enemy unit and then bounces to nearby enemy units, dealing damage and silencing the victims.
spells.descricao: Unleashes a Crow at the targeted enemy, dealing 1.25/1.5/1.75/2/2.25 (+0.45) magic damage before bouncing to another target. Units struck are also silenced for 0 seconds the first time per cast.Dark Wind can strike up to 0 times and will prioritize enemies being Drained or ones it has not yet hit. Deals 0% damage to minions and monsters.
spells.name: Dark Wind

spells.sandescricao: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
spells.descricao: A murder of crows flock wildly around Fiddlesticks, dealing damage per second to all enemy units in the area.
spells.name: Crowstorm

name: Galio
lore: Outside the gleaming city of Demacia, the stone colossus Galio keeps vigilant watch. Built as a bulwark against enemy mages, he often stands motionless for decades until the presence of powerful magic stirs him to life. Once activated, Galio makes the most of his time, savoring the thrill of a fight and the rare honor of defending his countrymen. But his triumphs are always bittersweet, for the magic he destroys is also his source of reanimation, and each victory leaves him dormant once again.
title: the Colossus
passiva_descricao: Every few seconds, Galio's next basic attack deals bonus magic damage in an area. Colossal Smash's cooldown is reduced when Galio hits champions with his spells.

spells.sandescricao: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
spells.descricao: Galio fires two windblasts that converge into a large tornado.
spells.name: Winds of War

spells.sandescricao: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Galio charges a defensive stance, moving slowly. Upon releasing the charge, Galio will taunt and damage nearby enemies.
spells.name: Shield of Durand

spells.sandescricao: Galio will briefly step back and charge, knocking up the first enemy champion he encounters.
spells.descricao: Galio lunges forward with a mighty blow, dealing 50/80/110/140/170 (+0.8) magic damage to enemies and knocking them into the air for 1 seconds. Galio will stop upon hitting a champion or terrain.
spells.name: Justice Punch

spells.sandescricao: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Galio grants damage reduction to an ally. After a delay Galio smashes down on the ally's original location, knocking up nearby enemies.
spells.name: Hero's Entrance

name: Pantheon
lore: The peerless warrior known as Pantheon is a nigh-unstoppable paragon of battle. He was born among the Rakkor, a warlike people living on the flanks of Mount Targon, and after climbing the mountain's treacherous peak and being deemed worthy, he was chosen to become the earthly incarnation of the celestial Aspect of War. Imbued with inhuman power, he relentlessly seeks the enemies of Targon, leaving only corpses in his wake.
title: the Artisan of War
passiva_descricao: After attacking or casting spells 4 times, Pantheon will block the next incoming basic attack or turret attack.

spells.sandescricao: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing damage.
spells.descricao: Pantheon hurls his spear at an opponent, dealing 75/110/155/195/235 (+1.4) physical damage.
spells.name: Spear Shot

spells.sandescricao: Pantheon leaps at an enemy and bashes them with his shield, stunning them. After finishing the attack, Pantheon readies himself to block the next attack.
spells.descricao: Pantheon leaps at target enemy, dealing 100/115/130/145/160 (+1) magic damage and stunning them for 75/110/155/195/235 second. Pantheon also instantly refreshes his Aegis Protection.
spells.name: Aegis of Zeonia

spells.sandescricao: Pantheon focuses and unleashes 3 swift strikes to the area in front of him dealing damage to all enemies. Pantheon also becomes more aware of his enemy's vital spots, allowing him to always crit enemies below 15% Health.
spells.descricao: Passive: Pantheon's basic attacks and Spear Shot gain 100% critical strike chance against targets below 0% Health.Active: Pantheon focuses and delivers 0 swift strikes in front of him for a total of 100/115/130/145/160 (+1) physical damage (deals 75/110/155/195/235% damage to minions and monsters).Damage per Strike: 1.4
spells.name: Heartseeker Strike

spells.sandescricao: Pantheon composes himself then leaps into the air to a target, striking all enemy units in an area. Enemies closer to the impact point take more damage.
spells.descricao: Pantheon gathers his strength and then leaps high into the air, crashing down at target area a few seconds later. Deals up to 100/115/130/145/160 (+1) magic damage to enemies at the center (down to 0% at the edge) and slows their Movement Speed by 0% for 1 second.If Pantheon cancels this channel, Grand Skyfall is put on a 0 second cooldown.
spells.name: Grand Skyfall

name: Talon
lore: Talon is the knife in the darkness, a merciless killer able to strike without warning and escape before any alarm is raised. He carved out a dangerous reputation on the brutal streets of Noxus, where he was forced to fight, kill, and steal to survive. Adopted by the notorious Du Couteau family, he now plies his deadly trade at the empire's command, assassinating enemy leaders, captains, and heroes… as well as any Noxian foolish enough to earn the scorn of their masters.
title: the Blade's Shadow
passiva_descricao: Talon's spells Wound champions and epic monsters, stacking up to 3 times. When Talon attacks a champion with 3 stacks of Wound, they bleed for heavy damage over time.

spells.sandescricao: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
spells.descricao: Talon stabs the target unit. If they are within melee range, this attack deals critical damage. If they are outside melee range, Talon will leap at his target before stabbing them. Talon refunds some health and cooldown if this ability kills the target.
spells.name: Noxian Diplomacy

spells.sandescricao: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
spells.descricao: Talon sends out a volley of daggers that then return back to him, dealing physical damage every time it passes through an enemy. The returning blades deal bonus damage and slow units hit.
spells.name: Rake

spells.sandescricao: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
spells.descricao: Talon vaults over any terrain or structure, up to a max distance. This ability has a low cooldown, but puts the used terrain on a long cooldown.
spells.name: Assassin's Path

spells.sandescricao: Talon disperses a ring of blades and becomes Invisible while gaining additional Movement Speed. When Talon emerges from Invisibility, the blades converge on his location. Each time the blades move, Shadow Assault deals physical damage to enemies hit by at least one blade.
spells.descricao: Talon disperses a ring of blades that deal 65/90/115/140/165 (+1.1) physical damage to all units they hit, gains 17% increased movement speed, and becomes Invisible for up to 50 seconds. When the Invisibility ends, the blades converge, dealing the same damage again to enemies they pass through.If Talon cancels Invisibility with an attack or Noxian Diplomacy, the blades converge on his target's location instead.Stealth - Invisible: Talon can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
spells.name: Shadow Assault

name: Gangplank
lore: As unpredictable as he is brutal, the dethroned reaver king Gangplank is feared far and wide. Once, he ruled the port city of Bilgewater, and while his reign is over, there are those who believe this has only made him more dangerous. Gangplank would see Bilgewater bathed in blood once more before letting someone else take it—and now with pistol, cutlass, and barrels of gunpowder, he is determined to reclaim what he has lost.
title: the Saltwater Scourge
passiva_descricao: Every few seconds, Gangplank's melee strike will set his opponent on fire.

spells.sandescricao: Shoots target, plundering Gold for each enemy unit killed.
spells.descricao: Fires a bullet that deals 20/45/70/95/120 (+1) physical damage (can crit and applies on-hit effects).If Parrrley kills the target, Gangplank plunders 3/4/5/6/7 bonus Gold and 4/5/6/7/8 Silver Serpents. (Trade Silver Serpents at the shop to upgrade Cannon Barrage).
spells.name: Parrrley

spells.sandescricao: Eats citrus to cure crowd control effects and restore Health.
spells.descricao: Gangplank consumes a large quantity of citrus fruit, curing all disabling effects and healing him for 20/45/70/95/120 (+1) + 3/4/5/6/7% of his missing Health.
spells.name: Remove Scurvy

spells.sandescricao: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
spells.descricao: Gangplank uncovers a powder keg at target location. If he attacks it, it explodes, spreading the attack's damage to enemies in the area, slowing them.
spells.name: Powder Keg

spells.sandescricao: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
spells.descricao: Gangplank signals his ship to bombard an area, slowing and damaging enemies.
spells.name: Cannon Barrage

name: Ezreal
lore: A self-assured Piltovan explorer with an uncanny ability to find his way into and out of trouble, Ezreal travels Runeterra in search of adventure. Armed with a magical gauntlet procured from the ruins of ancient Shurima, he seeks out the world's most cryptic mysteries. Ezreal fires bolts of mystic energy, shifting through treacherous, uncharted places with a cocky grin on his face.
title: the Prodigal Explorer
passiva_descricao: Ezreal gains increasing Attack Speed each time he successfully hits a spell, stacking up to 5 times.

spells.sandescricao: Ezreal fires a damaging bolt of energy which reduces all of his cooldowns by 1.5 seconds if it strikes an enemy unit.
spells.descricao: Ezreal fires a bolt of energy, dealing 35/55/75/95/115 (+1.1) (+1.1/0.4) physical damage (applies on-hit effects). Ezreal's cooldowns are reduced by 1.5 seconds if Mystic Shot hits a target.
spells.name: Mystic Shot

spells.sandescricao: Ezreal fires a fluctuating wave of energy, dealing magic damage to enemy champions, while increasing the Attack Speed of allied champions.
spells.descricao: Ezreal fires a wave of energy that damages all enemy champions it passes through for 35/55/75/95/115 (+1.1) magic damage. If Ezreal or his Allied champions are hit by the wave, their Attack Speed is increased by 1.5% for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Essence Flux

spells.sandescricao: Ezreal teleports to a target nearby location and fires a homing bolt which strikes the nearest enemy unit.
spells.descricao: Ezreal teleports to a nearby location and fires a bolt at the nearest enemy, dealing 35/55/75/95/115 (+1.1/0.4) (+1.1) magic damage.
spells.name: Arcane Shift

spells.sandescricao: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a powerful barrage of energy missiles which do massive damage to each unit they pass through (deals 10% less damage to each unit it passes through).
spells.descricao: Ezreal winds up for 1 second to fire a long range missile that deals 35/55/75/95/115 (+1.1/0.4) (+1.1) magic damage to each enemy it passes through. Deals 1.5% less damage for each enemy hit (minimum 0%).
spells.name: Trueshot Barrage

name: Gnar
lore: Gnar is a primeval yordle whose playful antics can erupt into a toddler's outrage in an instant, transforming him into a massive beast bent on destruction. Frozen in True Ice for millennia, the curious creature broke free and now hops about a changed world he sees as exotic and wondrous. Delighted by danger, Gnar flings whatever he can at his enemies, be it his bonetooth boomerang, or a nearby building.
title: the Missing Link
passiva_descricao: While in combat Gnar generates Rage. At maximum Rage his next ability will transform him into Mega Gnar, granting increased survivability and access to new spells.

spells.sandescricao: Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced. Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
spells.descricao: Gnar throws a boomerang that damages and slows enemies it hits before returning to him. If he catches the boomerang its cooldown is reduced. Mega Gnar instead throws a boulder that stops on the first unit hit, damaging and slowing everything nearby. It can then be picked up to reduce the cooldown.
spells.name: Boomerang Throw / Boulder Toss

spells.sandescricao: Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed. Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
spells.descricao: Gnar's attacks and spells hype him up, dealing bonus damage and granting him Movement Speed. Mega Gnar is too enraged to be hyper and instead can rear up on his hind legs and smash down on the area in front of him, stunning enemies in an area.
spells.name: Hyper / Wallop

spells.sandescricao: Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further. Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
spells.descricao: Gnar leaps to a location and bounces off the head of any unit he lands on, traveling further. Mega Gnar is too large to bounce and instead lands with earth-shattering force, dealing damage in an area around him.
spells.name: Hop / Crunch

spells.sandescricao: Mega Gnar throws everything around him in a chosen direction, dealing damage and slowing them. Any enemy that hits a wall is stunned and takes bonus damage.
spells.descricao: Mini Gnar: Passive: Increases Boomerang Throw's cooldown reduction on catch to 2% and Hyper's Movement Speed bonus to 5/45/85/125/165%.Mega Gnar: Knocks nearby enemies in the specified direction, dealing 5/45/85/125/165 (+1.15) (+1.15/1.2) physical damage and slowing them by 200% for 15/20/25/30/35 seconds. Enemies that hit a wall take 50% damage and are stunned instead of slowed.
spells.name: GNAR!

name: Teemo
lore: Undeterred by even the most dangerous and threatening of obstacles, Teemo scouts the world with boundless enthusiasm and a cheerful spirit. A yordle with an unwavering sense of morality, he takes pride in following the Bandle Scout's Code, sometimes with such eagerness that he is unaware of the broader consequences of his actions. Though some say the existence of the Scouts is questionable, one thing is for certain: Teemo's conviction is nothing to be trifled with.
title: the Swift Scout
passiva_descricao: If Teemo stands still and takes no actions for a short duration, he becomes Invisible indefinitely. If he's in brush, Teemo can enter and maintain his Invisibility while moving. After leaving Invisibility, Teemo gains the Element of Surprise, increasing his Attack Speed for 3 seconds.

spells.sandescricao: Obscures an enemy's vision with a powerful venom, dealing damage to the target unit and blinding it for the duration.
spells.descricao: Deals 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.8) magic damage and blinds the target for 1.5/1.75/2/2.25/2.5 seconds.
spells.name: Blinding Dart

spells.sandescricao: Teemo scampers around, passively increasing his Movement Speed until he is struck by an enemy champion or turret. Teemo can sprint to gain bonus Movement Speed that isn't stopped by being struck for a short time.
spells.descricao: Passive: Teemo's Movement Speed is increased by 80/125/170/215/260% unless he has been damaged by an enemy champion or turret in the last 5 seconds.Active: Teemo sprints, gaining twice his normal bonus for 1.5/1.75/2/2.25/2.5 seconds. This bonus is not lost when struck.
spells.name: Move Quick

spells.sandescricao: Each of Teemo's attacks will poison the target, dealing damage on impact and each second after for 4 seconds.
spells.descricao: Teemo's basic attacks poison their target, dealing 1.5/1.75/2/2.25/2.5 (+0.8) magical damage upon impact and 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.3/0.1) magical damage each second for 1 seconds.
spells.name: Toxic Shot

spells.sandescricao: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
spells.descricao: Teemo throws an explosive poisonous trap using one of the mushrooms stored in his pack. If an enemy steps on the trap, it will release a poisonous cloud, slowing enemies and damaging them over time. If Teemo throws a mushroom onto another mushroom it will bounce, gaining additional range.
spells.name: Noxious Trap

name: Annie
lore: Dangerous, yet disarmingly precocious, Annie is a child mage with immense pyrokinetic power. Even in the shadows of the mountains north of Noxus, she is a magical outlier. Her natural affinity for fire manifested early in life through unpredictable, emotional outbursts, though she eventually learned to control these “tricks.” Her favorite includes the summoning of her beloved teddy bear, Tibbers, as a fiery beast hellbent on destruction. Lost in the perpetual innocence of childhood, Annie wanders the dark forests, always looking for someone to play with.
title: the Dark Child
passiva_descricao: After casting 4 spells, Annie's next offensive spell will stun the target for a short duration.

spells.sandescricao: Annie hurls a Mana infused fireball, dealing damage and refunding the Mana cost if it destroys the target.
spells.descricao: Deals 80/115/150/185/220 (+0.8) magic damage. Mana cost and half the cooldown are refunded if Disintegrate kills the target.
spells.name: Disintegrate

spells.sandescricao: Annie casts a blazing cone of fire, dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
spells.descricao: Casts a cone of fire dealing 80/115/150/185/220 (+0.8) magic damage to all enemies in the area.
spells.name: Incinerate

spells.sandescricao: Grants Annie and Tibbers increased percentage Damage Resist and damages enemies who attack with basic attacks.
spells.descricao: Annie grants herself and Tibbers 80/115/150/185/220% damage reduction for 0 seconds.While the shield is active, enemies who basic attack it take 0 (+0.8) magic damage.
spells.name: Molten Shield

spells.sandescricao: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
spells.descricao: Annie wills her bear Tibbers to life, dealing damage to units in the area. Tibbers can attack and also burns enemies that stand near him.
spells.name: Summon: Tibbers

name: Mordekaiser
lore: The baleful revenant Mordekaiser is among the most terrifying and hateful spirits haunting the Shadow Isles. He has existed for countless centuries, shielded from true death by necromantic sorcery and the force of his own dark will. Those who dare face Mordekaiser in battle risk a horrific curse: He enslaves his victims' souls to become instruments of destruction.
title: the Iron Revenant
passiva_descricao: A percent of the damage dealt from abilities is converted into a temporary shield, absorbing incoming damage.

spells.sandescricao: Mordekaiser's next three attacks deal escalating bonus damage.
spells.descricao: Mordekaiser's next three attacks deal escalating bonus damage.
spells.name: Mace of Spades

spells.sandescricao: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each unit's movement speed toward one another. While near one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.
spells.descricao: Coats an ally in magnetic metal, increasing each unit's movement speed toward one another. While near one another, the metal swirls violently dealing damage per second to enemies.
spells.name: Harvesters of Sorrow

spells.sandescricao: Mordekaiser deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. For each unit hit, Mordekaiser's shield absorbs energy.
spells.descricao: Mordekaiser deals 10/20/30/40/50 (+0.9) (+0.6) magic damage in a cone.For each Champion hit, he gains 30/60/90/120/150% maximum shield.
spells.name: Siphon of Destruction

spells.sandescricao: Mordekaiser curses an enemy champion or the Dragon, stealing a percent of their life initially and each second. If the target dies while the spell is active, their soul is enslaved and will follow Mordekaiser as a ghost.
spells.descricao: Passive - Dragon Force: Damaging the Dragon will Curse it for 10 seconds.Active: Curse target Champion and steal 132/181.5/231/280.5/330% (+0.9%) of their maximum health (25% initially, 75% over 10 seconds; deals magic damage).Curse Effect: When killed by Mordekaiser's team, the Cursed unit's soul will follow Mordekaiser for 2 seconds. Mordekaiser gains 0.5/0.6/0.7/0.8/0.9% of their ability power and 0.6% of their bonus health. The ghost gains (+1.65) attack damage and (+1.65/1) health.The ghost can be controlled by holding the alt key and using the right mouse button or by reactivating this ability.
spells.name: Children of the Grave

name: Azir
lore: Azir was a mortal emperor of Shurima in a far distant age, a proud man who stood at the cusp of immortality. His hubris saw him betrayed and murdered at the moment of his greatest triumph, but now, millennia later, he has been reborn as an Ascended being of immense power. With his buried city risen from the sand, Azir seeks to restore Shurima to its former glory.
title: the Emperor of the Sands
passiva_descricao: Azir can summon the Disc of the Sun from the ruins of allied or enemy turrets.

spells.sandescricao: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a slow for 1 second.
spells.descricao: Azir sends all Sand Soldiers towards a location. Sand Soldiers deal 70/95/120/145/170 (+0.3) magic damage to enemies they pass through and apply a 25% slow for 1 second.Enemies hit by multiple Sand Soldiers will not take additional damage.
spells.name: Conquering Sands

spells.sandescricao: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
spells.descricao: Azir summons a Sand Soldier to attack nearby targets for him, replacing his basic attack against targets within the soldier's range. Their attacks deal magic damage to enemies in a line. Arise! also passively grants attack speed to Azir and his Sand Soldiers.
spells.name: Arise!

spells.sandescricao: Azir shields himself briefly and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies. If he hits an enemy champion, he instantly readies a new Sand Soldier for deployment and halts his dash.
spells.descricao: Azir shields himself for 200 seconds, blocking up to 70 (+0.7) damage and dashes to one of his Sand Soldiers, damaging enemies hit for 11/9.5/8/6.5/5 (+0.3) magic damage.If Azir hits an enemy champion, he halts his dash and instantly prepares a new Sand Soldier.
spells.name: Shifting Sands

spells.sandescricao: Azir summons a wall of soldiers which charge forward, knocking back and damaging enemies.
spells.descricao: Azir summons a wall of armored soldiers that charge forward, knocking back enemies and dealing 70/95/120/145/170 (+0.3) magic damage. The soldiers then remain as a wall for 70 seconds.Azir and his allies can pass freely through Emperor's Divide.Emperor's Divide does not interact with Azir's basic attacks or spells.
spells.name: Emperor's Divide

name: Kennen
lore: More than just the lightning-quick enforcer of Ionian balance, Kennen is the only yordle member of the Kinkou. Despite his small, furry stature, he is eager to take on any threat with a whirling storm of shuriken and boundless enthusiasm. Alongside his master Shen, Kennen patrols the spirit realm, employing devastating electrical energy to strike down his enemies.
title: the Heart of the Tempest
passiva_descricao: Kennen's abilities add one stack of Mark of the Storm to their target for 6 seconds. If the target reaches 3 stacks, it is stunned for 1.25 seconds and Kennen gains 25 Energy. The stun will be a diminished duration of 0.5 seconds if it occurs again within 6 seconds.

spells.sandescricao: Kennen throws a fast moving shuriken towards a location, causing damage and adding a Mark of the Storm to any opponent that it hits.
spells.descricao: Throws a shuriken that deals 75/115/155/195/235 (+0.75) magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
spells.name: Thundering Shuriken

spells.sandescricao: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
spells.descricao: Kennen passively deals extra damage and adds a Mark of the Storm to his target every few attacks, and he can activate this ability to damage and add another Mark of the Storm to targets who are already marked.
spells.name: Electrical Surge

spells.sandescricao: Kennen morphs into a lightning form, enabling him to pass through units. Each enemy unit he touches takes damage and receives a Mark of the Storm.
spells.descricao: Kennen doubles his base movement speed and ignores unit collision for 2 seconds, dealing 75/115/155/195/235 (+0.75) magic damage to any enemy he passes through. Additionally, Kennen will gain 0 Armor and Magic Resist for 4 seconds.Kennen gains 40 Energy the first time he passes through an enemy.Lightning Rush deals half damage to minions.
spells.name: Lightning Rush

spells.sandescricao: Kennen summons a storm that strikes at nearby enemy champions for magical damage.
spells.descricao: Summons a magical storm for 0 seconds that deals 75/115/155/195/235 (+0.75) magic damage to all enemies near Kennen every 0 seconds. Each maelstrom hit applies Mark of the Storm, up to a maximum of 3.Successive maelstrom hits against the same enemy deal an additional 0% damage for each hit they've already suffered from this storm.
spells.name: Slicing Maelstrom

name: Riven
lore: Once a leader in the warhosts of Noxus, Riven is an expatriate in a land she previously tried to conquer. She rose through the ranks on the strength of her conviction and her brutal efficiency, and was rewarded with a legendary runic blade—however, on the Ionian front, Riven's faith in her homeland was tested and ultimately broken. Having severed all ties to the empire, she now wanders with her shattered sword, seeking atonement for a past she cannot forgive.
title: the Exile
passiva_descricao: Riven's abilities charge her blade, causing her basic attacks to deal bonus physical damage. Riven's blade may be charged up to three times and expends one charge per attack.

spells.sandescricao: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Riven lashes out in a series of strikes. This ability can be reactivated three times in a short time frame with the third hit knocking back nearby enemies.
spells.name: Broken Wings

spells.sandescricao: Riven emits a Ki Burst, damaging and stunning nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Riven's sword emits a burst of runic energy that shocks nearby enemies, dealing 15/35/55/75/95 (+0.4/0.45/0.5/0.55/0.6) physical damage and stunning them for 45/50/55/60/65 seconds.
spells.name: Ki Burst

spells.sandescricao: Riven steps forward a short distance and blocks incoming damage.
spells.descricao: Riven does a quick dash in the direction of your cursor and becomes shielded, blocking up to 30/55/80/105/130 (+0.4/0.45/0.5/0.55/0.6) incoming damage for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Valor

spells.sandescricao: Riven empowers her keepsake weapon with energy, and gains Attack Damage and Range. During this time, she also gains the ability to use Wind Slash, a powerful ranged attack, once.
spells.descricao: Riven's weapon surges with spiritual energy for 2 seconds, granting her 45/50/55/60/65% extra Attack Damage (+0.2), increased Range on her damaging spells and attacks, and the ability to use Wind Slash once.Wind Slash: Riven fires a shockwave that deals from 15/35/55/75/95 (+0.4/0.45/0.5/0.55/0.6) to 30/55/80/105/130 (+0.2/0.6/1.8) physical damage to all enemies hit, increasing based on how much Health they are missing.
spells.name: Blade of the Exile

name: Cho'Gath
lore: From the moment Cho'Gath first emerged into the harsh light of Runeterra's sun, the beast was driven by the most pure and insatiable hunger. A perfect expression of the Void's desire to consume all life, Cho'Gath's complex biology quickly converts matter into new bodily growth—increasing its muscle mass and density, or hardening its outer carapace like organic diamond. When growing larger does not suit the Void-spawn's needs, it vomits out the excess material as razor-sharp spines, leaving prey skewered and ready to feast upon later.
title: the Terror of the Void
passiva_descricao: Whenever Cho'Gath kills a unit, he recovers Health and Mana. The values restored increase with Cho'Gath's level.

spells.sandescricao: Ruptures the ground at target location, popping enemy units into the air, dealing damage and slowing them.
spells.descricao: Ruptures the ground at target location. Enemies caught in the rupture are launched into the air for 1 second, take 80/135/190/245/300 (+1) magic damage, and are slowed by 60% for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Rupture

spells.sandescricao: Cho'Gath unleashes a terrible scream at enemies in a cone, dealing magic damage and Silencing enemies for a few seconds.
spells.descricao: Silences enemies in a cone for 60 seconds and deals 80/135/190/245/300 (+1) magic damage.
spells.name: Feral Scream

spells.sandescricao: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
spells.descricao: Cho'Gath's attacks release deadly spikes, dealing damage and slowing all enemy units in front of him.
spells.name: Vorpal Spikes

spells.sandescricao: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
spells.descricao: Devours an enemy unit, dealing a high amount of true damage. If the target is killed, Cho'Gath grows, gaining maximum Health.
spells.name: Feast

name: Aatrox
lore: One of the ancient darkin, Aatrox was once a peerless swordmaster who reveled in the bloody chaos of the battlefield. Trapped within his own blade by the magic of his foes, he waited out the millennia for a suitable host to wield him—this mortal warrior was corrupted and transformed by the living weapon, and Aatrox was reborn. Though tales of the darkin have now passed into legend, he remembers only too well the destruction of his race, and wreaks his vengeance one sword blow at a time.
title: the Darkin Blade
passiva_descricao: Aatrox fills up his Blood Well through his abilities. When filled, Aatrox becomes Hellbent for as long as he stays in combat with champions or monsters, granting him attack damage, attack speed, and the ability to survive fatal damage.

spells.sandescricao: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at a targeted location, dealing damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact.
spells.descricao: Aatrox takes flight and slams down at target location, dealing 20/50/80/110/140 (+1.1) physical damage and knocking up enemies at the center of impact for 1 second.Aatrox fills up 20% of the Blood Well upon cast.
spells.name: Dark Flight

spells.sandescricao: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage and fills a portion of his Blood Well every third subsequent attack. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
spells.descricao: While toggled on Aatrox deals bonus damage and fills a portion of his Blood Well every third subsequent attack. While toggled off Aatrox restores Health every third subsequent attack.
spells.name: Blood Thirst / Blood Price

spells.sandescricao: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing damage to enemies hit and slowing them.
spells.descricao: Aatrox unleashes the power of his blade, dealing 20/50/80/110/140 (+0.75) physical damage to enemies hit and slowing them by 310% for 190 seconds.Aatrox fills up 20% of the Blood Well upon cast.
spells.name: Blades of Torment

spells.sandescricao: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, damaging all nearby enemy champions around him and gaining increased Attack Speed and bonus Attack Range for a short duration.
spells.descricao: Aatrox draws in the blood of his foes, dealing 310 (+1.1) magic damage to nearby enemy champions, filling up 20% of the Blood Well for each hit.Aatrox gains 190% Attack Speed and 0 attack range for 0 seconds upon cast.
spells.name: Massacre

name: Poppy
lore: Runeterra has no shortage of valiant champions, but few are as tenacious as Poppy. Bearing the legendary hammer of Orlon, a weapon twice her size, this determined yordle has spent untold years searching in secret for the fabled “Hero of Demacia,” said to be its rightful wielder. Until then, she dutifully charges into battle, pushing back the kingdom's enemies with every whirling strike.
title: Keeper of the Hammer
passiva_descricao: Poppy throws her buckler, gaining range and bonus magic damage. The buckler lands at a nearby location and Poppy can pick it up to gain a shield. Enemies can step on the buckler to destroy it.

spells.sandescricao: Poppy swings her hammer, dealing damage and creating a zone that will slow enemies and explode after a delay.
spells.descricao: Poppy smashes the ground, dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.8) plus 8% of the enemies' maximum Health as physical damage, and leaving an unstable area.The area slows enemies inside it by 20/25/30/35/40% and erupts after 1 second, dealing the initial damage again.
spells.name: Hammer Shock

spells.sandescricao: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.
spells.descricao: Poppy passively gains Armor and Magic Resist. This bonus increases when she is low on Health. Poppy can activate Steadfast Presence to stop enemy dashes around her and gain movement speed.
spells.name: Steadfast Presence

spells.sandescricao: Poppy dashes to the target and pushes it back. If the target is pushed into a wall, it is stunned.
spells.descricao: Poppy tackles an enemy, dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.8) physical damage and carrying them forward. If Poppy carries the target into terrain, the enemy takes 0.5 (+0.7) additional physical damage and is stunned for 20/25/30/35/40 seconds.
spells.name: Heroic Charge

spells.sandescricao: Poppy channels a hammer strike that knocks enemies very far away.
spells.descricao: First Cast: Poppy channels for up to 20/25/30/35/40 seconds, slowing herself by 100%.Second Cast: Poppy smashes the ground, emanating a shockwave that deals 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.8) physical damage to enemies around the first champion hit and knocking them a large distance toward their Summoning Platform. The shockwave length and knockback distance increases with channel duration.Enemies hit with an uncharged Keeper's Verdict will take half the damage and be knocked straight into the air for half the duration. Enemies are untargetable while they are being knocked away.
spells.name: Keeper's Verdict

name: Taliyah
lore: Taliyah is a nomadic mage from Shurima, torn between teenage wonder and adult responsibility. She has crossed nearly all of Valoran on a journey to learn the true nature of her growing powers, though more recently she has returned to protect her tribe. Some have mistaken her compassion for weakness and paid the ultimate price—for beneath Taliyah's youthful demeanor is a will strong enough to move mountains, and a spirit fierce enough to make the earth itself tremble.
title: the Stoneweaver
passiva_descricao: Taliyah gains movement speed near walls.

spells.sandescricao: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
spells.descricao: Taliyah throws a volley of missiles in a target direction, moving freely as she does. This works the ground below her. If Taliyah casts Threaded Volley on worked ground, she only throws one missile.
spells.name: Threaded Volley

spells.sandescricao: Taliyah causes an area of ground to erupt and throws enemies within in a direction of her choosing.
spells.descricao: Taliyah targets an area. After a short delay, enemies caught within the area will be pushed and dealt 70/95/120/145/170 (+0.45) magic damage.You can control the direction enemies will be pushed by clicking and dragging your mouse in a line.
spells.name: Seismic Shove

spells.sandescricao: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
spells.descricao: Taliyah creates a slowing minefield that explodes if enemies dash through it or are pushed/pulled through it.
spells.name: Unraveled Earth

spells.sandescricao: Stone Weaver creates a very long wall and then surfs it.
spells.descricao: Cast once to create a wall. Recast immediately to ride ahead of the wall. Moving or receiving damage will cause Taliyah to stop.Weaver's Wall lasts for 70/95/120/145/170 seconds. Deactivate this spell to break the wall early.
spells.name: Weaver's Wall

name: Illaoi
lore: Illaoi's powerful physique is dwarfed only by her indomitable faith. As the prophet of the Great Kraken, she uses a huge, golden idol to rip her foes' spirits from their bodies and shatter their perception of reality. All who challenge the “Truth Bearer of Nagakabouros” soon discover Illaoi never battles alone—the god of the Serpent Isles fights by her side.
title: the Kraken Priestess
passiva_descricao: Illaoi and the Vessels she creates spawn Tentacles on nearby impassible terrain. Tentacles swing at spirits, Vessels, and victims of Illaoi's Harsh lesson. Tentacles deal physical damage to enemies hit, and will heal Illaoi if they damage a champion.

spells.sandescricao: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
spells.descricao: Increases the damage dealt by Tentacles. When activated, Illaoi smashes down a Tentacle that deals physical damage.
spells.name: Tentacle Smash

spells.sandescricao: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
spells.descricao: Illaoi leaps to her target, dealing physical damage and causing nearby Tentacles to also swing at the target.
spells.name: Harsh Lesson

spells.sandescricao: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.
spells.descricao: Illaoi rips the spirit from a foe's body, forcing it to stand before her. Spirits echo a percentage of the damage they take to the original target. If killed, or if the target gets too far from the spirit, the target will become a Vessel and begin spawning Tentacles.
spells.name: Test of Spirit

spells.sandescricao: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing physical damage to nearby enemies. A Tentacle spawns for each enemy champion hit.
spells.descricao: Illaoi smashes her idol into the ground, dealing 200 (+0.5) physical damage to nearby enemies and spawning a Tentacle for each enemy champion hit.For the next 10 seconds Tentacles are untargetable and will Slam 50% faster, and Harsh Lesson has a 2 second cooldown.'There are kind and gentle gods. Mine isn't one of those.'
spells.name: Leap of Faith

name: Heimerdinger
lore: A brilliant yet eccentric yordle scientist, Professor Cecil B. Heimerdinger is one of the most innovative and esteemed inventors Piltover has ever known. Relentless in his work to the point of neurotic obsession, he thrives on answering the universe's most impenetrable questions. Though his theories often appear opaque and esoteric, Heimerdinger has crafted some of Piltover's most miraculous—not to mention lethal—machinery, and constantly tinkers with his inventions to make them even more efficient.
title: the Revered Inventor
passiva_descricao: Gain Movement Speed while near allied towers and turrets deployed by Heimerdinger.

spells.sandescricao: Heimerdinger lays down a rapid-fire cannon turret equipped with a secondary pass-through beam attack (turrets deal half damage to towers).
spells.descricao: Places a Turret. Turret attacks prioritize Heimerdinger's targets and enemies attacking Heimerdinger. Turrets shut down if Heimerdinger moves far away. Heimerdinger generates a Turret Kit every  seconds and can hold 3 Kits at once. H-28G Evolution Turret StatsHealth: 150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575 (+150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575)Attack - Cannon: 6/9/12/15/18 (+150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575/0.3) Magic Damage.Attack - Beam: 40/60/80/100/120 (+150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575/0.3/0.55) Magic Damage every 90 seconds.Maximum Turrets Placed: 3
spells.name: H-28G Evolution Turret

spells.sandescricao: Heimerdinger fires long-range rockets that converge on his cursor.
spells.descricao: Unleashes a barrage of 5 rockets that converge towards the cursor and fan out past it. Rockets deal 6/9/12/15/18 (+150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575/0.3) Magic Damage. Additional rocket hits deal reduced damage:Champions and Monsters: 40/60/80/100/120 (+150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575/0.3/0.55) Magic Damage, max 90 (+150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575) total damageMinions: 60% of base damageRocket hits against champions charge nearby turret beam attacks.
spells.name: Hextech Micro-Rockets

spells.sandescricao: Heimerdinger lobs a grenade at a location, dealing damage to enemy units, as well as stunning anyone directly hit and slowing surrounding units.
spells.descricao: Hurls a grenade that deals 6/9/12/15/18 (+150/175/200/225/250/275/300/325/350/375/400/425/450/475/500/525/550/575/0.3) Magic Damage to enemies and slows their Movement Speed by 3% for 40/60/80/100/120 seconds. Enemies in the center of the blast are also stunned for 26/22/18/14/10 seconds.Hitting a champion fully charges nearby turret beams.
spells.name: CH-2 Electron Storm Grenade

spells.sandescricao: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
spells.descricao: Heimerdinger invents an upgrade, causing his next spell to have increased effects.
spells.name: UPGRADE!!!

name: Alistar
lore: Always a mighty warrior with a fearsome reputation, Alistar seeks revenge for the death of his clan at the hands of the Noxian empire. Though he was enslaved and forced into the life of a gladiator, his unbreakable will was what kept him from truly becoming a beast. Now, free of the chains of his former masters, he fights in the name of the downtrodden and the disadvantaged, his rage as much a weapon as his horns, hooves and fists.
title: the Minotaur
passiva_descricao: Alistar charges his roar by stunning or displacing enemy champions or when nearby enemies die. When fully charged he heals himself and all nearby allied champions.

spells.sandescricao: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing damage to nearby enemies and tossing them into the air.
spells.descricao: Alistar smashes the ground, dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.5) magic damage and tossing nearby enemy units into the air for 1 second.
spells.name: Pulverize

spells.sandescricao: Alistar rams a target with his head, dealing damage and knocking the target back.
spells.descricao: Alistar rams into an enemy, dealing 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.5) magic damage and knocking them back.
spells.name: Headbutt

spells.sandescricao: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit colision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
spells.descricao: Alistar tramples nearby enemy units, ignoring unit colision and gaining stacks if he damages an enemy champion. At full stacks Alistar's next basic attack against an enemy champion deals additional magic damage and stuns them.
spells.name: Trample

spells.sandescricao: Alistar lets out a wild roar, removing all crowd control effects on himself, and reducing incoming physical and magical damage for the duration.
spells.descricao: Removes all disables from Alistar. For 375 seconds Alistar takes 60/105/150/195/240% reduced physical and magical damage.
spells.name: Unbreakable Will

name: Xin Zhao
lore: Xin Zhao is a resolute warrior loyal to the ruling Lightshield dynasty. Once condemned to the fighting pits of Noxus, he survived countless gladiatorial bouts, but after being freed by Demacian forces, he swore his life and allegiance to these brave liberators. Armed with his favored three-talon spear, Xin Zhao now fights for his adopted kingdom, audaciously challenging any foe, no matter the odds.
title: the Seneschal of Demacia
passiva_descricao: Every third attack deals bonus damage and heals Xin Zhao.

spells.sandescricao: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
spells.descricao: Xin Zhao's next 3 standard attacks deal increased damage with the third attack knocking an opponent into the air.
spells.name: Three Talon Strike

spells.sandescricao: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.
spells.descricao: Xin Zhao slashes in front of himself with his spear, then thrusts it forward.
spells.name: Wind Becomes Lightning

spells.sandescricao: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy, dealing damage to all enemies in the area and slowing them briefly.
spells.descricao: Xin Zhao charges to an enemy. The charge deals 20/25/30/35/40 (+0.3) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by 0.75% for 0.5 seconds.  Charging grants Xin Zhao 0% attack speed for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Audacious Charge

spells.sandescricao: Xin Zhao deals damage to nearby enemies based on their current Health and knocks non-challenged targets back. Xin Zhao is impervious to damage dealt by champions outside of the circle created.
spells.descricao: Xin Zhao unleashes a sweep around him that deals 20/25/30/35/40 (+0.3) plus 0.75% of target's current Health in physical damage and knocks them back (max 600 vs monsters).For 0 seconds after casting this ability, Xin Zhao has increased Awareness and will completely block damage from enemies that are far away. Xin Zhao's attacks and spell casts increase the duration of Awareness by 0 seconds each.The last champion hit by Xin Zhao's basic attacks or Audacious Charge is not knocked back.
spells.name: Crescent Guard

name: Lucian
lore: Once a Sentinel of Light, Lucian is a grim hunter of undying spirits, pursuing them relentlessly and annihilating them with his twin relic pistols. Consumed by the need to avenge his dead wife, he will not rest until Thresh, the specter who holds her soul, is destroyed. Merciless and single-minded, Lucian allows nothing to stand in the path of this vengeance—anyone or anything foolish enough to try is blown away by an overwhelming barrage of magical gunfire.
title: the Purifier
passiva_descricao: Whenever Lucian uses an ability, his next attack becomes a double-shot.

spells.sandescricao: Lucian shoots a bolt of piercing light through a target.
spells.descricao: Shoots a bolt of piercing light through an enemy unit, damaging enemies in a line for 85/120/155/190/225 (+0.6/0.75/0.9/1.05/1.2) (60/70/80/90/100% of bonus Attack Damage) physical damage.Piercing Light's cast time decreases slightly as Lucian gains levels.
spells.name: Piercing Light

spells.sandescricao: Lucian shoots a missile that explodes in a star shape, marking enemies. Lucian gains Movement Speed for attacking marked enemies.
spells.descricao: Fires a shot that explodes upon enemy contact or reaching the end of its path. The explosion deals 85/120/155/190/225 (+0.9) magic damage and marks enemies for 6 seconds.When Lucian or his allies damage a marked target, Lucian gains 60/70/80/90/100 Movement Speed for 1 second.
spells.name: Ardent Blaze

spells.sandescricao: Lucian quickly dashes a short distance. Lightslinger attacks reduce Relentless Pursuit's cooldown.
spells.descricao: Quickly dashes a short distance.Whenever Lightslinger hits an enemy, Relentless Pursuit's cooldown is reduced by 85/120/155/190/225 second (doubles to 60/70/80/90/100 seconds against champions).
spells.name: Relentless Pursuit

spells.sandescricao: Lucian unleashes a torrent of shots from his weapons.
spells.descricao: Lucian moves freely while firing rapidly in a single direction for 85/120/155/190/225 seconds. His shots collide with the first enemy they hit and each do 60/70/80/90/100 (+0.9) (+0.1/0.2) physical damage.  The Culling does 0% damage to minions.Lucian may use Relentless Pursuit during The Culling.Reactivate The Culling to cancel early.
spells.name: The Culling

name: Volibear
lore: The thunderous demigod known as the Thousand-Pierced Bear is the battle-spirit of the Freljord. Thousands of years of constant and bitter wars, fought in the coldest winters, have hardened Volibear into a truly indomitable force, hurling bolts of lightning from the highest peaks—and when snowy tempests rage down, it can only mean that he is on the attack once more. Any who dare to face him may find themselves joining his fierce army of Ursine warriors… assuming they do not fall victim to his savage claws.
title: the Thunder's Roar
passiva_descricao: Volibear heals rapidly for a few seconds when his Health drops to a critical level.

spells.sandescricao: Volibear drops to all fours and runs faster. This bonus speed increases when chasing enemy champions. The first enemy he attacks is thrown backwards over Volibear.
spells.descricao: Volibear drops to all fours to hunt his enemies, gaining 15% Movement Speed for 4 seconds. This bonus is enhanced to 30/35/40/45/50% Movement Speed while moving toward enemy champions.Volibear's next attack during this time deals an additional 30/60/90/120/150 physical damage and flings the target behind him.
spells.name: Rolling Thunder

spells.sandescricao: Volibear's repeated attacks grant him additional Attack Speed. Once Volibear has repeatedly attacked three times, he can perform a vicious bite on his target which deals increased damage based on the target's missing Health.
spells.descricao: Passive: Volibear gains 30/60/90/120/150% Attack Speed with each attack. Stacks up to 30/35/40/45/50 times.Active: When Volibear has 3 stacks of Frenzy, he can bite an enemy to deal 4 (+0.15 [15% of bonus Health]) physical damage, increased by 400% for each 0% Health the target is missing. If Volibear bites a monster, Frenzy's cooldown is reduced by 0%.
spells.name: Frenzy

spells.sandescricao: Volibear lets out a powerful roar that damages and slows enemies. Minions and monsters are feared as well.
spells.descricao: Volibear deals 30/35/40/45/50 (+0.6) magic damage to nearby enemies and slows them by 30/60/90/120/150% for 4 seconds.Minions and monsters are feared as well.
spells.name: Majestic Roar

spells.sandescricao: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, damaging a number nearby enemies. The power of the storm causes Volibear's attacks to blast his targets with lightning that bounces to other nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Volibear erupts with chain lightning, striking up to 15 nearby enemies with 30/60/90/120/150 (+0.6) magic damage.For the next 4 seconds, the storm empowers Volibear, causing his basic attacks to deal 4/8/12/16/20 (+0.3) bonus magic damage that chains to 15 nearby enemies.
spells.name: Thunder Claws

name: Sejuani
lore: Sejuani is the brutal, unforgiving Iceborn warmother of the Winter's Claw, one of the most feared tribes of the Freljord. Her people's survival is a constant, desperate battle against the elements, forcing them to raid Noxians, Demacians, and Avarosans alike to survive the harsh winters. Sejuani herself spearheads the most dangerous of these attacks from the saddle of her drüvask boar Bristle, using her True Ice flail to freeze and shatter her enemies.
title: Fury of the North
passiva_descricao: After being out of combat, Sejuani gains Frost Armor which grants Armor and Magic Resist and immunity to slows. Frost Armor persists for a short time after Sejuani takes damage. Sejuani can damage a stunned enemy to shatter it, dealing massive magic damage.

spells.sandescricao: Sejuani charges forward, knocking enemies into the air. The charge stops after hitting an enemy champion.
spells.descricao: Sejuani charges, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.4) magic damage to enemies and knocking them up. The charge ends after hitting an enemy champion.
spells.name: Arctic Assault

spells.sandescricao: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
spells.descricao: Sejuani swings her mace twice, dealing damage and applying Frost stacks.
spells.name: Winter's Wrath

spells.sandescricao: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
spells.descricao: Sejuani freezes and stuns an enemy champion that has maximum Frost stacks.
spells.name: Permafrost

spells.sandescricao: Sejuani throws her bola that freezes and stuns the first champion hit and creates an ice storm that slows other enemies.
spells.descricao: Sejuani throws her True Ice bola that deals 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.4) magic damage to the first enemy champion hit and stuns them for 625 second.The bola becomes more powerful as it travels, dealing 0 (+0.4/0.8) magic damage, stunning for 0 seconds and creating a storm that slows other enemies by 0%. After 1000 seconds, the storm deals 0 (+0.4/0.8/0.8) magic damage and slows by 0.5% for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Glacial Prison

name: Nidalee
lore: Raised in the deepest jungle, Nidalee is a master tracker who can shapeshift into a ferocious cougar at will. Neither wholly woman nor beast, she viciously defends her territory from any and all trespassers, with carefully placed traps and deft spear throws. She cripples her quarry before pouncing on them in feline form—the lucky few who survive tell tales of a wild woman with razor-sharp instincts, and even sharper claws...
title: the Bestial Huntress
passiva_descricao: Moving through brush increases Nidalee's Movement Speed by 10% for 2 seconds, increased to 30% toward visible enemy champions within 1400 range. Hitting champions or monsters with Javelin Toss or Bushwhack triggers a Hunt, granting True Sight of them for 4 seconds. During this time, Nidalee gains 10% Movement Speed (increased to 30% toward the Hunted target) and her Takedown and Pounce are enhanced against them.

spells.sandescricao: In human form, Nidalee throws a spiked javelin at her target that gains damage as it flies. As a cougar, her next attack will attempt to fatally wound her target, dealing more damage the less life they have.
spells.descricao: Human: Nidalee throws her javelin, dealing 70/85/100/115/130 (+0.4) magic damage. If it exceeds her basic attack range, it gains damage based on distance flown, up to a potential 210/255/300/345/390 (+0.4/1.2) total damage.Cougar: Nidalee's next attack deals additional damage, greatly increased on low health targets.
spells.name: Javelin Toss / Takedown

spells.sandescricao: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
spells.descricao: In human form, Nidalee lays a trap for unwary opponents that, when sprung, damages and reveals its target. As a cougar, she jumps in a direction, dealing damage in an area where she lands.
spells.name: Bushwhack / Pounce

spells.sandescricao: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
spells.descricao: In human form, Nidalee channels the spirit of the cougar to heal her allies and imbue them with Attack Speed for a short duration. As a cougar, she claws in a direction, dealing damage to enemies in front of her.
spells.name: Primal Surge / Swipe

spells.sandescricao: Nidalee transforms into a cougar, gaining new abilities.
spells.descricao: Human: Nidalee transforms into a vicious cougar with the basic abilities Takedown, Pounce, and Swipe.Cougar: Nidalee transforms back into human form. While in human form, triggering a Hunt resets the cooldown of Aspect of the Cougar.
spells.name: Aspect Of The Cougar

name: Garen
lore: A proud and noble warrior, Garen fights as one of the Dauntless Vanguard. He is popular among his fellows, and respected well enough by his enemies—not least as a scion of the prestigious Crownguard family, entrusted with defending Demacia and its ideals. Clad in magic-resistant armor and bearing a mighty broadsword, Garen stands ready to confront mages and sorcerers on the field of battle, in a veritable whirlwind of righteous steel.
title: The Might of Demacia
passiva_descricao: If Garen has not recently been struck by damage or enemy abilities, he regenerates a percentage of his total health each second. Minion damage does not stop Perseverance.

spells.sandescricao: Garen gains a burst of movement speed, breaking free of all slows affecting him. His next attack strikes a vital area of his foe, dealing bonus damage and silencing them.
spells.descricao: Garen breaks free from all slows affecting him, and gains 30% movement speed for 1.5/2/2.5/3/3.5 seconds.His next basic attack within 4.5 seconds deals 30/55/80/105/130 (+1.4) physical damage and silences his target for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Decisive Strike

spells.sandescricao: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
spells.descricao: Garen passively increases his armor and magic resist by killing enemies. He may also activate this ability to give him a huge burst of Tenacity and damage reduction for a brief moment followed by a lesser amount of damage reduction for a longer duration.
spells.name: Courage

spells.sandescricao: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
spells.descricao: Garen performs a dance of death with his sword, dealing damage around him for the duration and shredding the armor of enemy champions hit.
spells.name: Judgment

spells.sandescricao: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Garen's attacks deal additional true damage to that champion. Garen can call upon the might of Demacia to deal a finishing blow to an enemy champion that deals damage based upon how much health his target has missing. This damage is true damage against the Villain.
spells.descricao: Passive: The enemy champion with the most recent kills is the Villain. Judgment and basic attacks against it deal an additional 1.5% of its maximum health as true damage.Active: Garen calls upon the might of Demacia to attempt to execute an enemy champion, dealing magic damage equal to 30/55/80/105/130 plus 30% of the target's missing health. Deals true damage to the Villain.
spells.name: Demacian Justice

name: Leona
lore: Imbued with the fire of the sun, Leona is a holy warrior of the Solari who defends Mount Targon with her Zenith Blade and the Shield of Daybreak. Her skin shimmers with starfire while her eyes burn with the power of the celestial Aspect within her. Armored in gold and bearing a terrible burden of ancient knowledge, Leona brings enlightenment to some, death to others.
title: the Radiant Dawn
passiva_descricao: Damaging spells afflict enemies with Sunlight for 1.5 seconds. When allied Champions deal damage to those targets, they consume the Sunlight to deal additional magic damage.

spells.sandescricao: Leona uses her shield to perform her next basic attack, dealing bonus magic damage and stunning the target.
spells.descricao: Next basic attack deals 10/35/60/85/110 (+0.3) bonus magic damage and stuns for 1 second.
spells.name: Shield of Daybreak

spells.sandescricao: Leona raises her shield to gain Armor and Magic Resist. When the duration first ends, if there are nearby enemies, she will deal magic damage to them and prolong the duration of the effect.
spells.descricao: Grants 0 (+0.2) bonus Armor and 10/35/60/85/110 (+0.2/0.2) Magic Resist for 0 seconds. When the effect ends, nearby enemies struck take 1 (+0.3) magic damage and Leona retains her bonus Armor and Magic Resist for 3 seconds.
spells.name: Eclipse

spells.sandescricao: Leona projects a solar image of her sword, dealing magic damage to all enemies in a line. When the image fades, the last enemy champion struck will be briefly immobilized and Leona will dash to them.
spells.descricao: Strikes all enemies in a line dealing 1 (+0.3) magic damage. The last enemy Champion struck will be rooted for 10/35/60/85/110 seconds and Leona will dash to them.
spells.name: Zenith Blade

spells.sandescricao: Leona calls down a beam of solar energy, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Enemies in the center of the area are stunned, while enemies on the outside are slowed. Afterward, Leona's sword is charged with the power of the sun and deals bonus magic damage for a few attacks.
spells.descricao: Calls down a radiant beam of solar energy dealing 0 (+0.3) magic damage and slowing enemies by 1% for 10/35/60/85/110 seconds. Enemies in the center of the flare are stunned instead of slowed.Leona's sword remains charged with Incandescence, causing her next 0 basic attacks to gain 100 range and deal 0 (+0.8/0.15) bonus magic damage on hit.
spells.name: Solar Flare

name: Zed
lore: Utterly ruthless and without mercy, Zed is the leader of the Order of Shadow, an organization he created with the intent of militarizing Ionia's martial arts traditions to drive out Noxian invaders. During the war, desperation led him to unlock the secret shadow form—a malevolent spirit magic as dangerous and corrupting as it is powerful. Zed has mastered all of these forbidden techniques to destroy anything he sees as a threat to his nation, or his new order.
title: the Master of Shadows
passiva_descricao: Zed's basic attacks against targets below 50% Health deal 6-10% of the target's maximum Health as bonus Magic Damage. This effect can only occur once every 10 seconds on the same target.

spells.sandescricao: Zed and his shadow both throw their spinning blades forward, dealing damage to any targets they pass through.
spells.descricao: Zed and his shadows throw their shurikens, each dealing 80/115/150/185/220 (+0.9) physical damage to the first enemy they pass through, and 45/66/87/108/129 (+0.9/0.54) physical damage to each additional enemy.Additional shurikens that hit the same enemy deal 25% less damage than previous shurikens.
spells.name: Razor Shuriken

spells.sandescricao: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 5 seconds, and mimicking his spell casts. Zed can reactivate to swap places with the shadow.
spells.descricao: Passive: Whenever Zed and his shadows strike an enemy with the same ability, Zed gains 45/66/87/108/129 energy. Energy can only be gained once per cast ability.Active: Zed's shadow dashes forward, remaining in place for 925 seconds. Reactivating Living Shadow will cause Zed to switch positions with this shadow.
spells.name: Living Shadow

spells.sandescricao: Zed and his shadow spin their blades, creating a burst of shadow energy. The shadow's spin slows.
spells.descricao: Zed and his shadows slash, dealing 80/115/150/185/220 (+0.9) physical damage to nearby enemies.Each enemy champion hit by Zed's slash reduces Living Shadow's cooldown by 0.75 seconds.Enemies hit by a Shadow's slash are slowed by 0.6% for 1.5 seconds. Enemies hit by multiple slashes take no additional damage but are slowed by 45/66/87/108/129% instead.
spells.name: Shadow Slash

spells.sandescricao: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active. If the Champion dies under Death Mark, Zed can gain a portion of their attack damage.
spells.descricao: Zed leaves a shadow behind and dashes to target Champion, marking them for death. After 3 seconds, the mark will trigger, dealing a percentage of the damage Zed has dealt while the mark was active. If the Champion dies under Death Mark, Zed can gain a portion of their attack damage.
spells.name: Death Mark

name: Blitzcrank
lore: Blitzcrank is an enormous, near-indestructible automaton from Zaun, originally built to dispose of hazardous waste. However, he found this primary purpose too restricting, and modified his own form to better serve the fragile people of the Sump. Blitzcrank selflessly uses his strength and durability to protect others, extending a helpful metal fist or burst of energy to subdue any troublemakers.
title: the Great Steam Golem
passiva_descricao: When Blitzcrank's life is brought below 20% health, he activates Mana Barrier. This creates a mana shield equal to 50% of his mana for 10 seconds. Mana Barrier can only occur once every 90 seconds.

spells.sandescricao: Blitzcrank fires his right hand to grab an opponent on its path, dealing damage and dragging it back to him.
spells.descricao: Blitzcrank fires his right hand. If it encounters an enemy unit it will stun them and deal 80/135/190/245/300 (+1) magic damage while he pulls them to himself.
spells.name: Rocket Grab

spells.sandescricao: Blitzcrank super charges himself to get dramatically increased Movement and Attack Speed. He is temporarily slowed after the effect ends.
spells.descricao: Blitzcrank supercharges himself, gaining 80/135/190/245/300% Movement Speed and 0% Attack Speed for 0 seconds. The Movement Speed bonus decays over the duration.When Overdrive ends, Blitzcrank's Movement Speed is slowed by 0% for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Overdrive

spells.sandescricao: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double damage and pop his target up in the air.
spells.descricao: Blitzcrank charges up his fist to make his next attack deal double his total attack damage as physical damage and pop his target up in the air.
spells.name: Power Fist

spells.sandescricao: Passively causes lightning bolts to damage a nearby enemy. Additionally, Blitzcrank can activate this ability to damage nearby enemies and silence them for 0.5 seconds, but doing so removes the passive lightning until Static Field becomes available again.
spells.descricao: Passive: Lightning arcs off of Blitzcrank to hit a random nearby enemy for 80/135/190/245/300 (+1) magic damage every 2.5 seconds.Active: Deals 0 (+0.2/1) magic damage and silences surrounding enemy units for 0.5 seconds. The passive is not in effect during the cooldown.
spells.name: Static Field

name: Rammus
lore: Idolized by many, dismissed by some, mystifying to all, the curious being Rammus is an enigma. Protected by a spiked shell, he inspires increasingly disparate theories on his origin wherever he goes—from demigod, to sacred oracle, to a mere beast transformed by magic. Whatever the truth may be, Rammus keeps his own counsel and stops for no one as he roams the Shuriman desert.
title: the Armordillo
passiva_descricao: Rammus' basic attacks deal bonus magic damage, scaling with his Armor.

spells.sandescricao: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
spells.descricao: Rammus accelerates in a ball towards his enemies, dealing damage and slowing targets affected by the impact.
spells.name: Powerball

spells.sandescricao: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
spells.descricao: Rammus goes into a defensive formation, vastly increasing his Armor and Magic Resistance, amplifying Spiked Shells' damage, and returning damage to enemies that basic attack him, but he is also slowed during this time.
spells.name: Defensive Ball Curl

spells.sandescricao: Rammus taunts an enemy champion or monster into a reckless assault against him. Additionally, he gains increased Attack Speed for a short time, but this bonus is extended by having any of his other spells active.
spells.descricao: Taunt an enemy champion or monster for 100/135/170/205/240 seconds and gain 40/50/60/70/80% Attack Speed for the same duration.While any of Rammus' other spells are active, Frenzying Taunt's Attack Speed bonus is refreshed.
spells.name: Frenzying Taunt

spells.sandescricao: Rammus creates waves of destruction pulsing through the ground, causing damage to nearby enemies and slowing them. Turrets take double damage from Tremors.
spells.descricao: Shake the earth for 40/50/60/70/80 seconds, dealing 100/135/170/205/240 (+1) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 6% for 1 seconds, stacking up to 0.35 times.Tremors deals 125% damage to turrets.
spells.name: Tremors

name: Vel'Koz
lore: It is unclear if Vel'Koz was the first Void-spawn to emerge on Runeterra, but there has certainly never been another to match his level of cruel, calculating sentience. While his kin devour or defile everything around them, he seeks instead to scrutinize and study the physical realm—and the strange, warlike beings that dwell there—for any weakness the Void might exploit. But Vel'Koz is far from a passive observer, striking back at threats with deadly plasma, or by disrupting the very fabric of the world itself.
title: the Eye of the Void
passiva_descricao: Vel'Koz's abilities apply Organic Deconstruction to enemies on hit. If 3 stacks are accumulated, the enemy will take a burst of true damage.

spells.sandescricao: Vel'Koz shoots a bolt of plasma that splits in two on reactivation or upon hitting an enemy. The bolt slows and damages on hit.
spells.descricao: Vel'Koz shoots a plasma bolt that deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.6) Magic Damage and applies a slow of 70% that decays over 1/1.4/1.8/2.2/2.6 second(s).Upon reactivation or upon hitting an enemy, the bolt splits at a 90 degree angle.Killing a unit with this refunds 50% of the Mana Cost.
spells.name: Plasma Fission

spells.sandescricao: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals an initial burst of damage, then explodes for a second burst of damage after a delay.
spells.descricao: Vel'Koz opens a rift to the void that deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.6) Magic Damage. After a delay, it deals an additional 50 (+0.15/0.25) Magic Damage.Void Rift has a 2 second cooldown between casts.
spells.name: Void Rift

spells.sandescricao: Vel'Koz causes an area to explode, knocking up enemies, and knocking close enemies slightly away.
spells.descricao: Vel'Koz disrupts a nearby area which, after a delay, deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.6) Magic Damage and knocks up enemies hit for 50 seconds.Any enemies hit that are close to Vel'Koz will be pushed slightly in the direction the ability was cast.
spells.name: Tectonic Disruption

spells.sandescricao: Vel'Koz unleashes a channelled beam that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds that deals magic damage. Organic Deconstruction Researches enemy champions causing them to take true damage instead.
spells.descricao: Passive: Deconstructing enemy Champions Researches them for 50 seconds. Basic attacks and all abilities refresh Research.Active: Vel'Koz channels a ray of energy that follows the cursor for 2.5 seconds, dealing Magic Damage up to a total of 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.6) and slowing units hit by 0.25%.Enemies that stay in the beam will periodically gain Organic Deconstruction stacks. Deals True Damage instead of Magic against Researched units.
spells.name: Life Form Disintegration Ray

name: Caitlyn
lore: Renowned as its finest peacekeeper, Caitlyn is also Piltover's best shot at ridding the city of its elusive criminal elements. She is often paired with Vi, acting as a cool counterpoint to her partner's more impetuous nature. Even though she carries a one-of-a-kind hextech rifle, Caitlyn's most powerful weapon is her superior intellect, allowing her to lay elaborate traps for any lawbreakers foolish enough to operate in the City of Progress.
title: the Sheriff of Piltover
passiva_descricao: Every few basic attacks, or against a target she has trapped or netted, Caitlyn will fire a headshot dealing bonus damage that scales with her critical strike chance. On trapped or netted targets, Caitlyn's Headshot attack range is doubled.

spells.sandescricao: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
spells.descricao: Caitlyn revs up her rifle for 1 second to unleash a penetrating shot that deals physical damage (deals less damage to subsequent targets).
spells.name: Piltover Peacemaker

spells.sandescricao: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
spells.descricao: Caitlyn sets a trap to find sneaky yordles. When sprung, the trap reveals and immobilizes the enemy champion for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Yordle Snap Trap

spells.sandescricao: Caitlyn fires a heavy net to slow her target. The recoil knocks Caitlyn back.
spells.descricao: Fires a net, knocking Caitlyn backwards. The net deals 30/70/110/150/190 (+0.8) magic damage and slows the first enemy hit by 50% for 33 second.
spells.name: 90 Caliber Net

spells.sandescricao: Caitlyn takes time to line up the perfect shot, dealing massive damage to a single target at a huge range. Enemy champions can intercept the bullet for their ally.
