spells.descricao: Takes a second to line up the perfect shot on an enemy Champion at up to 33 range. The shot deals 30/70/110/150/190 (+2) physical damage, but other enemy Champions can intercept it.Grants True Sight of the target during the channel.
spells.name: Ace in the Hole

name: Trundle
lore: Trundle is a hulking and devious troll with a particularly vicious streak, and there is nothing he cannot bludgeon into submission—not even the Freljord itself. Fiercely territorial, he chases down anyone foolish enough to enter his domain. Then, his massive club of True Ice at the ready, he chills his enemies to the bone and impales them with jagged, frozen pillars, laughing as they bleed out onto the tundra.
title: the Troll King
passiva_descricao: When an enemy unit dies near Trundle, he heals for a percent of its maximum Health.

spells.sandescricao: Trundle bites his opponent, dealing damage, briefly slowing and sapping some of their Attack Damage.
spells.descricao: Trundle lunges at his opponent with his next basic attack, dealing 20/40/60/80/100 (+0.8/0.9/1/1.1/1.2) physical damage and briefly slowing his target.This attack increases Trundle's Attack Damage by 20/25/30/35/40 for 8 seconds, with his opponent losing half of this amount.
spells.name: Chomp

spells.sandescricao: Trundle turns target location into his domain, gaining Attack Speed, Movement Speed, and increased healing from all sources while on it.
spells.descricao: Trundle coats target location with ice for -10/-12.5/-15/-17.5/-20 seconds, gaining 20/40/60/80/100% Movement Speed, 100/105/110/115/120% Attack Speed and 20/25/30/35/40% increased healing and regeneration from all sources.
spells.name: Frozen Domain

spells.sandescricao: Trundle creates an ice pillar at target location, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units.
spells.descricao: Trundle creates an icy pillar at target location for 20/40/60/80/100 seconds, becoming impassable terrain and slowing all nearby enemy units by 100/105/110/115/120%.
spells.name: Pillar of Ice

spells.sandescricao: Trundle immediately steals a percent of his target's Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. Over the next 4 seconds the amount of Health, Armor, and Magic Resistance stolen is doubled.
spells.descricao: Trundle drains 20/40/60/80/100 (+0.02)% of an enemy champion's maximum Health as Magic Damage and 100/105/110/115/120% of their Armor and Magic Resist, half immediately and half over 20/25/30/35/40 seconds. The Armor and Magic Resist is returned 25 seconds after the drain ends.
spells.name: Subjugate

name: Kindred
lore: Separate, but never parted, Kindred represents the twin essences of death. Lamb's bow offers a swift release from the mortal realm for those who accept their fate. Wolf hunts down those who run from their end, delivering violent finality within his crushing jaws. Though interpretations of Kindred's nature vary across Runeterra, every mortal must choose the true face of their death.
title: The Eternal Hunters
passiva_descricao: Kindred can mark targets to Hunt. Successfully completing a Hunt permanently empowers Kindred's basic abilities. Every 4 hunts completed also increases Kindred's basic attack range.

spells.sandescricao: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
spells.descricao: Kindred tumbles and shoots up to three arrows at nearby targets.
spells.name: Dance of Arrows

spells.sandescricao: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
spells.descricao: Wolf enrages and attacks enemies around him.
spells.name: Wolf's Frenzy

spells.sandescricao: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
spells.descricao: Lamb fires a carefully placed shot, slowing the target. If Lamb attacks the target two more times, her third attack instead directs Wolf to pounce on the enemy, savaging them for massive damage.
spells.name: Mounting Dread

spells.sandescricao: Lamb grants all living things inside a zone a respite from death. Until the effect ends, nothing can die. At the end, units are healed.
spells.descricao: Lamb blesses the ground underneath her for 0 seconds, creating an area in which no living things, ally or enemy, can die. Upon reaching 10% Health, units become immune to further damage or healing.When the blessing ends all living things inside heal for 60/80/100/120/140.
spells.name: Lamb's Respite

name: Quinn
lore: Quinn is an elite ranger-knight of Demacia, who undertakes dangerous missions deep in enemy territory. She and her legendary eagle, Valor, share an unbreakable bond, and their foes are often slain before they realize they are fighting not one, but two of the kingdom's greatest heroes. Nimble and acrobatic when required, Quinn takes aim with her crossbow while Valor marks their elusive targets from above, making them a deadly pair on the battlefield.
title: Demacia's Wings
passiva_descricao: Valor periodically marks enemies as Vulnerable. Quinn's first basic attack against Vulnerable targets will deal bonus physical damage.

spells.sandescricao: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.
spells.descricao: Quinn calls Valor to mark an enemy and hinder its vision before damaging all enemies in the immediate area.
spells.name: Blinding Assault

spells.sandescricao: Passively grants Quinn Attack Speed and Movement Speed after she attacks a Vulnerable target. Activate to have Valor reveal a large area nearby.
spells.descricao: Passive: Attacking a Vulnerable target increases Quinn's Attack Speed by -1000% and Movement Speed by 1.5% for 20/45/70/95/120 seconds.Active: Valor reveals a large area nearby for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Heightened Senses

spells.sandescricao: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing physical damage and slowing the target's Movement Speed. Upon reaching the target, she leaps off the target, briefly interrupting it, and lands near her maximum Attack Range away from the target.
spells.descricao: Quinn dashes to an enemy, dealing -1000 (+0.5) physical damage while Valor marks it as Vulnerable.Upon reaching the target, Quinn leaps off, briefly displacing and slowing it by 20/45/70/95/120% (diminishing over 1.5 seconds).
spells.name: Vault

spells.sandescricao: Quinn and Valor team up to fly around at great speed.
spells.descricao: Quinn calls down Valor to assist her. After a 2 second channel, they unite, gaining 1.5% Total Movement Speed and the ability to cast Skystrike by recasting this ability or taking offensive action. Skystrike damages nearby enemies.Taking champion or turret damage puts Behind Enemy Lines on a 3 second cooldown.
spells.name: Behind Enemy Lines

name: Ekko
lore: A prodigy from the rough streets of Zaun, Ekko manipulates time to twist any situation to his advantage. Using his own invention, the Zero Drive, he explores the branching possibilities of reality to craft the perfect moment. Though he revels in this freedom, when there's a threat to his friends he'll do anything to defend them. To outsiders, Ekko seems to achieve the impossible the first time, every time.
title: the Boy Who Shattered Time
passiva_descricao: Ekko's Zero-Drive charges his spells and attacks with temporal energy. The third hit deals bonus damage and, if the target is a champion, Ekko gains accelerated movement speed.

spells.sandescricao: Ekko throws a temporal grenade that expands into a time-distortion field upon hitting an enemy champion, slowing and damaging anyone caught inside. After a delay, the grenade rewinds back to Ekko, dealing damage on its return.
spells.descricao: Ekko throws a device that deals 60/75/90/105/120 (+0.3) magic damage to enemies it passes through. It expands into a slowing field on the first champion hit, slowing everything inside by 32/39/46/53/60%. It then returns to him after a delay, dealing 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.3/0.6) magic damage to all targets hit upon return.
spells.name: Timewinder

spells.sandescricao: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
spells.descricao: Ekko splits the timeline, creating an anomaly after a few seconds that slows enemies caught inside. If Ekko enters the anomaly, he gains shielding and triggers a detonation, stunning enemies by suspending them in time.
spells.name: Parallel Convergence

spells.sandescricao: Ekko rolls evasively while charging up his Z-Drive. His next attack deals bonus damage and warps reality, teleporting him to his target.
spells.descricao: Ekko dashes a short distance in the targeted direction. His next attack will deal 60/75/90/105/120 (+0.3) bonus magic damage and teleport him to his target.
spells.name: Phase Dive

spells.sandescricao: Ekko shatters his timeline, becoming untargetable and rewinding to a more favorable point in time. He returns to whenever he was a few seconds ago, and heals for a percentage of the damage received in that duration. Enemies near his arrival zone take massive damage.
spells.descricao: Ekko turns back time, going briefly untargetable and invulnerable. He teleports to where he was 4 seconds ago and deals 60/75/90/105/120 (+0.3) magic damage to nearby enemies on arrival. Additionally, Ekko heals for 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.3/0.6), increased by 0% for each 1% of his health lost over the last 4 seconds.
spells.name: Chronobreak

name: Nami
lore: A headstrong young vastaya of the seas, Nami was the first of the Marai tribe to leave the waves and venture onto dry land, when their ancient accord with the Targonians was broken. With no other option, she took it upon herself to complete the sacred ritual that would ensure the safety of her people. Amidst the chaos of this new age, Nami faces an uncertain future with grit and determination, using her Tidecaller staff to summon the strength of the oceans themselves.
title: the Tidecaller
passiva_descricao: When Nami's abilities hit allied champions they gain Movement Speed for a short duration.

spells.sandescricao: Sends a bubble to a target area, dealing damage and stunning all enemies on impact.
spells.descricao: Sends a bubble to target area, dealing 75/130/185/240/295 (+0.5) magic damage to enemies, and stunning them for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Aqua Prison

spells.sandescricao: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spells.descricao: Unleashes a stream of water that bounces back and forth between allied and enemy champions, healing allies and damaging enemies.
spells.name: Ebb and Flow

spells.sandescricao: Empowers an allied champion for a short duration. The ally's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and slow the target.
spells.descricao: Empowers an allied champion's next 0 basic attacks, causing them to slow the target by 1.5% (+0.3%) for 0 second and deal 75/130/185/240/295 (+0.5) bonus magic damage. Lasts for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Tidecaller's Blessing

spells.sandescricao: Summons a massive Tidal Wave that knocks up, slows, and damages enemies. Allies hit gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
spells.descricao: Summons a Tidal Wave from Nami's position. The wave knocks up enemies and slows them by 0%, dealing 75/130/185/240/295 (+0.5) magic damage. The duration of the slow increases based on how far the Tidal Wave has traveled, with a minimum duration of 0 seconds and a maximum of 0 seconds.Allies hit by the wave gain double the effect of Surging Tides.
spells.name: Tidal Wave

name: Swain
lore: Swain is the Grand General of Noxus, visionary ruler of an expansionist nation that reveres only strength. Though he was cast down and crippled in the Ionian wars, he seized control of the empire with ruthless determination. Now, Swain commands his warhosts from the front lines, marching against a coming darkness that only he can see. In a swirl of sacrifice and secrets, the greatest secret of all is that the true enemy lies within.
title: the Master Tactician
passiva_descricao: Swain regenerates Mana each time he kills a unit. This amount increases each level.

spells.sandescricao: Swain sends Beatrice to cripple enemies within the target area. Crippled targets are slowed and damaged over time.
spells.descricao: Swain sends Beatrice to cripple enemies within the target area. Crippled targets are slowed and damaged over time.
spells.name: Decrepify

spells.sandescricao: Swain marks a target area. After a short delay, mighty talons grab hold of enemy units, dealing damage and rooting them.
spells.descricao: Swain marks the target area that triggers after a brief delay dealing 30/48/65/83/100 (+0.3) magic damage to enemies within range and rooting them for 20/25/30/35/40 second(s).
spells.name: Nevermove

spells.sandescricao: Swain afflicts his target, dealing damage to them over time and causing them to take increased damage from Swain. Enemies afflicted by Torment are focused by Beatrice while Decrepify is active.
spells.descricao: Swain afflicts his target with a curse that deals 30/48/65/83/100 (+0.3) magic damage over 4 seconds and amplifies Swain's damage against it by 20/25/30/35/40%.
spells.name: Torment

spells.sandescricao: Swain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at up to 5 nearby enemies. Each raven deals damage and heals Swain by a flat amount.
spells.descricao: Swain inspires dread in his enemies by temporarily taking the form of a raven. During this time ravens strike out at up to 5 nearby enemies. Each raven deals damage and heals Swain by a flat amount.
spells.name: Ravenous Flock

name: Taric
lore: Taric is the Aspect of the Protector, wielding incredible power as Runeterra's guardian of life, love, and beauty. Shamed by a dereliction of duty and exiled from his homeland Demacia, Taric ascended Mount Targon to find redemption, only to discover a higher calling among the stars. Imbued with the might of ancient Targon, the Shield of Valoran now stands ever vigilant against the insidious corruption of the Void.
title: the Shield of Valoran
passiva_descricao: Spellcasts empower Taric's next 2 basic attacks to deal bonus magic damage, reduce his spell cooldowns, and attack in quick succession.

skins.name: Armor of the Fifth Age Taric

spells.sandescricao: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
spells.descricao: Heals nearby allied champions based on charges stored. Bravado-empowered attacks grant a charge of Starlight's Touch.
spells.name: Starlight's Touch

spells.sandescricao: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
spells.descricao: Passively increase the Armor of Taric and any allied champion with Bastion. Actively shields an ally and grants them Bastion for as long as they remain near Taric. Taric's spells also cast off the ally with Bastion.
spells.name: Bastion

spells.sandescricao: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
spells.descricao: Taric readies a beam of starlight that, after a brief delay, deals magic damage and stuns enemies.
spells.name: Dazzle

spells.sandescricao: Pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions after a delay, making them invulnerable for a short duration.
spells.descricao: After a 1/2/3/4/5 second delay, pulses cosmic energy onto nearby allied champions, making them invulnerable for 30/60/90/120/150 seconds.
spells.name: Cosmic Radiance

name: Syndra
lore: Syndra is a fearsome dark mage with incredible power at her command. As a child of Ionia, she disturbed the village elders with her prodigious but reckless use of magic. They sent her away to be trained under strict supervision, but she quickly surpassed her mentor and discovered he was restraining her powers. Betrayed and disgusted by such cowardice, Syndra eliminated her teacher and struck out to destroy all who would try to limit her potential, dark spheres in hand.
title: the Dark Sovereign
passiva_descricao: Spells gain extra effects at max rank. Dark Sphere: Sphere's lifetime is increased to 8 seconds. Force of Will: Deals 20% bonus true damage. Scatter the Weak: Spell width increased by 50%. Unleashed Power: Range increased by 75.

spells.sandescricao: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
spells.descricao: Syndra conjures a Dark Sphere dealing magic damage. The sphere remains and can be manipulated by her other powers.
spells.name: Dark Sphere

spells.sandescricao: Syndra picks up and throws a Dark Sphere or enemy minion dealing magic damage and slowing the Movement Speed of enemies.
spells.descricao: First Cast: Grabs target Dark Sphere or enemy minion. If no target is selected, grabs nearest Dark Sphere.Second Cast: Throws the grabbed unit. Enemies hit take 6 (+0.65) magic damage and are slowed by 50/95/140/185/230% for 0.7/1.5 seconds.This spell can be cast while moving.
spells.name: Force of Will

spells.sandescricao: Syndra knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing magic damage. Enemies hit by Dark Spheres become stunned.
spells.descricao: Knocks enemies and Dark Spheres back dealing 50/95/140/185/230 (+0.65) magic damage to them and any enemies they collide with.Dark Spheres that are knocked back stun all enemies in their path for 6 seconds.
spells.name: Scatter the Weak

spells.sandescricao: Syndra bombards an enemy Champion with all of her Dark Spheres.
spells.descricao: Draws upon Syndra's full cataclysmic power, harnessing Dark Spheres to deal magic damage to target enemy Champion. Unleashed Power manipulates the three Dark Spheres orbiting Syndra, in addition to up to 4 Dark Spheres previously created.Damage per sphere: 50/95/140/185/230 (+0.65).Minimum total damage: 6 (+0.2/0.6).
spells.name: Unleashed Power

name: Rakan
lore: As mercurial as he is charming, Rakan is an infamous vastayan troublemaker and the greatest battle-dancer in Lhotlan tribal history. To the humans of the Ionian highlands, his name has long been synonymous with wild festivals, uncontrollable parties, and anarchic music. Few would suspect this energetic, traveling showman is also partner to the rebel Xayah, and is dedicated to her cause.
title: The Charmer
passiva_descricao: Rakan periodically gains a shield.

spells.sandescricao: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
spells.descricao: Flings a magical feather that deals magic damage. Striking a champion or epic monster enables Rakan to heal his allies.
spells.name: Gleaming Quill

spells.sandescricao: Dashes to a location, knocking up nearby enemies on arrival.
spells.descricao: Dashes to a location. Upon arrival Rakan spirals into the air, dealing 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.5) magic damage and knocking up enemies for 7.5 second.
spells.name: Grand Entrance

spells.sandescricao: Flies to an allied champion granting them a shield. Can be re-cast for free for a short duration.
spells.descricao: Flies to an allied champion, granting them a 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.5) health shield for 7.5 seconds.Can be re-cast at no cost once within 15 seconds.Battle Dance's cast range is increased when cast on Xayah.
spells.name: Battle Dance

spells.sandescricao: Gains movement speed, charming and dealing magic damage to enemies touched.
spells.descricao: Gain 12/10.5/9/7.5/6% movement speed for 15 seconds.Touching enemies deals 70/115/160/205/250 (+0.5) magic damage and charms them for 7.5 second(s) the first time they're hit. The first champion charmed grants Rakan 0% decaying movement speed.
spells.name: The Quickness

name: Skarner
lore: Skarner is an immense crystalline scorpion from a hidden valley in Shurima. Part of the ancient Brackern race, Skarner and his kin are known for their great wisdom and deep connection to the land, as their souls are fused with powerful life crystals which hold the living thoughts and memories of their ancestors. In an age long past, the Brackern entered hibernation to avoid untold magical destruction, but recent, threatening events have roused Skarner. As the only Brackern awake, he strives to protect his kind from those who seek to harm them.
title: the Crystal Vanguard
passiva_descricao: Skarner's presence causes crystals to spawn in set locations around the map. While near crystals his team owns, Skarner gains tremendous movement speed, attack speed, and mana regeneration.

spells.sandescricao: Skarner lashes out with his claws, dealing physical damage to all nearby enemies and charging himself with Crystal Energy for several seconds if a unit is struck. If he casts Crystal Slash again while powered by Crystal Energy, he deals bonus magic damage.
spells.descricao: Skarner deals 0.8 physical damage to all nearby enemies. If a unit is struck, he charges himself with Crystal Energy for 4 seconds.While Skarner is charged, Crystal Slash deals 0.8/0.8 (+0.8/0.8/0.3) bonus magic damage.Basic attacks against non-structures lower Crystal Slash's cooldown by 0.25 seconds (quadrupled against champions).
spells.name: Crystal Slash

spells.sandescricao: Skarner gains a shield and has increased Movement Speed while the shield persists.
spells.descricao: Skarner is shielded for 0.8 (33/36/39/42/45% of his maximum health) (+0.8/0.8/0.3) damage for 0 seconds. While the shield persists, Skarner gains movement speed that ramps up to 0% over 3 seconds.
spells.name: Crystalline Exoskeleton

spells.sandescricao: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy which deals damage to enemies struck and slows them. Basic attacking these enemies within a short window will stun them.
spells.descricao: Passive: Crystallizing enemies with Fracture and Impale grants Crystal Charge for the disable duration and reduces the cooldown of Fracture by the same amount.Active: Skarner summons a blast of crystalline energy, dealing 33/36/39/42/45 (+0.8/0.8/0.3) magic damage, slowing targets hit by 0% for 0 seconds and reducing the blast's speed.Enemies hit by Fracture are afflicted with Crystal Venom for 0 seconds, causing Skarner's next basic attack against them to deal 4 additional physical damage and stun the target for 0 second.
spells.name: Fracture

spells.sandescricao: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion and deals damage to it. During this time, Skarner can move freely and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, the target will be dealt additional damage.
spells.descricao: Skarner suppresses an enemy champion for 33/36/39/42/45 seconds, dealing 0.6 physical damage plus 4 (+0.8/0.8/0.3) magic damage. Skarner can move freely during this time, and will drag his helpless victim around with him. When the effect ends, Skarner's target will be dealt the same damage again.
spells.name: Impale

name: Braum
lore: Blessed with massive biceps and an even bigger heart, Braum is a beloved hero of the Freljord. Every mead hall north of Frostheld toasts his legendary strength, said to have felled a forest of oaks in a single night, and punched an entire mountain into rubble. Bearing an enchanted vault door as his shield, Braum roams the frozen north sporting a mustachioed smile as big as his muscles—a true friend to all those in need.
title: the Heart of the Freljord
passiva_descricao: Braum adds stacks of Concussive Blows to enemies with basic attacks or Winter's Bite. He and his allies continue to add stacks with basic attacks, at 4 stacks their target will be stunned.

spells.sandescricao: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage. Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
spells.descricao: Braum propels freezing ice from his shield, slowing and dealing magic damage. Applies a stack of Concussive Blows.
spells.name: Winter's Bite

spells.sandescricao: Braum leaps to a target allied champion or minion. On arrival, Braum and the ally gain Armor and Magic Resist for a few seconds.
spells.descricao: Braum leaps to target allied champion or minion.On arrival, Braum and the ally gain  Armor and  Magic Resist (0.02 plus 30% of Braum's bonus Armor/Magic Resist) for 60/105/150/195/240 seconds.
spells.name: Stand Behind Me

spells.sandescricao: Braum raises his shield in a direction for several seconds, intercepting all projectiles causing them to hit him and be destroyed. He negates the damage of the first attack completely and reduces the damage of all subsequent attacks from this direction.
spells.descricao: Braum reduces incoming damage and blocks for allies behind him.Braum raises his shield in a direction for 70 seconds negating the damage of the next attack from that direction. Subsequent attacks deal 30% reduced damage.Braum intercepts projectiles, causing them to hit him and be destroyed.Braum gains 0.02% Movement Speed for the duration.
spells.name: Unbreakable

spells.sandescricao: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line that slows enemies.
spells.descricao: Braum slams the ground, knocking up enemies nearby and in a line in front of him. A fissure is left along the line for 30 seconds, slowing enemies above it by 0.02%.Enemies hit take 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.6) magic damage. The first champion hit is knocked up for 2 seconds, subsequent enemies are knocked up briefly.
spells.name: Glacial Fissure

name: Veigar
lore: An enthusiastic master of dark sorcery, Veigar has embraced powers that few mortals dare approach. As a free-spirited inhabitant of Bandle City, he longed to push beyond the limitations of yordle magic, and turned instead to arcane texts that had been hidden away for thousands of years. Now a stubborn creature with an endless fascination for the mysteries of the universe, Veigar is often underestimated by others—but even though he believes himself truly evil, he possesses an inner morality that leads some to question his deeper motivations.
title: the Tiny Master of Evil
passiva_descricao: Veigar is the greatest Evil to ever strike at the hearts of Runeterra - and he's only getting bigger! Striking an enemy Champion with a spell or scoring a takedown grants Veigar permanently increased Ability Power.

spells.sandescricao: Veigar unleashes a bolt of dark energy that deals magic damage to the first two enemies hit. Units killed by this bolt grant Veigar some ability power permanently.
spells.descricao: Unleashes a bolt of dark energy, dealing 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.6) magic damage to the first two enemies hit.Killing a unit with this also grants Veigar a stack of Phenomenal Evil. Large minions and large monsters grant two.
spells.name: Baleful Strike

spells.sandescricao: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
spells.descricao: Veigar calls a great mass of dark matter to fall from the sky to the target location, dealing magic damage when it lands. Stacks of Phenomenal Evil reduce Dark Matter's cooldown.
spells.name: Dark Matter

spells.sandescricao: After a brief delay Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, stunning enemies who pass through the perimeter.
spells.descricao: After a 1 second delay, Veigar twists the edges of space around the target location for 3 seconds, forming a pentagon of walls. Enemies who attempt to pass through the perimeter are stopped and stunned for 70/110/150/190/230 seconds.
spells.name: Event Horizon

spells.sandescricao: Blasts target enemy champion, dealing a large amount of magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.
spells.descricao: Blasts the target with primal magic to deal 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.6) to 1 (+0.75/1.5) magic damage, increasing based on the target's missing health.Damage is maximized against enemies below 33% health.
spells.name: Primordial Burst

name: Xerath
lore: Xerath is an Ascended Magus of ancient Shurima, a being of arcane energy writhing in the broken shards of a magical sarcophagus. For millennia, he was trapped beneath the desert sands, but the rise of Shurima freed him from his ancient prison. Driven insane with power, he now seeks to take what he believes is rightfully his and replace the upstart civilizations of the world with one fashioned in his image.
title: the Magus Ascendant
passiva_descricao: Xerath's basic attacks periodically restore Mana.

spells.sandescricao: Fires a long-range beam of energy, dealing magic damage to all targets hit.
spells.descricao: First cast: Xerath charges Arcanopulse, gradually decreasing his Movement Speed while increasing the spell's range.Second cast: Xerath fires Arcanopulse, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.75) magic damage to all enemies in a line.While charging Arcanopulse, Xerath cannot attack or cast other spells. If Xerath does not fire the spell, half the Mana cost is refunded.
spells.name: Arcanopulse

spells.sandescricao: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
spells.descricao: Calls down a barrage of arcane energy, slowing and dealing magic damage to all enemies in an area. Targets in the middle receive additional damage and a stronger slow.
spells.name: Eye of Destruction

spells.sandescricao: Deals magic damage to an enemy and stuns them.
spells.descricao: Xerath fires an orb of raw magic. The first enemy hit takes 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.75) magic damage and is stunned for between 0.5 and 4 seconds. The stun duration lengthens based on how far the orb travels.
spells.name: Shocking Orb

spells.sandescricao: Xerath immobilizes himself and gains numerous long-range barrages.
spells.descricao: Xerath ascends to his true form, becoming rooted in place and gaining 4 Arcane Barrages. This magic artillery deals 0.5 (+0.75) magic damage to all enemies hit.The root ends after 80/120/160/200/240 seconds, when all shots have been fired or when manually deactivated by issuing a move command. If no barrages are fired, 0.1% of the cooldown is refunded.
spells.name: Rite of the Arcane

name: Corki
lore: The yordle pilot Corki loves two things above all others: flying, and his glamorous mustache... though not necessarily in that order. After leaving Bandle City, he settled in Piltover and fell in love with the wondrous machines he found there. He dedicated himself to the development of flying contraptions, leading an aerial defense force of seasoned veterans known as the Screaming Yipsnakes. Calm under fire, Corki patrols the skies around his adopted home, and has never encountered a problem that a good missile barrage couldn't solve.
title: the Daring Bombardier
passiva_descricao: Corki's basic attack deals a percentage of their damage as magic instead of physical. Every once in a while, The Package arrives in Corki's base to be picked up, temporarily granting him out of combat Movement Speed and upgrading Valkyrie into Special Delivery.

spells.sandescricao: Corki fires a flash bomb at a target location, dealing magic damage to enemies in the area. This attack additionally reveals units in the area for a duration.
spells.descricao: Corki lobs a bomb, dealing 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.5) (+0.5/0.5) magic damage to enemies in the target area. In addition, the blast reveals the area and champions hit by the blast for 6 seconds (does not reveal stealth).
spells.name: Phosphorus Bomb

spells.sandescricao: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
spells.descricao: Corki flies a short distance, dropping bombs that create a trail of fire that damages opponents who remain in it.
spells.name: Valkyrie

spells.sandescricao: Corki's gatling gun rapidly fires in a cone in front of him, dealing damage and reducing enemy Armor and Magic Resist.
spells.descricao: Corki's gatling gun fires continuously at targets in front of him for 6 seconds, dealing up to 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.5) damage and reducing up to 0 armor and magic resist.Gatling Gun's damage is 0% physical, 0% magic.Defense reductions last for 0 seconds after last being damaged by Gatling Gun.
spells.name: Gatling Gun

spells.sandescricao: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
spells.descricao: Corki fires a missile toward his target location that explodes on impact, dealing damage to enemies in an area. Corki stores missiles over time, up to a maximum. Every 3rd missile fired will be a Big One, dealing extra damage.
spells.name: Missile Barrage

name: Nautilus
lore: All know the tales; all pay the Bilgewater tithe. Since time immemorial, Nautilus has roamed the dark waters off the coast of the Blue Flame Isles, dragging impious sailors to their doom. The armored goliath strikes without warning, his inexorable footfalls churning the waters, before swinging his enormous anchor upward to shatter mast and keel alike. He then pulls the flotsam beneath the waves to appease the wrath of the Bearded Lady.
title: the Titan of the Depths
passiva_descricao: Nautilus' basic attacks deal bonus physical damage and immobilize his targets. This effect cannot happen more than once every few seconds on the same target.

spells.sandescricao: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits a champion, he drags both himself and the opponent close together. If it hits terrain, Nautilus instead pulls himself to the anchor, the cooldown of Dredge Line is reduced by half, and half the Mana cost is refunded.
spells.descricao: Nautilus hurls his anchor forward. If it hits an enemy unit, Nautilus drags himself and the target together dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.75) magic damage and stunning them briefly.If the anchor hits terrain, Nautilus will drag himself forward, the cooldown is reduced by 50% (0.75/0.5), and 50% of the Mana cost is refunded.
spells.name: Dredge Line

spells.sandescricao: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies, gaining a shield that blocks incoming damage. While the shield persists, his attacks apply a damage over time effect to enemies around his target.
spells.descricao: Nautilus surrounds himself with dark energies for 50 seconds, shielding him from the next 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.75/0.5) (0% of his max Health) damage.While the shield persists, Nautilus' basic attacks deal 50 (+0.75) bonus magic damage over 2 seconds to all enemies around his target.
spells.name: Titan's Wrath

spells.sandescricao: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him in a set of three explosions. Each explosion damages and slows enemies.
spells.descricao: Nautilus slams the ground, causing the earth to explode around him. Each explosion deals 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.75) magic damage to enemies in the area and slows them by 0% for 50 seconds. This slow diminishes over time.A unit can be hit by more than one explosion, but they take 50% less damage from additional explosions.
spells.name: Riptide

spells.sandescricao: Nautilus fires a shockwave into the earth that chases an opponent. This shockwave rips up the earth above it, knocking enemies into the air. When it reaches the opponent, the shockwave erupts, knocking his target into the air and stunning them.
spells.descricao: Nautilus fires a shockwave that chases an enemy champion, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.75) magic damage to other enemies it passes through, knocking them into the air, and stunning them for 0 seconds.The shockwave explodes upon hitting its target dealing 0 (+0.4/0.8) magic damage, launching them into the air and stunning them for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Depth Charge

name: Ahri
lore: Innately connected to the latent power of Runeterra, Ahri is a vastaya who can reshape magic into orbs of raw energy. She revels in toying with her prey by manipulating their emotions before devouring their life essence. Despite her predatory nature, Ahri retains a sense of empathy as she receives flashes of memory from each soul she consumes.
title: the Nine-Tailed Fox
passiva_descricao: Gains a charge of Essence Theft whenever a spell hits an enemy (max: 3 charges per spell). Upon reaching 9 charges, Ahri's next spell heals her whenever it hits an enemy.

spells.sandescricao: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.
spells.descricao: Ahri sends out and pulls back her orb, dealing magic damage on the way out and true damage on the way back. Ahri gains movement speed that decays while her orb is traveling.
spells.name: Orb of Deception

spells.sandescricao: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Ahri releases three fox-fires, that lock onto and attack nearby enemies.
spells.name: Fox-Fire

spells.sandescricao: Ahri blows a kiss that damages and charms an enemy it encounters, causing them to walk harmlessly towards her.
spells.descricao: Blows a kiss dealing 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.35) magic damage and charms an enemy causing them to walk harmlessly towards Ahri for 0 second(s).
spells.name: Charm

spells.sandescricao: Ahri dashes forward and fires essence bolts, damaging 3 nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions). Spirit Rush can be cast up to three times before going on cooldown.
spells.descricao: Nimbly dashes forward firing 3 essence bolts at nearby enemies (prioritizes Champions) dealing 40/65/90/115/140 (+0.35) magic damage. Can be cast up to three times within 10 seconds before going on cooldown.
spells.name: Spirit Rush

name: Jayce
lore: Jayce is a brilliant inventor who has pledged his life to the defense of Piltover and its unyielding pursuit of progress. With his transforming hextech hammer in hand, Jayce uses his strength, courage, and considerable intelligence to protect his hometown. While revered throughout the city as a hero, he hasn't taken well to the attention heroism brings. Still, Jayce's heart is in the right place, and even those who envy his natural skills are grateful for his protection in the City of Progress.
title: the Defender of Tomorrow
passiva_descricao: After casting Transform Jayce gains 40 Movement Speed and can move through units for the next 1.25 seconds.

spells.sandescricao: Hammer Stance: Leaps to an enemy dealing physical damage and slowing enemies. Cannon Stance: Fires an orb of electricity that detonates upon hitting an enemy (or reaching the end of its path) dealing physical damage to all enemies hit.
spells.descricao: Leaps to an enemy dealing 45/80/115/150/185/220 (+1.2) physical damage to nearby enemies and slowing them by 30/35/40/45/50/55% for 2 seconds.
spells.name: To the Skies! / Shock Blast

spells.sandescricao: Hammer Stance: Passive: Restores Mana per strike. Active: Creates a field of lightning damaging nearby enemies for several seconds. Cannon Stance: Gains a burst of energy, increasing Attack Speed to maximum for several attacks.
spells.descricao: Passive: Gains 2 Mana per strike while in Hammer Stance.Active: Creates an electric aura dealing 20/40/60/80/0/0 (+1.2) magic damage over 1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5/2 seconds to nearby enemies.
spells.name: Lightning Field / Hyper Charge

spells.sandescricao: Hammer Stance: Deals magic damage to an enemy and knocks them back a short distance. Cannon Stance: Deploys an Acceleration Gate increasing the Movement Speed of all allied champions who pass through it. If Shock Blast is fired through the gate the missile speed, range, and damage will increase.
spells.descricao: Deals 20/40/60/80/0/0% of the target's maximum health (+1.2) as magic damage and knocks them back a short distance. (45/80/115/150/185/220 Maximum Damage against monsters)
spells.name: Thundering Blow / Acceleration Gate

spells.sandescricao: Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist. Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
spells.descricao: Hammer Stance: Transforms the Mercury Hammer into the Mercury Cannon gaining new abilities and increased range. The first attack in this form reduces the target's Armor and Magic Resist. Cannon Stance: Transforms the Mercury Cannon into the Mercury Hammer gaining new abilities and increasing Armor and Magic Resist. The first attack in this form deals additional magic damage.
spells.name: Mercury Cannon / Mercury Hammer

name: Darius
lore: There is no greater symbol of Noxian might than Darius, the nation's most feared and battle-hardened leader. Rising from humble origins to become the Hand of Noxus, he cleaves through the empire's enemies—many of them Noxians themselves. Knowing that he never doubts his cause is just, and never hesitates once his axe is raised, those who stand against the commander of the Trifarian Legion can expect no mercy.
title: the Hand of Noxus
passiva_descricao: Darius aims his attacks strategically, causing his target to bleed. This effect stacks up to five times. Enemies that reach max Hemorrhage cause Darius to gain Noxian Might, greatly increasing his damage.

spells.sandescricao: Darius winds up and swings his axe in a wide circle. Enemies struck by the blade take more damage than those struck by the handle. Darius heals based on enemy champions hit by the blade.
spells.descricao: After a short delay, Darius swings his axe around himself, striking enemies in its path. Enemies hit by the axe's blade take 40/70/100/130/160 (+1.05) physical damage. Enemies hit by the handle take 35% damage (does not apply Hemorrhage).Darius heals for 12% of his missing Health per enemy champion hit by the blade (max: 36%).
spells.name: Decimate

spells.sandescricao: Darius's next attack strikes an enemy's crucial artery. As they bleed out, their Movement Speed is slowed.
spells.descricao: Darius's next basic attack deals 1.05 physical damage and slows the target by 40/70/100/130/160% for 12 second.Crippling Strike refunds its Mana cost and 99% of its cooldown if it kills the target.
spells.name: Crippling Strike

spells.sandescricao: Darius hones his axe, passively causing his physical damage to ignore a percentage of his target's Armor. When activated, Darius sweeps up his enemies with his axe's hook and pulls them to him.
spells.descricao: Passive: Darius gains 100/110/120/130/140% Armor Penetration.Active: Pulls in all enemies in front of Darius and slows them by 40/70/100/130/160% for 99 second.
spells.name: Apprehend

spells.sandescricao: Darius leaps to an enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing true damage. This damage is increased for each stack of Hemorrhage on the target. If Noxian Guillotine is a killing blow, its cooldown is refreshed for a brief duration.
spells.descricao: Leaps to target enemy champion and strikes a lethal blow, dealing 100/110/120/130/140 (+1.05) true damage. For each stack of Hemorrhage on the target, Noxian Guillotine deals an additional 99% damage.Maximum Damage: 0.75If Noxian Guillotine kills the target, it may be re-cast at no cost within 20 seconds.At rank 3, Noxian Guillotine unlocks - its cooldown resets entirely on kills and it no longer has a Mana cost.
spells.name: Noxian Guillotine

name: Tryndamere
lore: Fueled by unbridled fury and rage, Tryndamere once carved his way through the Freljord, openly challenging the greatest warriors of the north to prepare himself for even darker days ahead. The wrathful barbarian has long sought revenge for the annihilation of his clan, though more recently he has found companionship with Ashe, the Avarosan warmother, and a home with her people. His almost inhuman strength and fortitude is legendary, and has delivered him and his new allies countless victories against the greatest of odds.
title: the Barbarian King
passiva_descricao: Tryndamere gains Fury for each attack, critical strike, and killing blow he makes. Fury passively increases his Critical Strike Chance and can be consumed with his Bloodlust spell.

spells.sandescricao: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
spells.descricao: Tryndamere thrives on the thrills of combat, increasing his Attack Damage as he is more and more wounded. He can cast Bloodlust to consume his Fury and heal himself.
spells.name: Bloodlust

spells.sandescricao: Tryndamere lets out an insulting cry, decreasing surrounding champions' Attack Damage. Enemies with their backs turned to Tryndamere also have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.descricao: Decreases surrounding champions' Attack Damage by 5/10/15/20/25 for 30/40/50/60/70 seconds, and enemies with their backs turned also have their Movement Speed reduced by 0.15/0.2/0.25/0.3/0.35% for 0.5/0.95/1.4/1.85/2.3 seconds.
spells.name: Mocking Shout

spells.sandescricao: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
spells.descricao: Tryndamere slices toward a target unit, dealing damage to enemies in his path.
spells.name: Spinning Slash

spells.sandescricao: Tryndamere's lust for battle becomes so strong that he is unable to die, no matter how wounded he becomes.
spells.descricao: Tryndamere becomes completely immune to death for 30/40/50/60/70 seconds, refusing to be reduced below 0.15/0.2/0.25/0.3/0.35 Health and instantly gaining 5/10/15/20/25 Fury.
spells.name: Undying Rage

name: Janna
lore: Armed with the power of Runeterra's gales, Janna is a mysterious, elemental wind spirit who protects the dispossessed of Zaun. Some believe she was brought into existence by the pleas of Runeterra's sailors who prayed for fair winds as they navigated treacherous waters and braved rough tempests. Her favor and protection has since been called into the depths of Zaun, where Janna has become a beacon of hope to those in need. No one knows where or when she will appear, but more often than not, she's come to help.
title: the Storm's Fury
passiva_descricao: Janna passively gains 8% Movement Speed, and nearby allied champions gain this bonus when moving toward her. Additionally, Janna's basic attacks cause additional magic damage based on her bonus Movement Speed.

spells.sandescricao: By creating a localized change in pressure and temperature, Janna is able to create a small storm that grows in size with time. She can activate the spell again to release the storm. On release this storm will fly towards the direction it was cast in, dealing damage and knocking away any enemies in its path.
spells.descricao: Summons a whirlwind, which deals 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.35) magic damage to enemies in its path and knocks them into the air for 0.5 seconds.The whirlwind can be charged up to 3 seconds. For each second charged, it:Deals 15/20/25/30/35 (+0.35/0.1) bonus damageKnocks up for an additional 0.25 secondsTravels 25% furtherHowling Gale always reaches its destination in 1.5 seconds.Activate again to release the whirlwind early.
spells.name: Howling Gale

spells.sandescricao: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
spells.descricao: Janna summons an air elemental that passively increases her Movement Speed and enables her to pass through units. She may also activate this ability to deal damage and slow an enemy's Movement Speed. The passive is lost while this ability is on cooldown.
spells.name: Zephyr

spells.sandescricao: Janna conjures a defensive gale that shields an ally champion or turret from incoming damage and increases their Attack Damage.
spells.descricao: Shields an allied Champion or turret for 25 seconds. The shield absorbs up to 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.35) damage and grants 15/20/25/30/35 (+0.35/0.1) Attack Damage until it breaks.
spells.name: Eye Of The Storm

spells.sandescricao: Janna surrounds herself in a magical storm, throwing enemies back. After the storm has settled, soothing winds heal nearby allies while the ability is active.
spells.descricao: Summons forth the might of the wind to knock surrounding enemies back and restores 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.35) Health to nearby allies each second for 25 seconds.
spells.name: Monsoon

name: Elise
lore: Elise is a deadly predator who dwells in a shuttered, lightless palace, deep within the oldest city of Noxus. Once mortal, she was the mistress of a powerful house, but the bite of a vile demigod transformed her into something beautiful, yet utterly inhuman—a spider-like creature, drawing unsuspecting prey into her web. To maintain her eternal youth, Elise now prefers to feed upon the naive and the faithless, and there are few who can resist her seductions.
title: the Spider Queen
passiva_descricao: Human Form: When Elise's abilities hit an enemy, she gains a dormant Spiderling. Spider Form: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage and restore health to Elise.

spells.sandescricao: Human Form: Deals damage based upon how high the target's Health is. Spider Form: Lunges at an enemy and deals damage based upon how low their Health is.
spells.descricao: Deals magic damage equal to 40/75/110/145/180 plus 4% (+0.03%) of the target's current health. Maximum bonus against monsters: 75/100/125/150/175.
spells.name: Neurotoxin / Venomous Bite

spells.sandescricao: Human Form: Releases a venom-gorged Spiderling that explodes when it nears a target. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings gain Attack Speed.
spells.descricao: Summons a venom-gorged Spiderling that moves to target location and explodes, dealing 15/20/25/30/35 (+0.03) Magic Damage when it nears an enemy or after 3 seconds.
spells.name: Volatile Spiderling / Skittering Frenzy

spells.sandescricao: Human Form: Stuns the first enemy unit hit and reveals them if they are not stealthed. Spider Form: Elise and her Spiderlings ascend into the air and then descend upon target enemy.
spells.descricao: Stuns the first enemy hit for 60/100/140/180/220 seconds and reveals them if they are not stealthed.
spells.name: Cocoon / Rappel

spells.sandescricao: Transforms into a menacing spider, reducing her attack range in exchange for movement speed, new abilities, and a Spiderling swarm that will attack her foes.
spells.descricao: Elise transforms into a menacing spider, sacrificing 425 attack range in exchange for 15/20/25/30/35 movement speed and access to arachnid abilities. All dormant Spiderlings are awakened and will attack nearby foes.Spiderlings: Spiderlings deal 40/75/110/145/180 (+0.15) damage and take 36/42/48/54/60% reduced damage from multi-target abilities.
spells.name: Spider Form

name: Vayne
lore: Shauna Vayne is a deadly, remorseless Demacian monster hunter, who has dedicated her life to finding and destroying the demon that murdered her family. Armed with a wrist-mounted crossbow and a heart full of vengeance, she is only truly happy when slaying practitioners or creations of the dark arts, striking from the shadows with a flurry of silver bolts.
title: the Night Hunter
passiva_descricao: Vayne ruthlessly hunts evil-doers, gaining 30 movement speed when moving toward nearby enemy champions.

spells.sandescricao: Vayne tumbles, maneuvering to carefully place her next shot. Her next attack critically strikes.
spells.descricao: Vayne rolls a short distance, and deals 0.3/0.35/0.4/0.45/0.5 bonus physical damage on her next basic attack within 7 seconds.Tumble's bonus damage is equal to 50/55/60/65/70% of Vayne's total attack damage.
spells.name: Tumble

spells.sandescricao: Vayne tips her bolts with a rare metal, toxic to evil things. The third consecutive attack or ability against the same target deals a percentage of the target's maximum Health as bonus true damage. (Max: 200 damage vs. Monsters)
spells.descricao: Every third consecutive attack or ability against an enemy deals an additional 50/55/60/65/70% of the enemy's maximum health as true damage (no less than 0).Silver Bolts deals no more than 7 damage against monsters.
spells.name: Silver Bolts

spells.sandescricao: Vayne draws a heavy crossbow from her back, and fires a huge bolt at her target, knocking them back and dealing damage. If they collide with terrain, they are impaled, dealing bonus damage and stunning them.
spells.descricao: Fires a bolt that knocks back a target and deals 50/55/60/65/70 (+0.5) physical damage.If the target collides with terrain, the damage is increased to 0.3/0.35/0.4/0.45/0.5 and the target is stunned for 7 seconds.Condemn's damage is increased by 0% if the target collides with terrain.
spells.name: Condemn

spells.sandescricao: Readying herself for an epic confrontation, Vayne gains increased Attack Damage, Invisibility during Tumble, and triple the bonus Movement Speed from Night Hunter.
spells.descricao: Vayne gains 50/55/60/65/70 bonus attack damage and improvements to Night Hunter and Tumble for 0 seconds. The duration of Final Hour is extended by 0 seconds whenever a champion damaged by Vayne dies within 0 seconds.Night Hunter: Vayne instead gains 0 movement speed.Tumble: Vayne will also gain Invisibility for 7 second when she Tumbles.Stealth - Invisible: Vayne can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.Final Hour's duration can't be increased beyond its original maximum duration.
spells.name: Final Hour

name: Brand
lore: Once a tribesman of the icy Freljord named Kegan Rodhe, the creature known as Brand is a lesson in the temptation of greater power. Seeking one of the legendary World Runes, Kegan betrayed his companions and seized it for himself—and, in an instant, the man was no more. His soul burned away, his body a vessel of living flame, Brand now roams Valoran in search of other Runes, swearing revenge for wrongs he could never possibly have suffered in a dozen mortal lifetimes.
title: the Burning Vengeance
passiva_descricao: Brand's spells light his targets ablaze, dealing 2% of their maximum Health in magic damage over 4 seconds, stacking up to 3 times. If Brand kills an enemy while it is ablaze he regains mana. When Blaze reaches max stacks on a Champion or monster, it becomes unstable. It detonates in 2 seconds, applying spell effects and dealing massive damage in an area around the victim.

spells.sandescricao: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals magic damage. If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.
spells.descricao: Brand launches a ball of fire forward that deals 80/110/140/170/200 (+0.55) magic damage.Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Sear will stun the target for 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Sear

spells.sandescricao: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a target area, dealing magic damage to enemy units within the area. Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage.
spells.descricao: After a short delay, Brand creates a Pillar of Flame at a location, dealing 80/110/140/170/200 (+0.55) magic damage to enemies.Blaze: Units that are ablaze take an additional 25% damage from Pillar of Flame.
spells.name: Pillar of Flame

spells.sandescricao: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing magic damage to them. If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Brand conjures a powerful blast at his target, dealing 80/110/140/170/200 (+0.55) magic damage.Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Conflagration spreads to nearby enemies.
spells.name: Conflagration

spells.sandescricao: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing magic damage each time it bounces, up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions. If a target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow them.
spells.descricao: Brand unleashes a devastating torrent of fire, dealing 80/110/140/170/200 (+0.55) magic damage each time it bounces up to 5 bounces. Bounces prioritize stacking Blaze to max on Champions.Blaze: If the target is ablaze, Pyroclasm will briefly slow the target by 0%.
spells.name: Pyroclasm

name: Zoe
lore: As the embodiment of mischief, imagination, and change, Zoe acts as the cosmic messenger of Targon, heralding major events that reshape worlds. Her mere presence warps the arcane mathematics governing realities, sometimes causing cataclysms without conscious effort or malice. This perhaps explains the breezy nonchalance with which Zoe approaches her duties, giving her plenty of time to focus on playing games, tricking mortals, or otherwise amusing herself. An encounter with Zoe can be joyous and life affirming, but it is always more than it appears and often extremely dangerous.
title: the Aspect of Twilight
passiva_descricao: Zoe's next basic attack after casting a spell deals bonus magic damage.

spells.sandescricao: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.
spells.descricao: Zoe fires a missile that she can redirect in flight. Deals more damage the longer it flies in a straight line.
spells.name: Paddle Star!

spells.sandescricao: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.
spells.descricao: Zoe can pick up the remnants of enemy summoner spell and active item casts and cast them once herself. Whenever she casts a summoner spell, she gains 3 missiles that fire at the nearest target.
spells.name: Spell Thief

spells.sandescricao: Causes the target to become drowsy, then fall asleep. The first source of damage that breaks the sleep is doubled, up to a cap.
spells.descricao: Dropkick a bubble that deals 45/75/105/135/165 (+0.4) magic damage, lingering as a trap if it hits nothing. The bubble's range is extended when flying over a wall.After a delay, the victim falls asleep for 2 seconds. Attacks and spell hits break sleep but deal double damage, up to 0 (+0.4/0.4) bonus true damage.When an enemy champion falls asleep, Sleepy Trouble Bubble's cooldown is reduced by 1.5%.
spells.name: Sleepy Trouble Bubble

spells.sandescricao: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.
spells.descricao: Blink to a nearby position for 1 second. Then blink back.Zoe may cast and attack, but not move, during this time. She can also see over walls.
spells.name: Portal Jump

name: Graves
lore: Malcolm Graves is a renowned mercenary, gambler, and thief—a wanted man in every city and empire he has visited. Even though he has an explosive temper, he possesses a strict sense of criminal honor, often enforced at the business end of his double-barreled shotgun Destiny. In recent years, he has reconciled a troubled partnership with Twisted Fate, and together they have prospered once more in the turmoil of Bilgewater's criminal underbelly.
title: the Outlaw
passiva_descricao: Graves's shotgun holds two shells. After firing them he must reload. Each attack fires several bullets in a cone. Hitting an enemy with multiple bullets does bonus damage. These bullets cannot pass through units.

spells.sandescricao: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
spells.descricao: Graves fires an explosive shell that detonates after 2 seconds, or 0.2 seconds if it strikes terrain.
spells.name: End of the Line

spells.sandescricao: Graves fires a smoke canister at the target area creating a cloud of smoke. Enemies inside the smoke cloud have reduced sight range and Movement Speed.
spells.descricao: Creates a cloud of Black Smoke lasting 4 seconds. Enemies inside Black Smoke cannot see out.Deals 45/60/75/90/105 (+0.6) magic damage and slows by 85/115/145/175/205% on impact.
spells.name: Smoke Screen

spells.sandescricao: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
spells.descricao: Graves dashes forward gaining an Armor boost for several seconds. If Graves dashes towards an enemy champion, gain two stacks of True Grit instead. Hitting enemies with basic attacks lowers the cooldown of this skill and refreshes the resistance boost.
spells.name: Quickdraw

spells.sandescricao: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spells.descricao: Graves fires an explosive shell dealing heavy damage to the first champion it hits. After hitting a champion or reaching the end of its range, the shell explodes dealing damage in a cone.
spells.name: Collateral Damage

name: Soraka
lore: A wanderer from the celestial dimensions beyond Mount Targon, Soraka gave up her immortality to protect the mortal races from their own more violent instincts. She endeavors to spread the virtues of compassion and mercy to everyone she meets—even healing those who would wish harm upon her. And, for all Soraka has seen of this world's struggles, she still believes the people of Runeterra have yet to reach their full potential.
title: the Starchild
passiva_descricao: Soraka runs faster towards nearby low health allies.

spells.sandescricao: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
spells.descricao: A star falls from the sky at the target location dealing magic damage and slowing enemies. If an enemy champion is hit by Starcall, Soraka recovers health and gains movement speed when moving away from enemy champions.
spells.name: Starcall

spells.sandescricao: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
spells.descricao: Soraka sacrifices a portion of her own health to heal another friendly champion.
spells.name: Astral Infusion

spells.sandescricao: Creates a zone at a location that silences all enemies inside. When the zone expires, all enemies still inside are rooted.
spells.descricao: Creates a zone at target location for 1.5 seconds, dealing 30 (+0.35) magic damage to enemy Champions in the cast radius. Enemy Champions standing in the zone are silenced until they leave. When the zone disappears, all enemy Champions still standing in the zone are rooted for 70/110/150/190/230 second(s) and are dealt 0.1 (+0.6) magic damage.
spells.name: Equinox

spells.sandescricao: Soraka fills her allies with hope, instantly restoring health to herself and all friendly champions.
spells.descricao: Calls upon divine powers to restore 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.35) Health to all allied Champions. Wish's power is increased by 50% on each Champion below 40% Health.
spells.name: Wish

name: Xayah
lore: Deadly and precise, Xayah is a vastayan revolutionary waging a personal war to save her people. She uses her speed, guile, and razor-sharp feather blades to cut down anyone who stands in her way. Xayah fights alongside her partner and lover, Rakan, ot protect their dwindling tribe, and restore their race to her vision of its former glory.
title: the Rebel
passiva_descricao: After using an ability, Xayah's next few basic attacks will hit all enemies along their path and dropping Feathers she can recall.

spells.sandescricao: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
spells.descricao: Xayah throws two damaging daggers that also drop Feathers she can recall.
spells.name: Double Daggers

spells.sandescricao: Xayah creates a storm of blades that increase her basic attack speed and damage while granting her movement speed if she attacks a champion.
spells.descricao: Xayah creates a storm of blades for 50 seconds that grant her 90/130/170/210/250% attack speed and cause her basic attacks to strike an additional time for 3500% damage. If Deadly Plumage strikes an enemy champion, Xayah gains 0.33% movement speed for 0.58 seconds.If Rakan is nearby he will also gain the effects of Deadly Plumage.
spells.name: Deadly Plumage

spells.sandescricao: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
spells.descricao: Xayah calls back all her dropped Feathers dealing damage and rooting enemies.
spells.name: Bladecaller

spells.sandescricao: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable and throwing out a fan of daggers, dropping Feathers she can recall.
spells.descricao: Xayah leaps into the air becoming untargetable. She then rains down daggers which deal 90/130/170/210/250 (+1) physical damage and leave behind a line of Feathers.Xayah can move while in the air.
spells.name: Featherstorm

name: Karthus
lore: The harbinger of oblivion, Karthus is an undying spirit whose haunting songs are a prelude to the horror of his nightmarish appearance. The living fear the eternity of undeath, but Karthus sees only beauty and purity in its embrace, a perfect union of life and death. When Karthus emerges from the Shadow Isles, it is to bring the joy of death to mortals, an apostle of the unliving.
title: the Deathsinger
passiva_descricao: Upon dying, Karthus enters a spirit form that allows him to continue casting spells for 7 seconds.

spells.sandescricao: Karthus unleashes a delayed blast at a location, dealing damage to nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Creates a delayed blast at Karthus' cursor position dealing 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.3) magic damage to each nearby enemy.If the blast hits only a single unit it deals double damage.
spells.name: Lay Waste

spells.sandescricao: Karthus creates a passable screen of leeching energy. Any enemy units that walk through the screen have their Movement Speed and Magic Resist reduced for a period.
spells.descricao: Creates a wall that lasts for 0 seconds. Enemies that pass through the wall have their Magic Resist reduced by 40/60/80/100/120% and Movement Speed reduced by 0% for 0 seconds (their Movement Speed gradually recovers over the duration).
spells.name: Wall of Pain

spells.sandescricao: Karthus passively steals energy from his victims, gaining Mana on each kill. Alternatively, Karthus can surround himself in the souls of his prey, dealing damage to nearby enemies, but quickly draining his own Mana.
spells.descricao: Toggle Off: When Karthus kills a unit, he restores 0 Mana.Toggle On: Drains  Mana to deal 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.3) magic damage to nearby enemies each second.
spells.name: Defile

spells.sandescricao: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals damage to all enemy champions.
spells.descricao: After channeling for 3 seconds, Karthus deals 40/60/80/100/120 (+0.3) magic damage to all enemy champions (regardless of distance).
spells.name: Requiem

name: Vladimir
lore: A fiend with a thirst for mortal blood, Vladimir has influenced the affairs of Noxus since the empire's earliest days. In addition to unnaturally extending his life, his mastery of hemomancy allows him to control the minds and bodies of others as easily as his own. In the flamboyant salons of the Noxian aristocracy, this has enabled him to build a fanatical cult of personality around himself—while in the lowest back alleys, it allows him to bleed his enemies dry.
title: the Crimson Reaper
passiva_descricao: Every 40 points of bonus Health gives Vladimir 1 Ability Power and every 1 point of Ability Power gives Vladimir 1.4 bonus Health (does not stack with itself).

spells.sandescricao: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
spells.descricao: Vladimir steals life from the target enemy. When Vladimir's resource is full, Transfusion will benefit from massively increased damage and healing for a brief time.
spells.name: Transfusion

spells.sandescricao: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood, becoming untargetable for 2 seconds. Additionally, enemies on the pool are slowed and Vladimir siphons life from them.
spells.descricao: Vladimir sinks into a pool of blood for 2 seconds, gaining a brief haste and becoming untargetable while slowing enemies above him by 0%.Vladimir deals 80/100/120/140/160 (+0.15) [0% of bonus Health] magic damage over the duration and heals himself for 5% of that amount.Sanguine Pool can be cast while charging Tides of Blood.
spells.name: Sanguine Pool

spells.sandescricao: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.
spells.descricao: Vladimir pays his own health to charge up a reservoir of blood which, when released, deals damage in the area around him but can be blocked by enemy units.
spells.name: Tides of Blood

spells.sandescricao: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.
spells.descricao: Vladimir infects an area with a virulent plague. Affected enemies take increased damage for the duration. After a few seconds, Hemoplague deals magic damage to infected enemies and heals Vladimir for each enemy Champion hit.
spells.name: Hemoplague

name: Zilean
lore: Once a powerful Icathian mage, Zilean became obsessed with the passage of time after witnessing his homeland's destruction by the Void. Unable to spare even a minute to grieve the catastrophic loss, he called upon ancient temporal magic to divine all possible outcomes. Having become functionally immortal, Zilean now drifts through the past, present, and future, bending and warping the flow of time around him, always searching for that elusive moment that will turn back the clock and undo Icathia's destruction.
title: the Chronokeeper
passiva_descricao: Zilean stores time as Experience. When he has enough Experience to finish an ally's level, he can right-click them to impart it. Zilean receives as much Experience as he gives. Cannot be used in combat.

spells.sandescricao: Tosses a bomb to target area that sticks to units that come near it (prioritizes Champions). It detonates after 3 seconds, dealing area of effect damage. If a Time Bomb is detonated early by another Time Bomb, it also stuns enemies.
spells.descricao: Zilean tosses a time-delayed bomb to a location. The bomb sticks to the first unit which comes within a small area around it (prioritizes Champions). After 3 seconds it detonates, dealing 75/115/165/230/300 (+0.9) magic damage to all surrounding enemies. Placing two bombs on a unit detonates the first bomb early, stunning all enemies in the blast for 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Time Bomb

spells.sandescricao: Zilean can prepare himself for future confrontations, reducing the cooldowns of his other basic abilities.
spells.descricao: Reduces Zilean's other basic spell cooldowns by 3 seconds.
spells.name: Rewind

spells.sandescricao: Zilean bends time around any unit, decreasing an enemy's Movement Speed or increasing an ally's Movement Speed for a short time.
spells.descricao: Zilean increases an allied champion's Movement Speed, or slows an enemy champion, by 3% for 75/115/165/230/300 seconds.
spells.name: Time Warp

spells.sandescricao: Zilean places a protective time rune on an allied champion, teleporting the champion back in time if they take lethal damage.
spells.descricao: Zilean marks himself or an allied champion with a protective time rune for 3 seconds. If the target would take lethal damage, they are instead transported back in time, arriving with 75/115/165/230/300 (+0.9) Health.
spells.name: Chronoshift

name: Katarina
lore: Decisive in judgment and lethal in combat, Katarina is a Noxian assassin of the highest caliber. Eldest daughter to the legendary General Du Couteau, she made her talents known with swift kills against unsuspecting enemies. Her fiery ambition has driven her to pursue heavily-guarded targets, even at the risk of endangering her allies—but no matter the mission, Katarina will not hesitate to execute her duty amid a whirlwind of serrated daggers.
title: the Sinister Blade
passiva_descricao: Whenever an enemy champion dies that Katarina has damaged in the last 3 seconds, her ability cooldowns are reduced by 15 seconds. If Katarina picks up a Dagger, she uses it to slash through all nearby enemies, dealing magic damage.

spells.sandescricao: Katarina throws a Dagger at the target that then bounces to nearby enemies before ricocheting onto the ground.
spells.descricao: Katarina throws a Dagger, dealing 75/105/135/165/195 (+0.3) magic damage to the target and 2 nearby enemies. The dagger then ricochets onto the ground behind the primary target.The dagger always lands 350 units on the opposite side from where it struck the first target, getting there in the same amount of time regardless of how many times it bounces.
spells.name: Bouncing Blade

spells.sandescricao: Katarina gains a burst of movement speed, tossing a Dagger into the air directly above herself.
spells.descricao: Katarina tosses a Dagger into the air and gains 2% decaying movement speed over 350 seconds.
spells.name: Preparation

spells.sandescricao: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
spells.descricao: Katarina blinks to the target, striking it if its an enemy, or striking the nearest enemy otherwise.
spells.name: Shunpo

spells.sandescricao: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
spells.descricao: Katarina becomes a flurry of blades, dealing massive magic damage while she channels to the 3 nearest enemy champions.
spells.name: Death Lotus

name: Shyvana
lore: Shyvana is a creature with the magic of a rune shard burning within her heart. Though she often appears humanoid, she can take her true form as a fearsome dragon, incinerating her foes with fiery breath. Having saved the life of the crown prince Jarvan IV, Shyvana now serves uneasily in his royal guard, struggling to find acceptance among the suspicious people of Demacia.
title: the Half-Dragon
passiva_descricao: Shyvana deals bonus damage to dragons and gains Armor and Magic Resistance. As Shyvana and her allies slay more dragons, she gains more bonus Armor and Magic Resistance.

spells.sandescricao: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
spells.descricao: Shyvana strikes twice on her next attack. Basic attacks reduce the cooldown of Twin Bite by 0.5 seconds. Dragon Form: Twin Bite cleaves all units in front Shyvana.
spells.name: Twin Bite

spells.sandescricao: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
spells.descricao: Shyvana surrounds herself in fire, dealing magic damage per second to nearby enemies and moving faster for 3 seconds, part of this damage is applied again when Shyvana basic attacks an enemy with Burnout active. The Movement Speed reduces over the duration of the spell. Basic attacks extend the duration of Burnout. Dragon Form: Burnout grows in size.
spells.name: Burnout

spells.sandescricao: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
spells.descricao: Shyvana unleashes a fireball that deals damage to all enemies it encounters and leaves cinders on the target, marking them for 5 seconds. Shyvana's basic attacks on marked targets deal a percentage of their maximum Health as damage on-hit. Dragon Form: Flame Breath explodes on impact or at target location, dealing bonus damage and scorching the earth for a short duration.
spells.name: Flame Breath

spells.sandescricao: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location. Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
spells.descricao: Shyvana transforms into a dragon and takes flight to a target location. Enemies along her path take damage and are knocked toward her target location. Shyvana passively gains Fury per second and gains 2 Fury on basic attack.
spells.name: Dragon's Descent

name: Warwick
lore: Warwick is a monster who hunts the gray alleys of Zaun. Transformed by agonizing experiments, his body is fused with an intricate system of chambers and pumps, machinery filling his veins with alchemical rage. Bursting out of the shadows, he preys upon those criminals who terrorize the city's depths. Warwick is drawn to blood, and driven mad by its scent. None who spill it can escape him.
title: the Uncaged Wrath of Zaun
passiva_descricao: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.

spells.sandescricao: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
spells.descricao: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target. While the key is held down, he will attach to the target then leap behind them.On release, deals 1.2+1.2/0.9 plus 6/7/8/9/10% of your target's maximum health as magic damage (applies On Hit effects). Heal 30/40/50/60/70% of damage dealt.While attached, Warwick follows any movements they make and cannot be displaced.
spells.name: Jaws of the Beast

spells.sandescricao: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining movement speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 20% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
spells.descricao: Passive: Warwick gains 100/150/200/250/300% attack speed against enemies below 50% health. He also senses low health champions globally, moving 6/7/8/9/10% faster toward them when out of combat. These bonuses are tripled against enemies below 20% health.Active: Warwick briefly senses all enemies. The nearest sensed champion is Blood Hunted for 8 seconds. Cast only while not in combat with a champion.While no enemies are being hunted, Blood Hunt cools down twice as fast.
spells.name: Blood Hunt

spells.sandescricao: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
