spells.descricao: Warwick gains 6/7/8/9/10% damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end of the duration, or if activated again, Warwick howls, causing all nearby enemies to flee for 30/40/50/60/70 second.
spells.name: Primal Howl

spells.sandescricao: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus movement speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
spells.descricao: Warwick leaps 2.5 seconds worth of movement speed in a direction, suppressing the first champion he collides with for 100/150/200/250/300 seconds. Deals 300 (+1.2) magic damage and applies on-hit effects 3 times. Warwick heals for 100% of all damage he deals during Infinite Duress.
spells.name: Infinite Duress

name: Ziggs
lore: With a love of big bombs and short fuses, the yordle Ziggs is an explosive force of nature. As an inventor's assistant in Piltover, he was bored by his predictable life and befriended a mad, blue-haired bomber named Jinx. After a wild night on the town, Ziggs took her advice and moved to Zaun, where he now explores his fascinations more freely, terrorizing the chem-barons and regular citizens alike in his never ending quest to blow stuff up.
title: the Hexplosives Expert
passiva_descricao: Every 12 seconds, Ziggs' next basic attack deals bonus magic damage. This cooldown is reduced whenever Ziggs uses an ability.

spells.sandescricao: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals magic damage.
spells.descricao: Ziggs throws a bouncing bomb that deals 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.65) magic damage.
spells.name: Bouncing Bomb

spells.sandescricao: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
spells.descricao: Ziggs flings an explosive charge that detonates after 4 seconds, or when this ability is activated again. The explosion deals magic damage to enemies, knocking them away. Ziggs is also knocked away, but takes no damage. Ziggs can use the Satchel to hexplode vulnerable enemy turrets.
spells.name: Satchel Charge

spells.sandescricao: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing magic damage and slowing.
spells.descricao: Ziggs scatters proximity mines that detonate on enemy contact, dealing 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.65) magic damage. Enemies hit are slowed by 850% for 225 seconds.Enemies triggering a mine take 150% damage from additional mines. Mines disarm automatically after 325 seconds.
spells.name: Hexplosive Minefield

spells.sandescricao: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take more damage than those farther away.
spells.descricao: Ziggs deploys his ultimate creation, the Mega Inferno Bomb, hurling it an enormous distance. Enemies in the primary blast zone take 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.65) magic damage. Enemies farther away take two-thirds damage.
spells.name: Mega Inferno Bomb

name: Kled
lore: A warrior as fearless as he is ornery, the yordle Kled embodies the furious bravado of Noxus. He is an icon beloved by the empire's soldiers, distrusted by its officers, and loathed by the nobility. Many claim Kled has fought in every campaign the legions have waged, has “acquired” every military title, and has never once backed down from a fight. Though the truth of the matter is often questionable, one part of his legend is undeniable: Charging into battle on his un-trusty steed, Skaarl, Kled fights to protect what's his… and to take whatever he can get.
title: the Cantankerous Cavalier
passiva_descricao: Kled rides his trusty steed, Skaarl, who takes damage for him. When Skaarl's health depletes, Kled dismounts. While dismounted, Kled's abilities change and he deals less damage to champions. Kled can restore Skaarl's courage by fighting enemies. At maximum courage, Kled remounts with a portion of Skaarl's health.

spells.sandescricao: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled. When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
spells.descricao: Kled throws a bear trap that damages and hooks an enemy champion. If shackled for a short duration, the target takes additional physical damage and is yanked toward Kled. When dismounted, this ability is replaced by Pocket Pistol, a ranged gun blast that knocks back Kled and restores courage.
spells.name: Bear Trap on a Rope

spells.sandescricao: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
spells.descricao: Kled gains massive attack speed for four attacks. The fourth attack deals more damage.
spells.name: Violent Tendencies

spells.sandescricao: Kled dashes, dealing physical damage and gaining a short burst of speed. Kled can cast this ability again to dash back through his initial target, dealing the same damage.
spells.descricao: Kled dashes, dealing 60/110/160/210/260 (+0.6) physical damage to enemies in his path. Cannot cross walls.If Jousting hits an enemy champion or large monster, Kled gains 40/45/50/55/60% movement speed for 2 second and True Sight of the target. He can cast this ability again within 9/8.5/8/7.5/7 seconds to dash back through the same target, dealing the same damage.
spells.name: Jousting

spells.sandescricao: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
spells.descricao: Kled and Skaarl charge to a location, leaving a speed-granting trail behind them and gaining a shield. Skaarl locks onto and rams the first enemy champion encountered.
spells.name: Chaaaaaaaarge!!!

name: Kha'Zix
lore: The Void grows, and the Void adapts—in none of its myriad spawn are these truths more apparent than Kha'Zix. Evolution drives the core of this mutating horror, born to survive and to slay the strong. Where it struggles to do so, it grows new, more effective ways to counter and kill its prey. Initially a mindless beast, Kha'Zix's intelligence has developed as much as its form. Now, the creature plans out its hunts, and even utilizes the visceral terror it engenders in its victims.
title: the Voidreaver
passiva_descricao: When Kha'Zix is not visible to the enemy team, he gains Unseen Threat, causing his next basic attack against an enemy Champion to deal bonus magic damage and slow.

spells.sandescricao: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
spells.descricao: Deals physical damage to the target. Damage increased on Isolated targets. If he chooses to Evolve Reaper Claws, this refunds a percent of it's cooldown against Isolated targets. Kha'Zix also gains increased range on his basic attacks and Taste Their Fear.
spells.name: Taste Their Fear

spells.sandescricao: Kha'Zix fires exploding spikes that deal physical damage to enemies hit. Kha'Zix is healed if he is also within the explosion radius. If he chooses to Evolve Spike Racks, Void Spike now fires three spikes in a cone, slow enemies hit, and reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for extra.
spells.descricao: Fires exploding spikes, dealing 65/90/115/140/165 (+1.1) physical damage to enemies hit (0% bonus damage to monsters). Heals Kha'Zix for 65 (+1/0.5) if he is within the explosion radius.Evolved Spike Racks: Void Spike fires three spikes in a cone and slows targets hit by 50% for 45 seconds. Reveals enemy champions hit for 2 seconds. Isolated targets are slowed for 0% instead.
spells.name: Void Spike

spells.sandescricao: Kha'Zix leaps to an area, dealing physical damage upon landing. If he chooses to Evolve Wings, Leap's range increases by 200 and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
spells.descricao: Leaps to target area, dealing 65/90/115/140/165 (+1.1) physical damage.Evolved Wings: Increases Leap's range by 200, and the cooldown resets on champion kill or assist.
spells.name: Leap

spells.sandescricao: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.
spells.descricao: Each rank allows Kha'Zix to evolve one of his abilities, giving it a unique additional effect. When activated, Kha'Zix becomes Invisible, triggering Unseen Threat and increasing Movement Speed. If he chooses to Evolve Adaptive Cloaking, while out of combat Kha'Zix also passively gains Void Assault upon entering a new brush.
spells.name: Void Assault

name: Olaf
lore: An unstoppable force of destruction, the axe-wielding Olaf wants nothing but to die in glorious combat. Hailing from the brutal Freljordian peninsula of Lokfar, he once received a prophecy foretelling his peaceful passing—a coward's fate, and a great insult among his people. Seeking death, and fueled by rage, he rampaged across the land, slaughtering scores of great warriors and legendary beasts in search of any opponent who could stop him. Now a brutal enforcer for the Winter's Claw, he seeks his end in the great wars to come.
title: the Berserker
passiva_descricao: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased by 1% for each 1% of his Health he is missing.

spells.sandescricao: Olaf throws an axe into the ground at a target location, dealing damage to enemies it passes through and slowing their Movement Speed. If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
spells.descricao: Olaf throws an axe to target location, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+1) physical damage to units it passes through and slowing them by 29/33/37/41/45% for up to 2.5 seconds. The further the Axe flies, the longer the slow lasts, but it is never less than 1.5 seconds.If Olaf picks up the axe, the ability's cooldown is reduced by 4.5 seconds.
spells.name: Undertow

spells.sandescricao: Olaf's Attack Speed is increased, he gains Life Steal and has increased healing from all sources based on how much Health he is missing.
spells.descricao: For 6 seconds, Olaf gains 29/33/37/41/45% Life Steal and his Attack Speed is increased by 80/125/170/215/260%.During this time, Olaf also receives 1% increased healing from all sources for every 2.5% of Health he is missing.
spells.name: Vicious Strikes

spells.sandescricao: Olaf attacks with such force that it deals true damage to his target and himself, refunding the Health cost if he destroys the target.
spells.descricao: Olaf ferociously swings his axes, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+1) true damage to his target. This ability's cost is equal to 29/33/37/41/45% of the total damage dealt, but the cost is refunded if it kills the target.Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Reckless Swing by 1 second.
spells.name: Reckless Swing

spells.sandescricao: Olaf temporarily becomes immune to disables.
spells.descricao: Passive: Olaf gains 80/125/170/215/260 Armor and 40/50/60/70/80 Magic Resist.Active: Olaf removes all disables from himself and becomes immune to them for the next 29/33/37/41/45 seconds. Olaf also receives a 800% Movement Speed bonus towards enemy champions for 1.5 second. During this time, Olaf loses the passive portion of Ragnarok and gains 2.5 Attack Damage.
spells.name: Ragnarok

name: Twisted Fate
lore: Twisted Fate is an infamous cardsharp and swindler who has gambled and charmed his way across much of the known world, earning the enmity and admiration of the rich and foolish alike. He rarely takes things seriously, greeting each day with a mocking smile and an insouciant swagger. In every possible way, Twisted Fate always has an ace up his sleeve.
title: the Card Master
passiva_descricao: Upon killing a unit, Twisted Fate rolls his 'lucky' dice receiving anywhere between 1 and 6 bonus gold.

spells.sandescricao: Twisted Fate throws three cards, dealing damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
spells.descricao: Throws three cards that deal 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.65) Magic Damage to each enemy unit they pass through.
spells.name: Wild Cards

spells.sandescricao: Twisted Fate chooses a magic card from his deck, and uses that for his next attack, causing bonus effects.
spells.descricao: Cast once to shuffle the deck and again to choose your card, enhancing your next attack.Blue Card deals 60/105/150/195/240 (+1) (+0.65) Magic Damage and restores 0 Mana.Red Card deals 0 (+1/0.5/1) (+1/0.5) Magic Damage to units around the target and slows their Movement Speed by 0% for 2.5 seconds.Gold Card deals 0 (+1/0.5/1/0.5/1) (+1/0.5/1/0.5) Magic Damage and stuns for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Pick A Card

spells.sandescricao: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals bonus damage. In addition, his Attack Speed is increased.
spells.descricao: Passive: Every 4 attacks, Twisted Fate deals an additional 60/105/150/195/240 (+0.65) Magic Damage.In addition, his Attack Speed is increased by 0%.
spells.name: Stacked Deck

spells.sandescricao: Twisted Fate predicts the fortunes of his foes, revealing all enemy champions and enabling the use of Gate, which teleports Twisted Fate to any target location in 1.5 seconds.
spells.descricao: Grants True Sight all enemy champions on the map for 60/105/150/195/240 seconds.While Destiny is active, Twisted Fate can teleport up to 0 units away in 1.5 seconds.
spells.name: Destiny

name: Nunu
lore: Frolicking through the hills of the Freljord, Nunu and Willump make an unlikely pair, but many travellers would swear they have seen the yeti with a fearless boy clinging to his back. Though Nunu may have tamed the beast's heart, Willump's anger remains, fueled by a ravenous hunger. Some have even tried to separate the two, yet the bond of friendship between them is stronger than any chain, and they continue to ramble on their wild adventures.
title: the Yeti Rider
passiva_descricao: After 5 attacks, Nunu's next spell costs no Mana and is empowered to do its next rank's effects.

spells.sandescricao: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
spells.descricao: Nunu commands the yeti to take a bite out of a target minion or monster, dealing heavy damage to it and healing himself.
spells.name: Consume

spells.sandescricao: Nunu invigorates himself and an allied unit by heating their blood, increasing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
spells.descricao: The heat of Nunu and a target ally's blood rises, increasing Movement Speed by 50/100/150/200/250% and Attack Speed by 340/500/660/820/980% for 120/150/180/210/240 seconds.If Nunu targets himself, Blood Boil will try to target the nearest Ally champion.
spells.name: Blood Boil

spells.sandescricao: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing damage and temporarily slowing their Movement and Attack Speeds.
spells.descricao: Nunu launches a ball of ice at an enemy unit, dealing 340/500/660/820/980 (+0.75) magic damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 50/100/150/200/250% and Attack Speed by 120/150/180/210/240% for 0 seconds.
spells.name: Ice Blast

spells.sandescricao: Nunu begins to sap the area of heat, slowing all nearby enemies. When Absolute Zero ends, he deals massive damage to all enemies caught in the area.
spells.descricao: Nunu begins to sap the area of heat, slowing all nearby enemies. When Absolute Zero ends, he deals massive damage to all enemies caught in the area.
spells.name: Absolute Zero

name: Rengar
lore: Rengar is a ferocious vastayan trophy hunter who lives for the thrill of tracking down and killing dangerous creatures. He scours the world for the most fearsome beasts he can find, especially seeking any trace of Kha'Zix, the void creature who scratched out his eye. Rengar stalks his prey neither for food nor glory, but for the sheer beauty of the pursuit.
title: the Pridestalker
passiva_descricao: While in brush, Rengar leaps at his target with his basic attack. Rengar's abilities build Ferocity. Upon reaching full Ferocity, his next ability becomes empowered and grants him Movement Speed on cast, but he instantly loses all Ferocity if he leaves combat. Killing enemy champions awards trophies on Rengar's Bonetooth Necklace, permanently increasing his Attack Damage.

spells.sandescricao: Rengar slashes all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line. Casting this outside the max range moves Rengar a short distance in that direction. Ferocity effect: deals increased damage.
spells.descricao: Rengar slashes all enemies in an arc before piercing all enemies in a line. Casting this outside the max range moves Rengar a short distance in that direction. Ferocity effect: deals increased damage.
spells.name: Savagery

spells.sandescricao: Rengar lets out a battle roar, damaging enemies and healing for some of the recent damage he has taken. Ferocity effect: additionally breaks crowd control effects.
spells.descricao: Deals 30/50/70/90/110 (+0.8) magic damage to nearby enemies and heals Rengar for 0.3% of the damage he took in the last 350 seconds.Ferocity effect: Deals 1 (+0.8/0.8) magic damage and removes existing crowd control effects, in addition to its normal effect.Damage healed from monster attacks is increased by 150%.
spells.name: Battle Roar

spells.sandescricao: Rengar throws a bola, slowing the first target hit for a short duration. Ferocity effect: roots the target.
spells.descricao: Throw a bola, dealing 30/50/70/90/110 (+0.8) physical damage and slowing the first enemy hit by 0.3% for 350 seconds.Ferocity effect:Deals 1 (+0.8/0.8) physical damage and roots the target for 90 seconds.
spells.name: Bola Strike

spells.sandescricao: Rengar's predatory instincts take over, Camouflaging him and revealing the nearest enemy champion in a large radius around him. During Thrill of the Hunt, Rengar gains Movement Speed and he can leap to the tracked enemy for a guaranteed critical strike, even without being in brush.
spells.descricao: Rengar gains 30/50/70/90/110% Movement Speed and True Sight of the nearest enemy champion (within 350 range) for 0.3 seconds.After the first 0.15 seconds, Rengar becomes Camouflaged and can leap to an enemy without being in brush. Leaping to the nearest champion results in a critical strike.Attacking or casting most spells ends Thrill of the Hunt.Stealth - Camouflaged: This character is hidden from view. It is revealed by nearby enemy champions and turrets.
spells.name: Thrill of the Hunt

name: Bard
lore: A traveler from beyond the stars, Bard is an agent of serendipity who fights to maintain a balance where life can endure the indifference of chaos. Many Runeterrans sing songs that ponder his extraordinary nature, yet they all agree that the cosmic vagabond is drawn to artifacts of great magical power. Surrounded by a jubilant choir of helpful spirit meeps, it is impossible to mistake his actions as malevolent, as Bard always serves the greater good... in his own odd way.
title: the Wandering Caretaker
passiva_descricao: Bard's presence causes magical chimes to appear, which grant Bard experience, mana, and a burst of speed. Additionally, lesser spirits follow Bard and aid in his attacks - collecting chimes causes these meeps to gain power over the course of the game.

spells.sandescricao: Bard fires a missile which will slow the first enemy struck, and continue onward. If it strikes a wall, it will stun the initial target; if it strikes another enemy, it will stun them both.
spells.descricao: Bard fires an energy bolt, dealing 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.65) magic damage to one or two enemies. The first target hit will be slowed by 60% for 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 second(s).If the bolt hits another enemy or a wall, any enemies hit are stunned for 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8 second(s).
spells.name: Cosmic Binding

spells.sandescricao: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
spells.descricao: Reveals a healing shrine which powers up over a short time, disappearing after healing the first ally that touches it.
spells.name: Caretaker's Shrine

spells.sandescricao: Bard opens a portal in nearby terrain. Allies and enemies alike can take a one-way trip through that terrain by moving into the portal.
spells.descricao: Bard opens a one-way corridor through nearby terrain. Both allies and enemies can use the corridor by right-clicking on any part of it while near its entrance, with allies travelling 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8% faster than enemies.The corridor disappears after 80/125/170/215/260 seconds.
spells.name: Magical Journey

spells.sandescricao: Bard sends spirit energy arcing to a location, putting all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets hit into stasis for a brief time.
spells.descricao: Bard sends magical energy arcing to a target location. On impact, all champions, minions, monsters, and turrets in the target area are put in stasis, becoming invincible, untargetable, and unable to act for 80/125/170/215/260 seconds.Epic monsters are also put into stasis, despite normally being immune to disables.
spells.name: Tempered Fate

name: Irelia
lore: Raised in the shadow of Noxian occupation, Irelia developed one of the most exotic—and deadly—fighting styles in Ionia. While most of her family died at the hands of the invaders, she survived and learned to wield her levitating blades with nothing but her own determined spirit. She remains a fierce symbol of the resistance, ready to strike down any tyrant who may reach the shores of her homeland.
title: the Will of the Blades
passiva_descricao: Irelia reduces the duration of disables on herself based on whether she is Outnumbered by nearby champions. If she's in an even fight, she'll reduce disables by a small amount, if she's outnumbered, she'll reduce disables by a larger amount.

spells.sandescricao: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds a portion of the Mana Cost.
spells.descricao: Irelia dashes forward to strike her target. If it kills the target, Bladesurge's cooldown refreshes and refunds a portion of the Mana Cost.
spells.name: Bladesurge

spells.sandescricao: Irelia is skilled in the art of Hiten, passively giving her physical attacks Health restoration. Activating Hiten Style doubles her Health restoration and gives her basic attacks true damage.
spells.descricao: Passive: Basic attacks restore 20/50/80/110/140 Health.Active: Irelia's basic attacks deal 35 true damage and Hiten Style restores twice as much health for 1400 seconds.
spells.name: Hiten Style

spells.sandescricao: Irelia's attack balances the scales, dealing damage and slowing the target. However, if the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, then the blow stuns the target instead of slowing.
spells.descricao: Irelia pierces her target, dealing 20/50/80/110/140 (+0.5) magic damage and slowing them by 1400% for 35 second(s).If the target has a higher Health % than Irelia, she stuns them for the duration instead.
spells.name: Equilibrium Strike

spells.sandescricao: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal physical damage and siphon life from enemies they pass through.
spells.descricao: Irelia summons 4 spirit blades that she can fling to deal 20/50/80/110/140 (+0.7) (+0.5) physical damage to enemies they pass through. She heals for 1400% of the damage dealt against champions. (0% vs. minions and monsters)
spells.name: Transcendent Blades

name: Ivern
lore: Ivern Bramblefoot, known to many as the Green Father, is a peculiar half man, half tree who roams Runeterra's forests, cultivating life everywhere he goes. He knows the secrets of the natural world, and holds deep friendships with all things that grow, fly, and scuttle. Ivern wanders the wilderness, imparting strange wisdom to any he meets, enriching the forests, and occasionally entrusting loose-lipped butterflies with his secrets.
title: the Green Father
passiva_descricao: Ivern cannot attack or be attacked by non-epic monsters. Ivern can create magical groves on jungle camps which grow over time. When the grove is fully grown, Ivern may free the monsters to receive gold and experience. After level 5 Ivern can share jungle buffs with allies.

spells.sandescricao: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.
spells.descricao: Ivern conjures a vine, dealing damage and rooting enemy targets hit. Ivern's allies can dash to the rooted target.
spells.name: Rootcaller

spells.sandescricao: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.
spells.descricao: In brush, Ivern's attacks are ranged and deal bonus magic damage. Ivern can activate this ability to create a patch of brush.
spells.name: Brushmaker

spells.sandescricao: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
spells.descricao: Ivern places a shield on an ally which explodes after a short duration slowing and damaging enemies.
spells.name: Triggerseed

spells.sandescricao: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
spells.descricao: Ivern summons his Sentinel friend Daisy to fight with him. Daisy will send out a shockwave if she attacks the same champion three times in a row.
spells.name: Daisy!

name: Wukong
lore: Wukong is a vastayan trickster who uses his strength, agility, and intelligence to confuse his opponents and gain the upper hand. After finding a lifelong friend in the warrior known as Master Yi, Wukong became the last student of the ancient martial art known as Wuju. Armed with an enchanted staff, Wukong seeks to prevent Ionia from falling to ruin.
title: the Monkey King
passiva_descricao: Increases Wukong's Armor and Magic Resist for each nearby enemy champion.

spells.sandescricao: Wukong's next attack deals additional physical damage, gains range, and reduces the enemy's Armor for a short duration.
spells.descricao: Wukong's next attack gains 125 range, deals 30/60/90/120/150 (+0.1) bonus physical damage and reduces the enemy's Armor by 10/15/20/25/30% for 3 seconds.
spells.name: Crushing Blow

spells.sandescricao: Wukong becomes Invisible for a short duration, leaving behind a decoy that will deal Magic Damage to enemies near it when Wukong's stealth expires.
spells.descricao: Wukong becomes Invisible for 10/15/20/25/30 seconds, leaving behind a decoy that will deal 30/60/90/120/150 (+0.1) Magic Damage to enemies near it after 1.5 seconds. Stealth - Invisible: Wukong can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
spells.name: Decoy

spells.sandescricao: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies near his target, dealing physical damage to each enemy struck.
spells.descricao: Wukong dashes to target enemy and sends out images to attack up to 2 additional enemies nearby. Each enemy struck takes 30/60/90/120/150 (+0.1) physical damage. Wukong then gains 10/15/20/25/30% Attack Speed for 3 seconds.
spells.name: Nimbus Strike

spells.sandescricao: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around, dealing damage and knocking up enemies. Wukong gains Movement Speed over the duration of the spell.
spells.descricao: Wukong's staff grows outward and he spins it around for 4 seconds, dealing 30/60/90/120/150 (+0.1) physical damage per second to nearby enemies, knocking them up for 125 second the first time they get hit.At the start, Wukong gains 10/15/20/25/30% Movement Speed, and he gains an additional 3% per second over the duration.
spells.name: Cyclone

name: Ashe
lore: Iceborn warmother of the Avarosan tribe, Ashe commands the most populous horde in the north. Stoic, intelligent, and idealistic, yet uncomfortable with her role as leader, she taps into the ancestral magics of her lineage to wield a bow of True Ice. With her people's belief that she is the mythological hero Avarosa reincarnated, Ashe hopes to unify the Freljord once more by retaking their ancient, tribal lands.
title: the Frost Archer
passiva_descricao: Ashe's attacks slow their target, causing her to deal increased damage to these targets. Ashe's critical strikes deal no bonus damage but apply an empowered slow to the target.

spells.sandescricao: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
spells.descricao: Ashe builds up Focus by attacking. At maximum Focus, Ashe can cast Ranger's Focus to consume all stacks of Focus, temporarily increasing her Attack Speed and transforming her basic attack into a powerful flurry attack for the duration.
spells.name: Ranger's Focus

spells.sandescricao: Ashe fires 9 arrows in a cone for increased damage. Also applies Frost Shot.
spells.descricao: Fires arrows in a cone, each dealing 4 (+1) physical damage. Enemies can block multiple arrows, but only take damage from the first.Champion hits count as Critical Strikes for the purposes of Frost Shot.
spells.name: Volley

spells.sandescricao: Ashe sends her Hawk Spirit on a scouting mission anywhere on the map.
spells.descricao: Reveals terrain as it flies toward target location anywhere on the map. Grants vision for 20/25/30/35/40 seconds. Ashe can store up to 2 charges of Hawkshot.
spells.name: Hawkshot

spells.sandescricao: Ashe fires a missile of ice in a straight line. If the arrow collides with an enemy Champion, it deals damage and stuns the Champion, stunning for longer the farther arrow has traveled. In addition, surrounding enemy units take damage and are slowed.
spells.descricao: Launches a crystal arrow of ice that stuns the first enemy Champion hit, dealing 4 (+1) magic damage. The farther the arrow flies, the longer the stun, up to 4 seconds. Surrounding enemies take half damage.
spells.name: Enchanted Crystal Arrow

name: Kalista
lore: A specter of wrath and retribution, Kalista is the undying spirit of vengeance, an armored nightmare summoned from the Shadow Isles to hunt deceivers and traitors. The betrayed may cry out in blood to be avenged, but Kalista only answers those willing to pay with their very souls. Those who become the focus of Kalista's wrath should make their final peace, for any pact sealed with this grim hunter can only end with the cold, piercing fire of her soul-spears.
title: the Spear of Vengeance
passiva_descricao: Enter a movement command while winding up Kalista's basic attack or Pierce to lunge a short distance when she launches her attack.

spells.sandescricao: Throw a fast moving spear that passes through enemies it kills.
spells.descricao: Hurl a fast but narrow spear that deals 10/70/130/190/250 (+1) physical damage. Triggers Martial Poise (P), Sentinel (W), and Rend (E).If it kills a target, Pierce continues onward, passing all stacks of Rend to the next target.
spells.name: Pierce

spells.sandescricao: Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
spells.descricao: Passively gain Attack Speed when near her Oathsworn ally, and deal bonus damage when striking the same target. Activate to send a soul to scout out the path, revealing the area in front of it.
spells.name: Sentinel

spells.sandescricao: Attacks impale their targets with spears. Activate to rip the spears out, slowing and dealing escalating damage.
spells.descricao: Passive: Kalista's spears pierce their target, lingering for 4 seconds.Active: Rip the spears from nearby targets, dealing 10/70/130/190/250 (+1) physical damage and slowing their Movement Speed by 0% for 0 seconds.If Rend kills at least one target, its cooldown is reset and its mana cost is refunded.
spells.name: Rend

spells.sandescricao: Kalista teleports the Oathsworn ally to herself. They gain the ability to dash toward a position, knocking enemy champions back.
spells.descricao: Draw Kalista's Oathsworn to her. For up to 4 seconds, the Oathsworn is untargetable and pacified.The Oathsworn may mouse click to fly toward target position, stopping at the first enemy champion hit and knocking all enemies in a small radius back.Kalista's Oathsworn must be within 1100 units for her to cast this ability.
spells.name: Fate's Call

name: Akali
lore: A prodigy in the fighting arts, Akali is a member of the martial order known as the Kinkou. She succeeds her mother as the Fist of Shadow, entrusted with the sacred duty to end those who would bring imbalance to her homeland. While some find her methods extreme, Akali is judicious in maintaining harmony across Ionia.
title: the Fist of Shadow
passiva_descricao: Akali's first two attacks are empowered. The first strike heals her, and the second strike deals bonus magic damage. Twin Disciplines will recharge itself automatically a short while after being used.

spells.sandescricao: Akali spins her kama at a target enemy to deal Magic Damage and mark the target for 6 seconds. Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will trigger and consume the mark to cause additional damage and restore Energy.
spells.descricao: Akali throws her kama at a target enemy to deal 35/55/75/95/115 (+0.4) magic damage and mark the target for 6 seconds.Akali's melee attacks against a marked target will consume the mark to deal 45/70/95/120/145 (+0.4/0.5) magic damage and restore 40 energy.
spells.name: Mark of the Assassin

spells.sandescricao: Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes Invisible and gains Movement Speed. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her. Enemies inside the smoke have their Movement Speed reduced.
spells.descricao: Akali teleports to a nearby location, leaving a cover of smoke at her previous location that lasts for 45/70/95/120/145 seconds and slows enemies within its area by 40%.While inside the shroud Akali gains Invisibility and 0.4% movement speed. Attacking or using abilities briefly removes Invisibility.Stealth - Invisible: Akali can only be revealed by nearby enemy Turrets or True Sight.
spells.name: Twilight Shroud

spells.sandescricao: Akali flourishes her kamas, dealing damage based on her bonus Attack Damage and Ability Power. When Crescent Slash kills a unit, it has a shorter cooldown.
spells.descricao: Akali flourishes her kamas, slicing enemies for 35/55/75/95/115 (+0.4/0.5) (+0.4) physical damage.If Crescent Slash kills an enemy, its cooldown is refunded by 40%.
spells.name: Crescent Slash

spells.sandescricao: Akali moves through shadows to quickly strike through her target, dealing damage and consuming an Essence of Shadow charge. Akali recharges Essence of Shadow charges periodically, max 3 stacks.
spells.descricao: Akali quickly strikes through her target, dealing 35/55/75/95/115 (+0.4) magic damage.Akali stores an Essence of Shadow on kills and assists as well as every 0.35/30/22.5/15 seconds up to 6 total.
spells.name: Shadow Dance

name: Vi
lore: Once a criminal from the mean streets of Zaun, Vi is a hotheaded, impulsive, and fearsome woman with only a very loose respect for authority figures. Growing up all but alone, Vi developed finely honed survival instincts as well as a wickedly abrasive sense of humor. Now working with the Wardens of Piltover to keep the peace, she wields mighty hextech gauntlets that can punch through walls and suspects with equal ease.
title: the Piltover Enforcer
passiva_descricao: Vi charges a shield over time. The shield can be activated by hitting an enemy with an ability.

spells.sandescricao: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
spells.descricao: Vi charges her gauntlets and unleashes a vault shattering punch, carrying her forward. Enemies she hits are knocked back and receive a stack of Denting Blows.
spells.name: Vault Breaker

spells.sandescricao: Vi's punches break her opponent's Armor, dealing bonus damage and granting her Attack Speed.
spells.descricao: Every 3rd attack on the same target deals an additional 110/160/210/260/310% (+0.8/1.4%) of the target's maximum Health as physical damage, reduces its Armor by 75% and grants Vi 2% Attack Speed for 15 seconds (max 6 damage vs. monsters).
spells.name: Denting Blows

spells.sandescricao: Vi's next attack blasts through her target, dealing damage to enemies behind it.
spells.descricao: Causes next basic attack to deal 110/160/210/260/310 (+1.15) (+0.8) physical damage to the target and enemies behind it.Vi charges a new punch every 0.8/1.4 seconds and can hold 2 charges at once.
spells.name: Excessive Force

spells.sandescricao: Vi runs down an enemy, knocking aside anyone in the way. When she reaches her target she knocks it into the air, jumps after it, and slams it back into the ground.
spells.descricao: Targets an enemy champion and chases it down, knocking it up for 1.25 seconds, dealing 110/160/210/260/310 (+0.8) physical damage.While charging, Vi cannot be stopped and has True Sight of the target. Any enemies in the way are knocked aside and dealt 75% of the damage.
spells.name: Assault and Battery

name: Amumu
lore: Legend claims that Amumu is a lonely and melancholy soul from ancient Shurima, roaming the world in search of a friend. Doomed by an ancient curse to remain alone forever, his touch is death, his affection ruin. Those who claim to have seen him describe a living cadaver, small in stature and wrapped in creeping bandages. Amumu has inspired myths, songs, and folklore told and retold for generations—such that it is impossible to separate truth from fiction.
title: the Sad Mummy
passiva_descricao: Amumu's basic attacks Curse enemies for 3 seconds, causing them to take 10% bonus true damage from any magic damage dealt to them.

spells.sandescricao: Amumu tosses a sticky bandage at a target, stunning and damaging the target while he pulls himself to them.
spells.descricao: Launches a bandage in a direction. If it hits an enemy unit, Amumu pulls himself to them, dealing 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.7) magic damage and stunning for 1 second.
spells.name: Bandage Toss

spells.sandescricao: Overcome by anguish, nearby enemies lose a percentage of their maximum Health each second and have their Curses refreshed.
spells.descricao: Toggle: Amumu cries, refreshing Curses on nearby enemies and dealing magic damage equal to 1 plus 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.7)% of their maximum health each second.
spells.name: Despair

spells.sandescricao: Permanently reduces the physical damage Amumu would take. Amumu can unleash his rage, dealing damage to surrounding enemies. Each time Amumu is hit, the cooldown on Tantrum is reduced by 0.5 seconds.
spells.descricao: Passive: Amumu takes 80/130/180/230/280 reduced damage from physical attacks.Active: Amumu tantrums, dealing 1 (+0.7) magic damage to surrounding units.Basic attacks that hit Amumu reduce the cooldown of Tantrum by 0.5 seconds.
spells.name: Tantrum

spells.sandescricao: Amumu entangles surrounding enemy units in bandages, applying his Curse, damaging them and rendering them unable to attack or move.
spells.descricao: Amumu entangles nearby enemy units, dealing 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.7) magic damage and applying Curse. Entangled enemies are unable to attack or move for 2 seconds.
spells.name: Curse of the Sad Mummy

name: Lulu
lore: The yordle mage Lulu is known for conjuring dreamlike illusions and fanciful creatures as she roams Runeterra with her fairy companion Pix. Lulu shapes reality on a whim, warping the fabric of the world, and what she views as the constraints of this mundane, physical realm. While others might consider her magic at best unnatural, and at worst dangerous, she believes everyone could use a touch of enchantment.
title: the Fae Sorceress
passiva_descricao: Pix is a wild Faerie that accompanies Lulu. Pix will fire a barrage of magical energy at targets that Lulu attacks.

spells.sandescricao: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
spells.descricao: Pix and Lulu each fire a bolt of magical energy that heavily slows all enemies it hits. An enemy can only be damaged by one bolt.
spells.name: Glitterlance

spells.sandescricao: If cast on an ally, grants them Attack Speed and Movement Speed for a short time. If cast on an enemy, turns them into an adorable critter that can't attack or cast spells.
spells.descricao: On Ally Cast: Target ally gains 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.05)% Movement Speed and 0% Attack Speed for 0.7 seconds.On Enemy Cast: Polymorphs an enemy champion for 2 seconds, disabling their ability to attack or cast spells and reducing their base Movement Speed by 0.
spells.name: Whimsy

spells.sandescricao: If cast on an ally, commands Pix to jump to an ally and shield them. He then follows them and aids their attacks. If cast on an enemy, commands Pix to jump to an enemy and damage them. He then follows them and grants you vision of that enemy.
spells.descricao: On Ally Cast: Commands Pix to jump to an ally and then follow and aid their attacks instead of Lulu's for 80/125/170/215/260 seconds. If the ally is a champion, Pix shields them from 80 (+0.5) damage for 30 seconds.On Enemy Cast: Pix deals 0 (+0.05) magic damage to target enemy unit. Pix then follows and grants True Sight of them for 8 seconds.
spells.name: Help, Pix!

spells.sandescricao: Lulu enlarges an ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air and granting the ally a large amount of bonus health. For the next few seconds, that ally gains an aura that slows nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Lulu enlarges her ally, knocking nearby enemies into the air. For 0 seconds, her ally gains 80/125/170/215/260 (+0.5) bonus health and slows nearby enemies by 80%.
spells.name: Wild Growth

name: Morgana
lore: Driven by vindictive obsession, Morgana is a potent mistress of suffering and the black arts. Once a being of grace and light, she was ripped from her kind during an ancient conflict that broke her soul, turning her into the cruel tormentor she is today. Comforted by a prophecy that claims she will strike the final blow and gain her revenge, Morgana lies in wait, her lust for power growing endlessly.
title: Fallen Angel
passiva_descricao: Morgana heals for the spell damage she deals to champions, large minions, and large monsters.

spells.sandescricao: Morgana releases a sphere of dark magic. Upon contact with an enemy unit, the sphere will deal magic damage and force the unit to the ground for a period of time.
spells.descricao: Fires a bolt of dark energy, rooting the first enemy hit for 2/2.25/2.5/2.75/3 seconds and dealing 80/135/190/245/300 (+0.9) magic damage.
spells.name: Dark Binding

spells.sandescricao: Infects an area with desecrated soil, causing enemy units who stand on the location to take continual damage.
spells.descricao: Curses an area for 0 seconds. Enemies on the cursed ground are dealtfrom 0 (+0.9) to 0 (+0.22/0.33) magic damage every second based on the enemy's missing Health.Every time Soul Siphon heals Morgana, Tormented Soil's cooldown is reduced by 0%.
spells.name: Tormented Soil

spells.sandescricao: Places a protective barrier around an allied champion, absorbing magical damage and disables until penetrated or the shield dissipates.
spells.descricao: Shields an allied Champion for 2/2.25/2.5/2.75/3 seconds. The shield absorbs 80/135/190/245/300 (+0.9) magic damage and prevents disables until it breaks.
spells.name: Black Shield

spells.sandescricao: Latches chains of energy onto nearby enemy champions, dealing initial damage to them and slowing their Movement Speed, and then echoing the pain a few seconds later and stunning them if they remain close to Morgana.
spells.descricao: Dark chains latch onto nearby enemy Champions dealing 80/135/190/245/300 (+0.9) magic damage and slowing them by 0% for 0 seconds, granting True Sight. After 280 seconds, they are dealt an additional 8/16/24/32/40 (+0.22) magic damage and are stunned for 2/2.25/2.5/2.75/3 seconds.Enemy Champions can break the chains by moving away from Morgana.
spells.name: Soul Shackles

name: Nocturne
lore: A demonic amalgamation drawn from the nightmares that haunt every sentient mind, the thing known as Nocturne has become a primordial force of pure evil. It is liquidly chaotic in aspect, a faceless shadow with cold eyes and armed with wicked-looking blades. After freeing itself from the spirit realm, Nocturne descended upon the waking world, to feed upon the kind of terror that can only thrive in true darkness.
title: the Eternal Nightmare
passiva_descricao: Every 10 seconds, Nocturne's next attack strikes surrounding enemies for 120% physical damage and heals himself. Nocturne's basic attacks reduce this cooldown by 1 second.

spells.sandescricao: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals damage, leaves a Dusk Trail, and causes champions to leave a Dusk Trail. While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and has increased Movement Speed and Attack Damage.
spells.descricao: Nocturne throws a shadow blade that deals 65/110/155/200/245 (+0.75) physical damage and leaves a Dusk Trail for 5 seconds. Enemy champions hit also leave a Dusk Trail.While on the trail, Nocturne can move through units and gains 15/20/25/30/35% Movement Speed and 15/25/35/45/55 Attack Damage.
spells.name: Duskbringer

spells.sandescricao: Nocturne empowers his blades, passively gaining Attack Speed. Activating Shroud of Darkness allows Nocturne to fade into the shadows, creating a magical barrier which blocks a single enemy ability and doubles his passive Attack Speed if successful.
spells.descricao: Passive: Nocturne gains 15/20/25/30/35% Attack Speed.Active: Nocturne creates a magical barrier for 1.5 seconds, which blocks the next enemy ability.If an ability is blocked by the shield, Nocturne's passive Attack Speed bonus doubles for 5 seconds.
spells.name: Shroud of Darkness

spells.sandescricao: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing damage each second and terrifying the target if they do not get out of range by the end of the duration.
spells.descricao: Passive: Nocturne gains massively increased Movement Speed toward terrified enemies.Active: Nocturne plants a nightmare into his target's mind, dealing 15/20/25/30/35 (+1) magic damage over 5 seconds. If Nocturne stays within range of the target for the full duration, the target becomes terrified for 65/110/155/200/245 second(s).
spells.name: Unspeakable Horror

spells.sandescricao: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision in the process. He can then launch himself at a nearby enemy champion.
spells.descricao: Nocturne reduces the sight radius of all enemy champions and removes their ally vision for 4 seconds.While Paranoia is active, Nocturne can launch himself at an enemy champion, dealing 5 (+0.75) physical damage.
spells.name: Paranoia

name: Diana
lore: Bearing her crescent moonblade, Diana fights as a warrior of the Lunari—a faith all but quashed in the lands around Mount Targon. Clad in shimmering armor the color of winter snow at night, she is a living embodiment of the silver moon's power. Imbued with the essence of an Aspect from beyond Targon's towering summit, Diana is no longer wholly human, and struggles to understand her power and purpose in this world.
title: Scorn of the Moon
passiva_descricao: Every third strike restores mana and cleaves nearby enemies for additional magic damage. Every spell cast grants attack speed for the next 3 attacks.

spells.sandescricao: Diana swings her blade to unleash a bolt of lunar energy that deals damage in an arc before exploding. Afflicts enemies struck with the Moonlight debuff, revealing them if they are not stealthed.
spells.descricao: Unleashes a bolt of lunar energy in an arc dealing 60/95/130/165/200 (+0.7) magic damage.Afflicts enemies struck with Moonlight, revealing them if they are not stealthed for 3 seconds.
spells.name: Crescent Strike

spells.sandescricao: Diana creates three orbiting spheres that detonate on contact with enemies to deal damage in an area. She also gains a temporary shield that absorbs damage. If her third sphere detonates, the shield gains additional strength.
spells.descricao: Creates three orbiting spheres that explode on contact with enemies dealing 15 (+0.7) magic damage. Lasts 60/95/130/165/200 seconds.Grants a temporary shield that absorbs 55 (+0.2/0.3) damage. If the third sphere detonates, the shield increases by 40/55/70/85/100 (+0.2/0.3/0.3).
spells.name: Pale Cascade

spells.sandescricao: Diana draws in and slows all nearby enemies. Passively grants Diana attack speed after spell casts.
spells.descricao: Passive: Increases the attack speed gained from Moonsilver Blade to 55%.Active: Reveals and draws in all nearby enemies and then slows them by 60/95/130/165/200% for 15 seconds.
spells.name: Moonfall

spells.sandescricao: Diana dashes to an enemy and deals magic damage. Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to teleport to a target afflicted with Moonlight.
spells.descricao: Becomes the living embodiment of the vengeful moon, dashing to an enemy and dealing 15 (+0.7) magic damage.Lunar Rush has no cooldown when used to dash to an enemy afflicted with Moonlight. All other enemies will have the Moonlight debuff removed regardless of whether they were the target of Lunar Rush.
spells.name: Lunar Rush

name: Aurelion Sol
lore: Aurelion Sol once graced the vast emptiness of the cosmos with celestial wonders of his own devising. Now, he is forced to wield his awesome power at the behest of a space-faring empire that tricked him into servitude. Desiring a return to his star-forging ways, Aurelion Sol will drag the very stars from the sky, if he must, in order to regain his freedom.
title: The Star Forger
passiva_descricao: Stars orbit Aurelion Sol, dealing magic damage when they hit an enemy.

spells.sandescricao: Aurelion Sol creates an expanding disk, which explodes to stun and damage enemies when it moves too far away from him.
spells.descricao: First Press: Aurelion Sol creates a new stellar core, which grows over time and grants him 10% Movement Speed.The core will detonate when it reaches his Outer Limit, applying 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.65) magic damage and a 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5 second stun.Second Press: Detonate the core early.
spells.name: Starsurge

spells.custo: 40 Mana plus {{ e3 }} Mana Per Second
spells.sandescricao: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.
spells.descricao: Aurelion Sol pushes his stars farther out, magnifying their damage.
spells.name: Celestial Expansion

spells.sandescricao: Aurelion Sol gains speed while moving in one continuous direction, and can take off flying for a long distance.
spells.descricao: Passive: Continuously moving in one direction grants increasing Movement Speed up to 10%.Active: Fly for 20 units in the chosen direction. Only castable outside of combat. Aurelion Sol can see and be seen over walls while flying.Taking champion or turret damage will force a landing and reset the passive movement speed.
spells.name: Comet of Legend

spells.sandescricao: Aurelion Sol projects a blast of pure starfire, damaging and slowing all enemies caught in it and knocking nearby enemies back to a safer distance.
spells.descricao: Breathes out a blast of pure starfire, dealing 70/110/150/190/230 (+0.65) magic damage and slowing by 10% for 20 seconds. The blast will also knock nearby enemies back to Aurelion Sol's Outer Limit.
spells.name: Voice of Light

name: Zyra
lore: Born in an ancient, sorcerous catastrophe, Zyra is the wrath of nature given form—an alluring hybrid of plant and human, kindling new life with every step. She views the many mortals of Valoran as little more than prey for her seeded progeny, and thinks nothing of slaying them with flurries of deadly spines. Though her true purpose has not been revealed, Zyra wanders the world, indulging her most primal urges to colonize, and strangle all other life from it.
title: Rise of the Thorns
passiva_descricao: Seeds spawn around Zyra periodically, becoming faster with level and lasting 30 seconds. If an enemy Champion steps on a seed, it dies. Zyra can cast spells near seeds to grow plants. Extra plants striking the same target deal reduced damage.

spells.sandescricao: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
spells.descricao: Thick vines spread through the ground and explode into spines, dealing magic damage to enemies within the area. If cast near a seed, Deadly Spines grows a Thorn Spitter plant, which fires at enemies from afar.
spells.name: Deadly Spines

spells.sandescricao: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
spells.descricao: Zyra plants a seed, lasting up to 60 seconds. Deadly Spines and Grasping Roots cast near seeds will turn them into plants who fight for Zyra. Zyra can store multiple seeds at once, and killing enemies reduces Rampant Growth's recharge time.
spells.name: Rampant Growth

spells.sandescricao: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.
spells.descricao: Zyra sends forth vines through the ground to ensnare her target, dealing damage and rooting enemies they come across. If cast near a seed, Grasping Roots grows a Vine Lasher, whose short range attacks reduce enemy Movement Speed.
spells.name: Grasping Roots

spells.sandescricao: Zyra summons a twisted thicket at her target location, dealing damage to enemies as it expands and knocking them airborne as it contracts.
spells.descricao: Summons the fury of nature, growing a twisted thicket at target location which deals 0 (+0.6) magic damage to all enemies in the area as it expands. After 2 seconds, the vines snap upward knocking enemies into the air for 60/95/130/165/200 second.Garden of Thorns: Plants within the thicket are enraged, resetting their duration, gaining 0% Health and attacking in a flurry for 200% total damage.
spells.name: Stranglethorns

name: Viktor
lore: The herald of a new age of technology, Viktor has devoted his life to the advancement of humankind. An idealist who seeks to lift the people of Zaun to a new level of understanding, he believes that only by embracing a glorious evolution of technology can humanity's full potential be realized. With a body augmented by steel and science, Viktor is zealous in his pursuit of this bright future.
title: the Machine Herald
passiva_descricao: Viktor starts with the Prototype Hex Core that can be upgraded three times in the store to augment his abilities.

spells.sandescricao: Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack. Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.
spells.descricao: Viktor blasts an enemy unit dealing magic damage, gaining a shield and empowering his next basic attack. Augment: Viktor gains bonus Movement Speed after casting.
spells.name: Siphon Power

spells.sandescricao: Viktor conjures a heavy gravitational field that slows enemies in its radius. Enemies who stay within the device for too long are stunned. Augment: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.
spells.descricao: Viktor deploys a gravitational imprisonment device for 30 seconds, slowing enemy units by 60/80/100/120/140% and adding a stack every 0 seconds. At 20/40/60/80/100 stacks the target is stunned for 2.5 seconds.Augment - Implosion: Enemies stunned by Gravity Field are dragged to the center.
spells.name: Gravity Field

spells.sandescricao: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing damage to all enemies in its path. Augment: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing magic damage.
spells.descricao: Viktor uses his robotic arm to fire a chaos beam that cuts across the field in a line, dealing 60/80/100/120/140 (+0.4) magic damage to every enemy in its path.Augment - Aftershock: An explosion follows the Death Ray's wake, dealing 2.5 (+0.4/0.5) magic damage.
spells.name: Death Ray

spells.sandescricao: Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity. Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.
spells.descricao: Viktor conjures a singularity on the field which deals magic damage and interrupts enemy channels. The singularity then periodically does magic damage to all nearby enemies. Viktor can redirect the singularity. Augment: The Chaos Storm moves faster.
spells.name: Chaos Storm

name: Cassiopeia
lore: Cassiopeia is a deadly creature bent on manipulating others to her sinister will. Youngest and most beautiful daughter of the noble Du Couteau family of Noxus, she ventured deep into the crypts beneath Shurima in search of ancient power. There, she was bitten by a gruesome tomb guardian, whose venom transformed her into a viper-like predator. Cunning and agile, Cassiopeia now slithers under the veil of night, petrifying her enemies with her baleful gaze.
title: the Serpent's Embrace
passiva_descricao: Cassiopeia gains Movement Speed per level, but she cannot purchase Boots items.

spells.sandescricao: Cassiopeia blasts an area with Poison after a brief delay, granting her increased Movement Speed if she hits an enemy champion.
spells.descricao: Blasts enemies in an area with Noxious Poison. If a champion is hit, Cassiopeia gains 30/35/40/45/50% Movement Speed decaying over 3 seconds.Noxious Poison deals 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.7) magic damage over 3 seconds.
spells.name: Noxious Blast

spells.sandescricao: Cassiopeia releases several clouds of poison, slowing, grounding, and lightly damaging enemies that pass through them. Grounded enemies cannot use Movement abilities.
spells.descricao: Cassiopeia spews venom in an arc, leaving toxic clouds for 3 seconds.Enemies in the clouds are continually afflicted with Debilitating Poison, inflicting a decaying 3% slow and grounding them, prohibiting the use of Movement abilities. They also take 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.7) magic damage per second.Miasma has a minimum cast range.
spells.name: Miasma

spells.sandescricao: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
spells.descricao: Cassiopeia lets loose an attack that deals increased damage to Poisoned targets and heals her for a percentage of the damage dealt. If the target dies from this attack, Cassiopeia regains Mana.
spells.name: Twin Fang

spells.sandescricao: Cassiopeia releases a swirl of magical energy from her eyes, stunning any enemies in front of her that are facing her and slowing any others with their back turned.
spells.descricao: Cassiopeia deals 75/120/165/210/255 (+0.7) magic damage to all enemies in front of her. Enemies facing her turn to stone and are stunned for 30/35/40/45/50 seconds while enemies facing away are slowed by 3%.
spells.name: Petrifying Gaze

name: Nasus
lore: Nasus is an imposing, jackal-headed Ascended being from ancient Shurima, a heroic figure regarded as a demigod by the people of the desert. Fiercely intelligent, he was a guardian of knowledge and peerless strategist whose wisdom guided the ancient empire of Shurima to greatness for many centuries. After the fall of the empire, he went into self-imposed exile, becoming little more than a legend. Now that the ancient city of Shurima has risen once more, he has returned, determined to ensure it never falls again.
title: the Curator of the Sands
passiva_descricao: Nasus drains his foe's spiritual energy, giving him bonus Life Steal.

spells.sandescricao: Nasus strikes his foe, dealing damage and increasing the power of his future Siphoning Strikes if he slays his target.
spells.descricao: Nasus's next basic attack will deal 30/50/70/90/110 (+1) (+1/3) physical damage.Siphoning Strike permanently gains 3 damage if it kills an enemy. This bonus is doubled against Champions, large minions and large monsters.
spells.name: Siphoning Strike

spells.sandescricao: Nasus ages an enemy champion, decelerating their Movement and Attack Speeds over time.
spells.descricao: Nasus ages target champion over 25 seconds, slowing their Movement Speed by 3%, increasing to 30/50/70/90/110% over the duration. The target's Attack Speed is reduced by half the amount.
spells.name: Wither

spells.sandescricao: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at a location, dealing damage and reducing the Armor of enemies who stand on it.
spells.descricao: Nasus unleashes a spirit flame at target location, dealing 6 (+1) magic damage.For the next 25 seconds, enemies in the area have their Armor reduced by 3% and are dealt an additional 30/50/70/90/110 (+0.6/0.12) magic damage each second.
spells.name: Spirit Fire

spells.sandescricao: Nasus unleashes a mighty sandstorm that batters nearby enemies. While the storm rages, he gains increased Health, Attack Range, damages nearby enemies, has a reduced cooldown on Siphoning Strike, and gains bonus Armor and Magic Resistance for the duration.
spells.descricao: Nasus becomes empowered in the sandstorm for 15 seconds, increasing his maximum Health by 30/50/70/90/110 and Armor and Magic Resistance by 6.While the storm rages, he deals 25 (+0.6/0.12)% of nearby enemies' maximum Health each second as magic damage (0 damage max per second), gains an additional 0 Armor and Magic Resistance each second, and Siphoning Strike has a 0% reduced cooldown.
spells.name: Fury of the Sands

name: Twitch
lore: A Zaunite plague rat by birth, but a connoisseur of filth by passion, Twitch is not afraid to get his paws dirty. Aiming a chem-powered crossbow at the gilded heart of Piltover, he has vowed to show those in the city above just how filthy they really are. Always a sneaky sneak, when he's not rooting around in the Sump, he's digging deep into other people's garbage for discarded treasures… and perhaps a moldy sandwich.
title: the Plague Rat
passiva_descricao: Twitch's basic attacks infect the target, dealing true damage each second.

spells.sandescricao: Twitch becomes Camouflaged for a short duration and gains Movement Speed. When leaving Camouflage, Twitch gains Attack Speed for a short duration. When an enemy champion with Deadly Venom dies, Ambush's cooldown is reset.
spells.descricao: Twitch becomes Camouflaged and gains 10% Movement Speed for 10/11/12/13/14 seconds. This bonus triples when he is nearby an enemy champion that cannot see him. Twitch gains 30/35/40/45/50% Attack Speed for 5 seconds after exiting Ambush. Ambush resets when a champion dies while affected by Deadly Venom.Stealth - Camouflage: Twitch is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.
spells.name: Ambush

spells.sandescricao: Twitch hurls a cask of venom that explodes in an area, slowing targets and applying deadly venom to the target.
spells.descricao: Twitch hurls a cask that adds a stack of Deadly Venom to all enemies struck and leaves behind a toxic cloud that persists for 10 seconds.Enemies that remain within the cloud have 10/11/12/13/14% reduced Movement Speed and receive an additional stack of Deadly Venom each second.
spells.name: Venom Cask

spells.sandescricao: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
spells.descricao: Twitch wreaks further havoc on poisoned enemies with a blast of his vile diseases.
spells.name: Contaminate

spells.sandescricao: Twitch unleashes the full power of his crossbow, shooting bolts over a great distance that pierce all enemies caught in their path.
spells.descricao: For 10/11/12/13/14 seconds Twitch gains 1 Attack Range and 30/35/40/45/50 Bonus Attack Damage.For the duration, his basic attacks become piercing bolts that deal 10% less damage to subsequent targets, down to a minimum of 1% damage.Stealth - Camouflage: Activating Spray and Pray does not end Camouflage.
spells.name: Spray and Pray

name: Dr. Mundo
lore: Utterly insane, unrepentantly homicidal, and horrifyingly purple, Dr. Mundo is what keeps many of Zaun's citizens indoors on particularly dark nights. This monosyllabic monstrosity seems to want nothing more than pain—both the giving of it, and the receiving of it. Wielding his massive meat cleaver as if it were weightless, Mundo is infamous for capturing and torturing dozens of Zaun's citizens for his nefarious “operations,” which seem to have no overall point or goal. He is brutal. He is unpredictable. He goes where he pleases. He is also not, technically, a doctor.
title: the Madman of Zaun
passiva_descricao: Dr. Mundo regenerates 0.3% of his maximum Health each second.

spells.sandescricao: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).
spells.descricao: Dr. Mundo hurls his cleaver, dealing damage equal to a portion of his target's current Health and slowing them for a short time. Dr. Mundo delights in the suffering of others, so he is returned half of the Health cost when he successfully lands a cleaver (increased to the full Health cost on killing blows).
spells.name: Infected Cleaver

spells.sandescricao: Dr. Mundo drains his Health to reduce the duration of disables and deal continual damage to nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Toggle: Dr. Mundo sets himself on fire, dealing 80/130/180/230/280 (+0.2) magic damage to nearby enemies every second.While on fire, the duration of disables against Dr. Mundo are reduced by 2%.
spells.name: Burning Agony

spells.sandescricao: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.
spells.descricao: Dr. Mundo gains bonus attack damage based on his missing health, and his next basic attack headbutts his target for additional damage. Passively increases magic resist whenever Dr. Mundo is dealt magic damage or pays a health cost.
spells.name: Masochism

spells.sandescricao: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
spells.descricao: Dr. Mundo sacrifices a portion of his Health for increased Movement Speed and drastically increased Health Regeneration.
spells.name: Sadism

name: Orianna
lore: Once a curious girl of flesh and blood, Orianna is now a technological marvel comprised entirely of clockwork. She became gravely ill after an accident in the lower districts of Zaun, and her failing body had to be replaced with exquisite artifice, piece by piece. Accompanied by an extraordinary brass sphere she built for companionship and protection, Orianna is now free to explore the wonders of Piltover, and beyond.
title: the Lady of Clockwork
passiva_descricao: Orianna's autoattack deals additional magic damage. This damage increases the more Orianna attacks the same target.

spells.sandescricao: Orianna commands her Ball to fire toward a target location, dealing magic damage to targets along the way (deals less damage to subsequent targets). Her Ball remains at the target location after.
spells.descricao: Orianna commands her Ball to shoot toward a target location, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.5) magic damage to targets along the way. However, it deals 10% less damage for each unit it hits (Minimum 40%).Her Ball remains behind at the target location afterwards.
spells.name: Command: Attack

spells.sandescricao: Orianna commands the Ball to release a pulse of energy, dealing magic damage around it. This leaves a field behind that speeds up allies and slows enemies.
spells.descricao: Orianna commands her Ball to release an electric pulse, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.5) magic damage to nearby enemies.The pulse leaves behind an energy field for 0 seconds, lowering enemy Movement Speed by 10% and increasing ally Movement Speed by 40% for 0 seconds. This effect diminishes over time.
spells.name: Command: Dissonance

spells.sandescricao: Orianna commands her Ball to attach to an allied champion, shielding them and dealing magic damage to any enemies it passes through on the way. Additionally, the Ball grants additional Armor and Magic Resist to the champion it is attached to.
spells.descricao: Passive: The Ball adds 10 Armor and Magic Resist to the allied champion it is attached to.Active: Orianna commands her Ball to travel to and attach onto an allied champion, shielding them for 0 seconds from the next 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.5) damage. Enemies the Ball passes through along the way are damaged for 40 (+0.4/0.3) magic damage.
spells.name: Command: Protect

spells.sandescricao: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave, dealing magic damage and launching nearby enemies towards the Ball after a short delay.
spells.descricao: Orianna commands her Ball to unleash a shockwave after a brief delay, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.5) magic damage to nearby enemies and flinging them into the air a set distance in the direction of the Ball.
spells.name: Command: Shockwave

name: Evelynn
lore: Within the dark seams of Runeterra, the demon Evelynn searches for her next victim. She lures in prey with the voluptuous façade of a human female, but once a person succumbs to her charms, Evelynn's true form is unleashed. She then subjects her victim to unspeakable torment, gratifying herself with their pain. To the demon, these liaisons are innocent flings. To the rest of Runeterra, they are ghoulish tales of lust gone awry and horrific reminders of the cost of wanton desire.
title: Agony's Embrace
passiva_descricao: When out of combat, Evelynn enters Demon Shade. Demon Shade heals Evelynn when she is low on health and grants Camouflage after level 6.

spells.sandescricao: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.
spells.descricao: Evelynn strikes out with her Lasher, dealing damage to the first unit hit. Then, Evelynn can shoot a line of spikes at nearby foes up to 3 times.
spells.name: Hate Spike

spells.sandescricao: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
spells.descricao: Evelynn curses her target, causing her next attack or spell after a delay to charm her target and reduce their magic resist.
spells.name: Allure

spells.sandescricao: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.
spells.descricao: Evelynn whips her target with her Lasher, dealing damage. She then gains movement speed for a short duration.
spells.name: Whiplash

spells.sandescricao: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
spells.descricao: Evelynn briefly goes untargetable and decimates the area in front of her before warping backwards a long distance.
spells.name: Last Caress

name: Rek'Sai
lore: An apex predator, Rek'Sai is a merciless Void-spawn that tunnels beneath the ground to ambush and devour unsuspecting prey. Her insatiable hunger has laid waste to entire regions of the once-great empire of Shurima—merchants, traders, even armed caravans, will go hundreds of miles out of their way to avoid her and her offspring's hunting grounds. All know that once Rek'Sai is seen on the horizon, death from below is all but guaranteed.
title: the Void Burrower
passiva_descricao: While unburrowed Rek'Sai generates Fury with her basic attacks and spells. When burrowed Rek'Sai consumes Fury to heal herself.

spells.sandescricao: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks deal bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that deals Physical Damage and reveals enemies hit.
spells.descricao: Un-Burrowed: Rek'Sai's next 3 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal 20/25/30/35/40 (+0.4) bonus Physical Damage to nearby enemies.Burrowed: Rek'Sai launches a burst of void-charged earth that explodes on first enemy hit, dealing 60/90/120/150/180 (+0.4/0.7) (+0.4/0.7/0.4) Physical Damage and revealing non-stealthed enemies for 2.5 seconds.
spells.name: Queen's Wrath / Prey Seeker

spells.sandescricao: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Rek'Sai burrows into the ground, gaining new abilities and increased Movement Speed. Her vision range is reduced and she cannot use basic attacks. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai may cast Un-burrow to knock up and damage nearby enemies.
spells.name: Burrow / Un-burrow

spells.sandescricao: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
spells.descricao: Rek'Sai bites her target, dealing double and True Damage if she has max Fury. While Burrowed, Rek'Sai creates a re-usable, long lasting tunnel. Enemies can destroy it by standing on top of either entrance.
spells.name: Furious Bite / Tunnel

spells.sandescricao: Rek'Sai dives underground and leaps towards her target, dealing massive damage.
spells.descricao: Passive: Dealing damage to enemy Champions marks them for the next 2.5 seconds.Active: Rek'Sai lets out a harrowing scream before burrowing underground seeking out a marked target. Moments later she leaps from underground, dealing 300 (+0.4/0.7) physical damage plus 0% of their missing Health.
spells.name: Void Rush

name: Lux
lore: Luxanna Crownguard hails from Demacia, an insular realm where magical abilities are viewed with fear and suspicion. Able to bend light to her will, she grew up dreading discovery and exile, and was forced to keep her power secret, in order to preserve her family's noble status. Nonetheless, Lux's optimism and resilience have led her to embrace her unique talents, and she now covertly wields them in service of her homeland.
title: the Lady of Luminosity
passiva_descricao: Lux's damaging spells charge the target with energy for 6 seconds. Lux's next attack ignites the energy, dealing bonus magic damage (depending on Lux's level) to the target.

spells.sandescricao: Lux releases a sphere of light that binds and deals damage to up to two enemy units.
spells.descricao: Fires a ball of light, rooting up to two enemies for 2 seconds and dealing 50/100/150/200/250 (+0.7) magic damage to each.
spells.name: Light Binding

spells.sandescricao: Lux throws her wand and bends the light around any friendly target it touches, protecting them from enemy damage.
spells.descricao: Throws Lux's wand in target direction protecting her and all allied Champions it touches from 50 (+0.7) damage for 3 seconds.Upon reaching its destination it returns to Lux, protecting her and other allied Champions it touches from another 50/65/80/95/110 (+0.2) damage for 3 seconds.Shielding an ally with the outgoing shield doubles the value of the returning shield.
spells.name: Prismatic Barrier

spells.sandescricao: Fires an anomaly of twisted light to an area, which slows nearby enemies. Lux can detonate it to damage enemies in the area of effect.
spells.descricao: Creates a zone that slows enemies by 50/100/150/200/250%. After 2 seconds the zone detonates dealing 50 (+0.7) magic damage.Activate again to detonate early.
spells.name: Lucent Singularity

spells.sandescricao: After gathering energy, Lux fires a beam of light that deals damage to all targets in the area. If Final Spark kills a champion, part of its cooldown is refunded. In addition, triggers Lux's passive ability and refreshes the Illumination debuff duration.
spells.descricao: Fires a dazzling ray of light dealing 50/100/150/200/250 (+0.7) magic damage to all enemies in a line. If Final Spark kills an enemy champion, 2% of its cooldown is refunded.Final Spark ignites and refreshes the Illumination debuff.
spells.name: Final Spark

name: Sion
lore: A war hero from a bygone era, Sion was revered in Noxus for choking the life out of a Demacian king with his bare hands—but, denied oblivion, he was resurrected to serve his empire even in death. His indiscriminate slaughter claimed all who stood in his way, regardless of allegiance, proving he no longer retained his former humanity. Even so, with crude armor bolted onto rotten flesh, Sion continues to charge into battle with reckless abandon, struggling to remember his true self between the swings of his mighty axe.
title: The Undead Juggernaut
passiva_descricao: After being killed, Sion will reanimate with rapidly decaying Health. His attacks become very rapid, gain 100% Lifesteal and deal bonus damage equal to 10% of his target's maximum Health (max 75 to monsters). All his abilities are replaced with Death Surge, which grants a burst of Movement Speed.

spells.sandescricao: Sion charges a powerful swing in an area in front of himself that will deal damage to enemies when released. If he charges for enough time, enemies hit by the swing will also be knocked up and stunned.
spells.descricao: Sion charges up a heavy blow for up to 2 seconds. When released, he deals 20/40/60/80/100 (+0.6) to 60/120/180/240/300 (+0.6/1.8) physical damage to enemies hit (60% damage to minions) and briefly slows them.If Sion charges for at least 1 second, enemies are knocked up and stunned for 1.25 to 2.25 seconds.
spells.name: Decimating Smash

spells.sandescricao: Sion shields himself and can reactivate after 3 seconds to deal Magic Damage to enemies nearby. When Sion kills enemies, he passively gains maximum Health.
spells.descricao: Passive: Sion gains 2.5 maximum Health when he kills a unit (1.95 for champion kills, assists, large minions and large monsters). Current Bonus: 0.6 Active: Sion shields himself for 20/40/60/80/100 (+0.1/0.4) (+0.6/1.8) (0.65% of maximum Health) for 6 seconds.
