After 7.5 seconds, while the shield holds, Sion can reactivate to deal 1.25 (+0.1/0.4/0.4) plus 60/120/180/240/300% of the target's maximum Health as magic damage to nearby enemies. Max 400 bonus damage to minions and monsters.
spells.name: Soul Furnace

spells.sandescricao: Sion fires a short range shockwave that damages and slows and reduces the Armor of the first enemy hit. If the shockwave hits a minion or monster, it will be knocked back, damaging and slowing all enemies that it passes through.
spells.descricao: Sion fires a shockwave, dealing 20/40/60/80/100 (+0.1/0.4) magic damage to the first enemy hit, slowing it by 1.25%, and reducing its Armor by 2.5% for 2.5 seconds.If the target is not a champion, it will be knocked back. Enemies that the knocked back unit collides with take 1.95% bonus damage and are slowed by 40/65/90/115/140%.
spells.name: Roar of the Slayer

spells.sandescricao: Sion charges in a direction, ramping up speed over time. He can steer his charge slightly with the mouse cursor location. When he collides with an enemy he deals damage and knocks them up based on the distance he has charged.
spells.descricao: Sion charges in a direction for 8 seconds and can steer slowly towards the mouse cursor. While charging, Sion is immune to all Crowd Control. Reactivating will cancel Sion's charge early.When Sion collides with an enemy champion or wall, he deals 20/40/60/80/100 (+0.6) physical damage and knocks up enemies in a small area for 2.5 seconds. Enemies in a larger area take the same damage and are slowed by 0.65% for 3 seconds.The damage increases to 1.25 (+0.6/1.8) and the stun increases to 1.95 seconds as Sion charges farther.
spells.name: Unstoppable Onslaught

name: Camille
lore: Weaponized to operate outside the boundaries of the law, Camille is the Principal Intelligencer of Clan Ferros—an elegant and elite agent who ensures the Piltover machine and its Zaunite underbelly runs smoothly. Adaptable and precise, she views sloppy technique as an embarrassment that must be put to order. With a mind as sharp as the blades she bears, Camille's pursuit of superiority through hextech body augmentation has left many to wonder if she is now more machine than woman.
title: the Steel Shadow
passiva_descricao: Basic attacks on champions grant a shield equal to 20% of Camille's maximum health against their damage type (Physical or Magic) for 1.5-2.5 seconds. This effect has a 20-10 second cooldown.

spells.sandescricao: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.
spells.descricao: Camille's next attack deals bonus damage and grants bonus movement speed. This spell can be recast for a short period of time, doing significantly increased bonus damage if Camille delays a period of time between the two attacks.
spells.name: Precision Protocol

spells.sandescricao: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
spells.descricao: Camille blasts in a cone after a delay, dealing damage. Enemies in the outer half are slowed and take extra damage, while also healing Camille.
spells.name: Tactical Sweep

spells.sandescricao: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.
spells.descricao: Camille pulls herself to a wall, leaping off and knocking up enemies upon landing.
spells.name: Hookshot

spells.sandescricao: Camille dashes to target champion, anchoring them to the area. She also deals bonus magic damage to the target with her basic attacks.
spells.descricao: Camille briefly becomes untargetable and leaps onto an enemy champion, interrupting channels and locking them into an area they cannot escape by any means for 20/25/30/35/40 seconds. Other nearby enemies are knocked away. Her basic attacks against the trapped enemy deal bonus magic damage equal to 50 plus 1.5% of their current health.The Hextech Ultimatum ends if Camille leaves the area.
spells.name: The Hextech Ultimatum

name: Master Yi
lore: Master Yi has tempered his body and sharpened his mind, so that thought and action have become almost as one. Though he chooses to enter into violence only as a last resort, the grace and speed of his blade ensures resolution is always swift. As one of the last living practitioners of the Ionian art of wuju, Yi has devoted his life to continuing the legacy of his people—scrutinizing potential new disciples with the Seven Lenses of Insight to identify the most worthy among them.
title: the Wuju Bladesman
passiva_descricao: Every few strikes, Master Yi strikes twice.

spells.sandescricao: Master Yi teleports across the battlefield with blinding speed, dealing physical damage to multiple units in his path, while simultaneously becoming untargetable. Alpha Strike can critically strike and deals bonus physical damage to minions and monsters. Basic attacks reduce Alpha Strike's cooldown.
spells.descricao: Master Yi teleports to strike up to 4 enemies, dealing 25/60/95/130/165 (+1) physical damage, with an additional 75/100/125/150/175 damage to minions and monsters. During Alpha Strike Master Yi is untargetable.Alpha Strike can critically strike, dealing an additional 1/0.6 physical damage. Basic attacks lower the cooldown of Alpha Strike by 1 second.
spells.name: Alpha Strike

spells.sandescricao: Master Yi rejuvenates his body by focus of mind, restoring Health and taking reduced damage for a short time. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
spells.descricao: Master Yi channels, restoring 25/60/95/130/165 (+1) Health per second for 4 seconds. This healing is increased by 1% for every 0.25% of Master Yi's missing Health.While channeling, Master Yi reduces incoming damage by 75/100/125/150/175%. This damage reduction is halved against turrets. In addition, Master Yi will gain stacks of Double Strike and pause the remaining duration on Wuju Style and Highlander for each second he channels.
spells.name: Meditate

spells.sandescricao: Master Yi becomes skilled in the art of Wuju, passively increasing his Attack Damage. Activating Wuju Style grants bonus true damage on basic attacks, but the passive bonus is then lost while on cooldown.
spells.descricao: Passive: Grants 25/60/95/130/165% (1/0.6) Attack Damage.Active: Basic attacks deal 75/100/125/150/175 (+0.1/0.125/0.15/0.175/0.2) bonus true damage for 0.25 seconds. Afterwards the passive bonus is lost while Wuju Style is on cooldown.
spells.name: Wuju Style

spells.sandescricao: Master Yi moves with unparalleled agility, temporarily increasing his Movement and Attack Speeds as well as making him immune to all slowing effects. While active, Champion kills or assists extend Highlander's duration. Passively reduces cooldown for his other abilities on a kill or assist.
spells.descricao: Passive: Champion kills and assists reduce the remaining cooldown of Master Yi's basic abilities by 0.25%.Active: Increases Movement Speed by 75/100/125/150/175%, Attack Speed by 50%, and grants immunity to slows for 25/60/95/130/165 seconds. While active, champion kills and assists extend the duration of Highlander by 1 seconds.
spells.name: Highlander

name: Ryze
lore: Widely considered one of the most adept sorcerers on Runeterra, Ryze is an ancient, hard-bitten archmage with an impossibly heavy burden to bear. Armed with immense arcane power and a boundless constitution, he tirelessly hunts for World Runes—fragments of the raw magic that once shaped the world from nothingness. He must retrieve these artifacts before they fall into the wrong hands, for Ryze understands the horrors they could unleash on Runeterra.
title: the Rune Mage
passiva_descricao: Ryze's spells deal extra damage based on his Bonus Mana, and he gains a percentage increase to his maximum Mana based on his Ability Power.

spells.sandescricao: Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload. On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains a shield and Movement Speed.
spells.descricao: Passively, Ryze's other damaging spells reset Overload and begin to charge a Rune that can be used to empower Overload. On cast, Ryze throws a charge of pure energy in a line, dealing damage to the first enemy struck. If a Rune is fully charged, Ryze also gains a shield and Movement Speed.
spells.name: Overload

spells.sandescricao: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
spells.descricao: Ryze traps a target enemy unit in a cage of runes, damaging them and preventing them from moving.
spells.name: Rune Prison

spells.sandescricao: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs them. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.
spells.descricao: Ryze releases an orb of pure magical power that damages an enemy and debuffs them. Ryze's spells have additional effects against the debuffed enemy.
spells.name: Spell Flux

spells.sandescricao: Ryze creates a portal to a nearby location. After a few seconds, allies standing near the portal are teleported to the target location.
spells.descricao: Ryze opens a portal to a location up to 3 range away. After 25/28/31/34/37/40 seconds, all allies near the portal are teleported to that location.If Ryze becomes unable to cast or move, Realm Warp is cancelled.
spells.name: Realm Warp

name: Malphite
lore: A massive creature of living stone, Malphite struggles to impose blessed order on a chaotic world. Birthed as a servitor-shard to an otherworldly obelisk known as the Monolith, he used his tremendous elemental strength to maintain and protect his progenitor, but ultimately failed. The only survivor of the destruction that followed, Malphite now endures Runeterra's soft folk and their fluid temperaments, while struggling to find a new role worthy of the last of his kind.
title: Shard of the Monolith
passiva_descricao: Malphite is shielded by a layer of rock which absorbs damage up to 10% of his maximum Health. If Malphite has not been hit for 10 seconds, this effect recharges.

spells.sandescricao: Using his primal elemental magic, Malphite sends a shard of the earth through the ground at his foe, dealing damage upon impact and stealing Movement Speed for 4 seconds.
spells.descricao: Deals 70/120/170/220/270 (+0.6) magic damage and steals 14/17/20/23/26% Movement Speed from the target for 4 seconds.
spells.name: Seismic Shard

spells.sandescricao: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
spells.descricao: Malphite starts to hit with such force that his attacks deal damage to all units in front of him. Passively increases his Armor (this amount is tripled while Granite Shield is active).
spells.name: Brutal Strikes

spells.sandescricao: Malphite slams the ground, sending out a shockwave that deals magic damage based on his Armor as damage and reduces the Attack Speed of enemies for a short duration.
spells.descricao: Malphite slams the ground dealing 14/17/20/23/26 (+0.3) (+0.6) magic damage to surrounding enemies, reducing their Attack Speed by 70/120/170/220/270% for 0 seconds.This ability gains damage equal to 4% of Malphite's Armor.
spells.name: Ground Slam

spells.sandescricao: Malphite ferociously charges to a location, damaging enemies and knocking them into the air.
spells.descricao: Malphite charges to target area. Upon his arrival he deals 14/17/20/23/26 (+0.6) magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them into the air for 4 seconds.
spells.name: Unstoppable Force

name: Anivia
lore: Anivia is a benevolent winged spirit who endures endless cycles of life, death, and rebirth to protect the Freljord. A demigod born of unforgiving ice and bitter winds, she wields those elemental powers to thwart any who dare disturb her homeland. Anivia guides and protects the tribes of the harsh north, who revere her as a symbol of hope, and a portent of great change. She fights with every ounce of her being, knowing that through her sacrifice, her memory will endure, and she will be reborn into a new tomorrow.
title: the Cryophoenix
passiva_descricao: Upon dying, Anivia will revert into an egg. If the egg can survive for six seconds, she is gloriously reborn.

spells.sandescricao: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
spells.descricao: Anivia brings her wings together and summons a sphere of ice that flies towards her opponents, chilling and damaging anyone in its path. When the sphere explodes it does moderate damage in a radius, stunning anyone in the area.
spells.name: Flash Frost

spells.sandescricao: Anivia condenses the moisture in the air into an impassable wall of ice to block all movement. The wall only lasts a short duration before it melts.
spells.descricao: Anivia summons an impassable wall of ice 13/12/11/10/9 units wide, blocking all movement. The wall lasts for 60/85/110/135/160 seconds before it melts.
spells.name: Crystallize

spells.sandescricao: With a flap of her wings, Anivia blasts a freezing gust of wind at her target, dealing a low amount of damage. If the target was recently stunned by Flash Frost or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, the damage they take is doubled.
spells.descricao: Anivia blasts her target with a freezing wind, dealing 60/85/110/135/160 (+0.4) magic damage. If a target was recently stunned by Anivia or damaged by a fully formed Glacial Storm, they take double damage.
spells.name: Frostbite

spells.sandescricao: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
spells.descricao: Anivia summons a driving rain of ice and hail to damage her enemies and slow their advance.
spells.name: Glacial Storm

name: Shen
lore: Among the secretive, Ionian warriors known as the Kinkou, Shen serves as their leader, the Eye of Twilight. He longs to remain free from the confusion of emotion, prejudice, and ego, and walks the unseen path of dispassionate judgment between the spirit realm and the physical world. Tasked with enforcing the equilibrium between them, Shen wields blades of steel and arcane energy against any who would threaten it.
title: the Eye of Twilight
passiva_descricao: After casting a spell, Shen gets a shield. Affecting other champions reduces the cooldown of this effect.

spells.sandescricao: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
spells.descricao: Shen recalls his spirit blade to attack with it, dealing damage based on the target's max health. The attacks are greatly empowered if it collides with an enemy champion, and all collided enemies are slowed while running away from Shen.
spells.name: Twilight Assault

spells.sandescricao: Attacks that would hit Shen or his allies near his spirit blade are blocked.
spells.descricao: Shen's spirit blade creates a defensive zone for 100 seconds. Basic attacks that would hit Shen or an allied champion in the zone are blocked.If there are no champions to protect in the zone when it starts, the spirit blade will not activate until one enters or 2/2.5/3/3.5/4 seconds pass.
spells.name: Spirit's Refuge

spells.sandescricao: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
spells.descricao: Shen dashes in a direction, taunting enemies in his path.
spells.name: Shadow Dash

spells.sandescricao: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
spells.descricao: Shen shields target allied champion from incoming damage, and soon after teleports to their location.
spells.name: Stand United

name: Jarvan IV
lore: Prince Jarvan, scion of the Lightshield dynasty, is heir apparent to the throne of Demacia. Raised to be a paragon of his nation's greatest virtues, he is forced to balance the heavy expectations placed upon him with his own desire to fight on the front lines. Jarvan inspires his troops with his fearsome courage and selfless determination, raising his family's colors high and revealing his true strength as a future leader of his people.
title: the Exemplar of Demacia
passiva_descricao: Jarvan IV's initial basic attack on a target deals bonus physical damage. This effect cannot occur again on the same target for a short duration.

spells.sandescricao: Jarvan IV extends his lance, dealing physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies in its path. Additionally, this will pull Jarvan to his Demacian Standard, knocking up enemies in his path.
spells.descricao: Extends Jarvan IV's lance dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+1.2) physical damage and lowering the Armor of enemies hit by 10/14/18/22/26% for 3 seconds.If the lance contacts Demacian Standard it will pull Jarvan IV to its location, knocking up enemies in his path. This effect can be triggered even while immobilized.
spells.name: Dragon Strike

spells.sandescricao: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
spells.descricao: Jarvan IV calls upon the ancient kings of Demacia to shield him from harm and slow surrounding enemies.
spells.name: Golden Aegis

spells.sandescricao: Jarvan IV carries the pride of Demacia, passively granting him bonus Attack Speed. Activating Demacian Standard allows Jarvan IV to place a Demacian flag that deals magic damage on impact and grants Attack Speed to nearby allied champions.
spells.descricao: Passive: Gains 3% Attack Speed.Active: Throws a Demacian Standard to a nearby area dealing 10/14/18/22/26 (+1.2) magic damage to enemies. The Standard lasts for 0 seconds and grants surrounding allied champions 10/20/30/40/50% Attack Speed.
spells.name: Demacian Standard

spells.sandescricao: Jarvan IV heroically leaps into battle at a target with such force that he terraforms the surrounding area to create an arena around them. Nearby enemies are damaged at the moment of impact.
spells.descricao: Heroically leaps to an enemy Champion dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+1.2) physical damage to nearby enemies and creating an arena of impassable terrain around them for 10/14/18/22/26 seconds.Activate again to collapse the terrain.
spells.name: Cataclysm

name: Malzahar
lore: A religious zealot dedicated to the unification of all life, Malzahar truly believes the newly emergent Void to be the gateway to Runeterra's salvation. In the desert wastes of Shurima, he opened his mind to the universe, and the whispers that answered led him to Icathia. Amidst the ruins of that land, he gazed into the dark heart of the Void itself—and Malzahar emerged changed, a shepherd empowered to bring others into the fold… or to release the voidling creatures that dwell beneath.
title: the Prophet of the Void
passiva_descricao: When he hasn't recently taken damage or been crowd controlled, Malzahar gains massive damage reduction and crowd control immunity, lingering for a short period after taking damage. Damage from lane minions is unaffected.

spells.sandescricao: Malzahar opens up two portals to the Void. After a short delay, they fire projectiles that deal Magic Damage and silence enemy champions.
spells.descricao: Malzahar opens two portals to the Void that fire projectiles inward, dealing 70/105/140/175/210 (+0.8) magic damage and silencing enemies hit for 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 second(s).
spells.name: Call of the Void

spells.sandescricao: Malzahar summons Voidlings to attack nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Passive: Casting Malzahar's other spells gives him Gathering Swarm, increasing the number of Voidlings summoned by Void Swarm (max 0).Active: Summons one or more Voidlings. Voidlings last 70/105/140/175/210 seconds and deal an additional 1/1.25/1.5/1.75/2 (+0.8) (+0.2/0.4) magic damage each hit.Voidlings deal 0.4% damage to lane minions affected by Malefic Visions.Voidlings deal 0% damage to epic monsters.
spells.name: Void Swarm

spells.sandescricao: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
spells.descricao: Malzahar infects his target's mind with cruel visions of their demise, dealing damage over time. Using Malzahar's other spells on the target will refresh the visions. If the target dies while afflicted by the visions, they pass on to a nearby enemy unit and Malzahar gains Mana. Malzahar's Voidlings are attracted to affected units.
spells.name: Malefic Visions

spells.sandescricao: Malzahar channels the essence of the Void to suppress an enemy champion over a zone of damaging negative energy.
spells.descricao: Malzahar suppresses a target champion for 0 seconds, dealing 0 (+0.2/0.4) magic damage over the duration. A zone of negative energy is created around his target for 0.4 seconds, dealing 70/105/140/175/210% (+0.8%) of nearby enemies max health as magic damage per second.
spells.name: Nether Grasp

name: Zac
lore: Zac is the product of a toxic spill that ran through a chemtech seam and pooled in an isolated cavern deep in Zaun's Sump. Despite such humble origins, Zac has grown from primordial ooze into a thinking being who dwells in the city's pipes, occasionally emerging to help those who cannot help themselves or to rebuild the broken infrastructure of Zaun.
title: the Secret Weapon
passiva_descricao: Each time Zac hits an enemy with an ability, he sheds a chunk of himself that can be reabsorbed to restore Health. Upon taking fatal damage, Zac splits into 4 bloblets that attempt to recombine. If any bloblets remain, he will revive with an amount of Health depending on the Health of the surviving bloblets. Each bloblet has a percentage of Zac's maximum Health, Armor and Magic Resistance. This ability has a 5 minute cooldown.

spells.sandescricao: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
spells.descricao: Zac stretches an arm, grabbing an enemy. Attacking a different enemy will cause him to throw both targets towards each other.
spells.name: Stretching Strikes

spells.sandescricao: Zac's body erupts, damaging nearby enemies.
spells.descricao: Zac's body erupts, dealing 30/40/50/60/70 magic damage +800 (+0.3)% of the enemy's max health as magic damage to nearby enemies.Absorbing Goo reduces Unstable Matter's cooldown by -0.6 second.Max health damage is capped at 0.5 versus minions and monsters.
spells.name: Unstable Matter

spells.sandescricao: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
spells.descricao: Zac attaches his arms to the ground and stretches back, launching himself forward.
spells.name: Elastic Slingshot

spells.sandescricao: Zac flattens himself, making him immune to crowd control while slowing enemies standing on top of him. When he decides to bounce away, he will suck up any enemies standing on top of him, taking them for a ride.
spells.descricao: Zac flattens himself, making him immune to crowd control while slowing enemies standing on top of him. When he decides to bounce away, he will suck up any enemies standing on top of him, taking them for a ride.
spells.name: Let's Bounce!

name: Gragas
lore: Equal parts jolly and imposing, Gragas is a massive, rowdy brewmaster on his own quest for the perfect pint of ale. Hailing from parts unknown, he now searches for rare ingredients among the unblemished wastes of the Freljord, trying each recipe as he goes. Often intoxicated and extremely impulsive, he is legendary for the brawls he starts, which often end in all-night parties and widespread property damage. Any appearance from Gragas must surely foreshadow drinking and destruction—in that order.
title: the Rabble Rouser
passiva_descricao: On ability use, Gragas takes a drink restoring 6% of his max Health. This effect can only happen every 8 seconds.

spells.sandescricao: Gragas rolls his cask to a location, which can be activated to explode or will explode on its own after 4 seconds. Enemies struck by the blast have their Movement Speed slowed.
spells.descricao: Gragas rolls his cask to a location. When reactivated, or after 4 seconds, the cask will explode, dealing 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.6) magic damage to nearby enemies and slowing their movement speed by 40/45/50/55/60% for 2 seconds.The damage and slow amount increase as the cask ferments, up to 150% after 2 seconds. Deals 70% damage to minions.
spells.name: Barrel Roll

spells.sandescricao: Gragas guzzles down brew from his cask for 1 second. After finishing, he becomes drunkenly empowered, dealing magic damage to all nearby enemies on his next basic attack and reducing damage received.
spells.descricao: Gragas guzzles down his brew, taking 80/120/160/200/240% reduced damage for 2 seconds.After finishing his drink, his next basic attack deals magic damage to nearby enemies equal to 2 (+0.6) plus 40/45/50/55/60% of their max Health (max 4 vs monsters).
spells.name: Drunken Rage

spells.sandescricao: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
spells.descricao: Gragas charges to a location and collides with the first enemy unit he comes across, dealing damage to all nearby enemy units and stunning them.
spells.name: Body Slam

spells.sandescricao: Gragas hurls his cask to a location, dealing damage and knocking back enemies caught in the blast radius.
spells.descricao: Gragas hurls his cask, causing it to explode when it lands. Enemies hit take 80/120/160/200/240 (+0.6) magic damage and are knocked away from the explosion.
spells.name: Explosive Cask
